T02TD2590E:225a-1: shr'i manydzu badzra au da ya manda lo bi dhi sarba satva hi ta ba ha n'a ma //
T02TD2590E:225a-3: dpal 'jam pa'i rdo rje 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga sems can thams cad kyi bde ba bskyed pa zhes bya ba //
T02TD2590E:225a-4: bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2590E:225a-5: mgon po 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2590E:225a-6: dpal ldan dngos grub thabs chen bdag nyid dri med shes rab btsun mo yi ni sku yis 'khyud //
T02TD2590E:225a-7: nam mkha' khyab pa'i thub dbang sprul ba'i tshogs kyis 'jig rten gsum gyi 'dod stsol mdzad //
T02TD2590E:225a-8: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dga' ba rgyun mi 'chad pa'i bde ba'i rol ba'i nyams ni 'phro mdzad pa //
T02TD2590E:225a-9: 'jam pa yi ni mchog la btud de 'gro bas de yi dkyil 'khor mnyes bya rab bshad bya //
T02TD2590E:225a-10: mi brtan mi nyid rnyed dka' de bas kyang //
T02TD2590E:225a-11: bshes gnyen mchog phrad dga' ston rab rnyed dka' //
T02TD2590E:225b-0: de phyir @225b bdag gzhan don 'byung sngags kyi tshul //
T02TD2590E:225b-1: sring gsum phan byed lam la brten par gyis //
T02TD2590E:225b-2: sdug bsngal du mas bcom zhing mya ngan gnas //
T02TD2590E:225b-3: 'gro ba mgon med bltas nas brtser ldan bas //
T02TD2590E:225b-4: sngags tshul 'di yi don la brten bya ste //
T02TD2590E:225b-5: dam pa rnams la gzhan don las mchog med ;
T02TD2590E:225b-6: / rang gi lto ba tsam zhig 'gengs 'dod pa //
T02TD2590E:225b-7: 'gro ba kun gyi rang bzhin 'di yin gyi //
T02TD2590E:225b-8: rang lus 'jig na'ang gzhan don 'dod gyur pa //
T02TD2590E:225b-9: sngon med rmad 'di sa steng 'ga' yi yin //
T02TD2590E:225b-10: lus can yid kyi rang dbang dag gis 'jug /'di dag yongs ye yid kyi dbang gyur yin //
T02TD2590E:225b-11: srid dang rnam grol de nyid rnam rol na //
T02TD2590E:225b-12: bcos bla'ang blo gros nor ldan ci phyir thogs //
T02TD2590E:225b-13: phyi rol gnas kyang de nyid ga la 'gro //
T02TD2590E:225b-14: 'on te gnas kyang yid ni rnam par grol //
T02TD2590E:225b-15: de ltas don du yongs 'dzin don med de //
T02TD2590E:225b-16: yid nyid kun du bya dang byed pa yin //
T02TD2590E:225b-17: dper na da du ra yi mthu yis ni //
T02TD2590E:225b-18: 'ga' yis sa gzhi gser gyi rang bzhin mthong //
T02TD2590E:225b-19: de bzhin yid kyang sngags sogs stobs kyis ni //
T02TD2590E:225b-20: sna tshogs snang ba rnam par dag par 'gyur //
T02TD2590E:225b-21: de la slob dpon theg pa chen po yi //
T02TD2590E:225b-22: zab cing rgya che'i chos ni rtogs pa dang //
T02TD2590E:225b-23: de nyid la ni rtag tu mngon par dga' //
T02TD2590E:225b-24: gsang ba'i de nyid don ni sdud par byed //
T02TD2590E:225b-25: sna tshogs las kyi rlung gis bskyod //
T02TD2590E:225b-26: sdug bsngal dba' klong srid pa'i mtshor //
T02TD2590E:225b-27: 'gro kun nub par mthong nas ni //
T02TD2590E:225b-28: sdug bsngal de nyid dag gis gdungs //
T02TD2590E:225b-29: de nyid gdon par rab dad cing //
T02TD2590E:225b-30: byang chub tu ni nges byas la //
T02TD2590E:225b-31: dpal ldan sgyu 'phrul dra ba yis //
T02TD2590E:225b-32: rgyud gsungs dam tshig rab srung byed //
T02TD2590E:225b-33: phyi dang gsang ba'i dbang yang bskur //
T02TD2590E:225b-34: rnam par mi rtog rnam dag blo //
T02TD2590E:225b-36: phyag rgya stang stabs 'dug stangs dang //
T02TD2590E:225b-37: zlas dang sbyin sreg de bzhin mchod //
T02TD2590E:225b-38: las kyi sbyor dang nye bsdu ba'o //
T02TD2590E:225b-39: de ltar de nyid bcu shes shing //
T02TD2590E:225b-40: dman pa'i sems ni smod byed pa //
T02TD2590E:225b-41: brtan zhing dul la blo gros ldan //
T02TD2590E:225b-42: bzod ldan drang zhing g-yo sgyur med //
T02TD2590E:225b-43: gsang sngags rgyud kyi sbyor ba shes //
T02TD2590E:226a-2: brtser ldan bstan bcos rnams la mkhas //
T02TD2590E:226a-3: spro ba che zhing snying stobs che //
T02TD2590E:226a-4: rag pa zlos shing shin tu bsdams //
T02TD2590E:226a-5: byams dang snying rje dag pa'i bdag //
T02TD2590E:226a-6: sems can kun la ser sna med //
T02TD2590E:226a-7: srid pa'i longs spyod la mi chags //
T02TD2590E:226a-8: sngags kyi tshul la the tshom med //
T02TD2590E:226a-9: rang gi yid ni nyams dga'i gnas //
T02TD2590E:226a-10: phyogs dgar rnam par gnas nas nim //
T02TD2590E:226a-11: sgyu ma rmi lam brag ca dang //
T02TD2590E:226a-12: dril za'i grong khyer lta bur ni //
T02TD2590E:226a-13: 'gro ba thams cad rnam bsgoms la //
T02TD2590E:226a-14: 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni rab tu bsgrub //
T02TD2590E:226a-15: ji skad bshad pa'i yon tan ldan //
T02TD2590E:226a-16: blo dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor bri //
T02TD2590E:226a-17: de nyid slob ma sdud pa dang /
T02TD2590E:226a-18: rgyud rnams ston par 'os pa yin //
T02TD2590E:226a-19: de nyid kyis ni sngags byin pa //
T02TD2590E:226a-20: bya bar ldan la rab tu 'grub //
T02TD2590E:226a-21: slob ma'ang yon tan de 'dra ba'am //
T02TD2590E:226a-22: cung zad dman pas dpal ldan rgyud /
T02TD2590E:226a-24: bla ma la ni gsol ba gdab //
T02TD2590E:226a-25: gzhan du slob dpon slob ma dag //
T02TD2590E:226a-27: 'jig rten gsum gyis dpyas pa dang //
T02TD2590E:226a-29: de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis //
T02TD2590E:226a-30: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mchog //
T02TD2590E:226a-31: dam tshig shes rab can gyis bsrung //
T02TD2590E:226a-32: srog gi phyir yang dor mi bya //
T02TD2590E:226a-34: legs par bris pa nyid rung gi //
T02TD2590E:226a-35: bar ma dor gyur dngos pos ni //
T02TD2590E:226a-36: don med par ni ltung bar 'gyur //
T02TD2590E:226a-37: de la slob dpon slob mas gang gi tshe //
T02TD2590E:226a-38: dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir lan gnyis lan gsum gsol ba btab na /
T02TD2590E:226a-39: de'i tshe dag gis sems can gyi khams 'di dag thams cad bla na med pa'i bde ba chen po'i gnas la rab tu dgod par bya'o zhes lhag pa'i bsam pa bskyed la //
T02TD2590E:226a-40: khyed kyi dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad thams cad tshogs par gyur tam //
T02TD2590E:226a-41: 'on te ma yin zhe slob ma la dri bar bya'o //
T02TD2590E:226a-42: gal te cung zad ni tshogs la cung zad ni ma yin no zhes zer na //
T02TD2590E:226b-0: de'i tshe de'i lte bar nyi ma dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i yi ge h'um gi 'od zer rnams kyis snying gar gnas pa'i @226b yi ge kam las byung ba'i sdig pa mdog gnag cing mi sdug pa sha za lta bur sna'i rtse mor phyung ba dang /
T02TD2590E:226b-1: yi ge h'um de yang snying gar phyin te //
T02TD2590E:226b-2: khro bo rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sku g-yon brkyang bas gnas pa //
T02TD2590E:226b-3: mche ba gtsigs pa gsus pa 'phyang ba /
T02TD2590E:226b-5: thugs kar mche ba dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub ston pa //
T02TD2590E:226b-6: phyag g-yas na mche ba bsnams pa bsams la phyung ste //
T02TD2590E:226b-7: aom badzra yaksha kro dha kh'a da kh'a da //
T02TD2590E:226b-8: sarbba p'a pam aa sya h'um phat ces bya bas des sdig pa thams cad zos nas //
T02TD2590E:226b-9: slob ma de yang yi ge sa las kun du bzang po'i skur rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2590E:226b-10: 'og nas bshad pa'i bdung rtsi thab sbyor gyi tshul gyis de'i sems kyi bgegs phur bus btab la //
T02TD2590E:226b-11: de'i 'od zer 'jigs pa stong phrag gis gdug pa thams cad yang dag par bsregs la//
T02TD2590E:226b-12: slob pa'i sems mngon par bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2590E:226b-13: yi ge aa las byung ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la dbyangs kyi yi ge tha ma las byung ba'i las kyi rdo rje yang der gnas par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:226b-14: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi sngon du bya ba rnams kyi phyir 'bad par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:226b-15: dkyil 'khor yang dag ji lta bar //
T02TD2590E:226b-16: yang dag brtag par su yis nus //
T02TD2590E:226b-17: rang gi lha yis sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2590E:226b-20: dkyil 'khor bri bar 'dod pas rang gi lhag pa'i lha'i sbyor ba bya bar bshad do //
T02TD2590E:226b-21: de la dang por ra zhig bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi gsang sngags rjes su dran par byas la //
T02TD2590E:226b-22: mal nas langs te gdong bkru ba la sogs pa'i bya ba thams cad byas nas// snga dro'i dus su g-yon pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur dang h'um phat ces bya bas bgegs rnams bskrad la //
T02TD2590E:226b-24: stan nang tshangs can la sogs par 'dug la //
T02TD2590E:226b-25: yi ge aa dang h'um gnyis las zla ba dang //
T02TD2590E:226b-26: rdo rje rim bzhin lag pa gnyis su bsams la //
T02TD2590E:226b-27: gung mo dang mdzub mo dang srin lag dang mthe'u chung dang the bo rnams su //
T02TD2590E:226b-28: aom h'um tr'am a'a:kham zhes bya ba'i yi ge lnga rim bzhin du bkod la rdo rje thal mo bcings te //
T02TD2590E:226b-29: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta shan s'i d'a /
T02TD2590E:226b-30: sarbba sa tva na ma sarbba siddha ya /
T02TD2590E:227a-3: aom sva bh'a wa shuddha:sarba dharmm'a:sva bh'a shuddho& ham//
T02TD2590E:227a-4: zhes bzhag la rang gi mgor dgrol bar bya'o //
T02TD2590E:227a-5: de nyid kyis bgegs thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro zhes bsam par bya ste //
T02TD2590E:227a-6: gang 'di ltar chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dag par lhag par mos pa la bgegs rnams 'byung ba 'di ni gnas med cing skabs med de //
T02TD2590E:227a-7: bgegs la sogs pa ni tha mal pa'i rnam par rtog pa las byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2590E:227a-8: gal te de lta na yang yid mgu ba rma gyur na de'i tshe skad cig gis dpal rnam par snang mdzad du bdag nyid rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2590E:227a-9: yi ge h'um las byung ba'i bdud rtsi thab sbyor bgegs ma lus pa rnam par 'jig par byed pa //
T02TD2590E:227a-10: 'bar ba stong phrag gis 'jigs su rung ba //
T02TD2590E:227a-11: lte ba man chad rtse gcig pa lta bu la sku stod khro bo'i dbyibs can la 'og nas bshad pa'i sku mdog dang /
T02TD2590E:227a-12: phyag mtshan dang ldan par bsams la /
T02TD2590E:227a-13: lhag khang pa'i dbus su sngags 'di gdab par bya'o /
T02TD2590E:227a-15: gh'a ta ya gh'a ta ya /
T02TD2590E:227a-17: k'i ka ya k'i la ya /
T02TD2590E:227a-20: badzra k'i la ya badzra dha r'a dzny'a pa ya ti k'a ya /
T02TD2590E:227a-21: b'aka tsitta badzra k'i la ya h'um phat /
T02TD2590E:227a-22: 'og tu sa gzhi'i gtan pa la thug gi bar du bgegs kyi tshogs rnams kun du phur bus btab la //
T02TD2590E:227a-23: der gtogs pa'i 'od zer gyi tshogs kun nas sreg par byed pa'i phur bus bgegs rnams bskrad nas //
T02TD2590E:227a-24: de'i steng du yi ge aam las byung ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i 'od can nyi ma byed ba'i 'od dang mtshungs pa bsams la //
T02TD2590E:227a-25: shar dang nub dang byang dang //
T02TD2590E:227a-26: lho'i phyogs dang mtshams rnams su sngar bshad pa'i phur bu rnam par bsams nas /
T02TD2590E:227a-27: dbus ma'i phur bu'i nyi ma'i gzugs las 'od phyung nas /
T02TD2590E:227a-28: ngos kyi phur bu rnams la de dag phan tshun du 'od kyi tshogs rnams 'dres par gyur bas bla re bzhin du stug por gyur pa /
T02TD2590E:227a-29: 'og tu yang de bzhin du bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:227a-30: yang na de bzhin bzhin du dpal rnam par snang mdzad kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas la /
T02TD2590E:227a-31: h'um las dpal rdo rje h'um mdzad mdun du 'dug ste /
T02TD2590E:227b-0: aom sumbha ni sumbha zhes bya ba @227b la sogs pa'i sngags kyis bka' bsgo pa dang //
T02TD2590E:227b-1: de las lha la sogs pa'i bgegs ma lus pa bkug par gyur nas //
T02TD2590E:227b-2: rang gi phyogs su gnas par rnam par bsams la //
T02TD2590E:227b-3: yi ge h'um las byung ba'i bdud rtsi thab sbyor phyag na thob bsnams nas aom gha gha zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags kyi bka' bsgo zhing khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i khro bo'i phur bus spyi bo nas brdungs pa dang //
T02TD2590E:227b-4: shar phyogs su khyab 'jug dang brgya byin zhes bya ba 'khor lo dang rdo rje thogs pa //
T02TD2590E:227b-6: ser po nam mkha'i lding dang //
T02TD2590E:227b-7: sa srung la zhon pa'i lha gnyis g-yog dang 'khor du bcas pa phur bus btab par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:227b-8: de bzhin du bdud rtsi thab sbyor phyag na rdo rje'i thob bsnams pa dang //
T02TD2590E:227b-9: 'phags pa gshin rje gshed kyis lhor gshin rje lag na dbyug pa thogs pa //
T02TD2590E:227b-10: kha dog ga nag pa ma he la zhon pa 'khor dang bcas pa phur bus btab pa dang //
T02TD2590E:227b-11: stobs po ches nub tu chu lha lag na zhags pa thogs pa zla ba lta bu'i mdog can sbrul la zhon pa'o //
T02TD2590E:227b-12: 'dod pa'i rgyal pos me'i phyogs su me lha gundhe dang bgrang phreng thogs pa kha dog dmar por skyes la zhon pa /
T02TD2590E:227b-13: drang srong rnams kyis bskor ba'o ;
T02TD2590E:227b-14: / khro bo padma mthar byed kyis bden bral gyi phyogs su bden bral mdog char sprin lta nag po //
T02TD2590E:227b-15: ral gri thogs pa yi dags la zhon pa //
T02TD2590E:227b-16: srin po rnams kyis bskor ba'o //
T02TD2590E:227b-17: khro bo chen po dbyug sngon gyis rlung gi phyogs su rlung lha du ba'i mdog can rgyal mtshan thogs pa /
T02TD2590E:227b-18: ri dags sngo bsangs la zhon pa'o //
T02TD2590E:227b-19: khro bo mi g-yo bas dbang ldan kyi phyogs su dbang ldan mdog dkar po mdung rtse gsum pa thogs pa khyu mchog la zhon pa //
T02TD2590E:227b-20: zla ba kham pas dbu rgyan byas pa'o /
T02TD2590E:227b-21: khro bo'i gnod mdzes kyi steng du tshangs pa dang //
T02TD2590E:227b-22: nyi ma dang zla ba la sogs pa mdog ser po dang //
T02TD2590E:227b-28: khro bo rdo rjes 'og gis sa'i 'og tu lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags bzangs ris sku mdog ljang gu lag na ral gri thogs pa shin rta la zhon pa'o //
T02TD2590E:228a-1: po bgegs mthar byed rang nyid kyi byang du lus ngan po dang //
T02TD2590E:228a-2: tshogs kyi bdag po mdog dkar po dang /
T02TD2590E:228a-4: la du lag na thogs pa mi dang byi la la zhon pa /
T02TD2590E:228a-6: bgegs ma lus pa'i bdag por gyur pa /
T02TD2590E:228a-7: phur bus btab pa rab tu bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:228a-8: khro bo 'di dag thams cad kyang lte ba man chad sku smad kyi cha rdo rje'i rtse mo lta bu sku stod khro bo'i dbyibs can la //
T02TD2590E:228a-9: 'og nas bshad pa'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan dang ldan pas khyab 'jug la sogs pa bu dang bu dang chung ma dang //
T02TD2590E:228a-10: 'khor dang cas pa phur bus btab cing khro bo'i 'od zer rnams kyis lus rnam par yang bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:228a-11: de nas yi ge ram las byung ba'i me'i dkyil 'khor gyis kun nas phyogs bcing ba dang /
T02TD2590E:228a-12: yi ge lam las byung ba'i dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor ser pos phyogs kyi nang du mtshams bcing ba dang //
T02TD2590E:228a-13: yi ge h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje bskal pa'i me ltar snang gtams pas //
T02TD2590E:228a-14: phur ba'i nang du kun nas ra ba bya ba dang yi ge ram las byung ba'i rdo rje dra ba rab tu 'bar ba'i me ltar snang zhing 'bar ba'i 'od kyi phreng ba kun du 'khrug pa ra ba'i nang du bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:228a-15: de ltar mdor bsdus pa dang //
T02TD2590E:228a-16: bar ma dang rgya chen po ste /
T02TD2590E:228a-17: bgegs bskrad pa'i cho ga rnams las gang du mngon par 'dod pa de nyid bya'o //
T02TD2590E:228a-18: de nas yi ge hr'i:las lkog mar padma 'dab ma brgyad pa bsams la //
T02TD2590E:228a-19: lce'i padma'i 'dab ma la h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje gnas ngan len thams cad dang bral bas dkar ba bsams te //
T02TD2590E:228a-20: badzra dzi hva zhes bya bas byin gyis brlab snas ras ris la sogs par bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa 'jam dpal dang //
T02TD2590E:228a-21: dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams phyogs thams cad du dmigs la mchog tu gus pas snying gar thal mo sbyar ba bzhag ste //
T02TD2590E:228a-22: pus mo'i lha ngas la bzhag nas /
T02TD2590E:228a-23: phyi'i mchod pa ci 'byor rnams dang //
T02TD2590E:228a-24: aom sarbba bid p'u ra p'u ra /
T02TD2590E:228a-25: aa barta ya aa barta ho zhes bya ba dang //
T02TD2590E:228b-0: yid kyis mchod pa'i sprin rnam pa sna tshogs pas kyang @228b yang dag par mchod la dngos po thams cad phyag byas nas skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa bya'o //
T02TD2590E:228b-1: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi //
T02TD2590E:228b-2: sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags //
T02TD2590E:228b-3: bsod nams kun la rjes yi rang //
T02TD2590E:228b-4: sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung //
T02TD2590E:228b-5: ji ltar dus gsum mgon po dag //
T02TD2590E:228b-6: byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i //
T02TD2590E:228b-7: byang chub sems ni bla med pa'i //
T02TD2590E:228b-8: dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi //
T02TD2590E:228b-9: sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la //
T02TD2590E:228b-10: sdom pa yi ni tshul khrims dang //
T02TD2590E:228b-11: dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang //
T02TD2590E:228b-12: sems can don ni byed pa gsum //
T02TD2590E:228b-13: bdag gis brtan por gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2590E:228b-14: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02TD2590E:228b-15: bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum //
T02TD2590E:228b-16: ded nas brtsams te gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2590E:228b-17: rdo rje rigs mchog chen po yi //
T02TD2590E:228b-18: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang //
T02TD2590E:228b-19: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2590E:228b-20: slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2590E:228b-21: rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi //
T02TD2590E:228b-22: dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la //
T02TD2590E:228b-23: yin re zhing ni lan drug tu //
T02TD2590E:228b-24: sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin //
T02TD2590E:228b-25: byang chub chen po las byung ba'i //
T02TD2590E:228b-26: padma'i rigs chen dag pa la //
T02TD2590E:228b-27: phyi dang gsang ba theg pa gsum //
T02TD2590E:228b-28: dam pa'i chos kyang ma lus gzug las kyi rigs mchog chen po yi //
T02TD2590E:228b-29: sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni //
T02TD2590E:228b-30: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2590E:228b-31: mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi //
T02TD2590E:228b-32: byang chub sems ni bla med pa //
T02TD2590E:228b-33: dam pa bdag gis bskyed bgyi zhing //
T02TD2590E:228b-34: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02TD2590E:228b-35: bdag gis sdom pa ma lus gzung ;
T02TD2590E:228b-36: / ma bsgral ba ni bsgral bar bgyi //
T02TD2590E:228b-37: ma grol ba ni grol bar bgyi //
T02TD2590E:228b-38: dbugs ma phyin pa dbyugs dbyung zhing //
T02TD2590E:228b-40: bdag ni dge ba'i las 'di yis //
T02TD2590E:228b-41: sangs rgyas nyid ni rtogs gyur nas //
T02TD2590E:228b-42: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho mtha' med las ;
T02TD2590E:228b-43: /'gro ba thams cad gdon par bgyi //
T02TD2590E:228b-44: de nas rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la rang gi sngags dang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'i rang gi lha'i rang bzhin 'od kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa rnam par 'phro ba bkod la //
T02TD2590E:229a-0: de nyid yid la zlos shing sems rnam par sbyang bar @229a * //
T02TD2590E:229a-2: dngos po 'di dag ma skyed pas //
T02TD2590E:229a-3: chos rnams med cing chos can med //
T02TD2590E:229a-4: nam mkha' lta bur dmigs med de //
T02TD2590E:229a-7: de'i don la lhag par mos pas thog ma med pa'i dus can gyi phyin ci log gi rtog pa'i bag chags kyi sa bon bsal la //
T02TD2590E:229a-8: 'gro ba 'di dag ma lus pa dang //
T02TD2590E:229a-9: rang gi lus dang rdul phra rab tu rnam par bshig la //
T02TD2590E:229a-10: rdul phra rab rnams kyang ji lta ba bzhin du brtags pa las 'das pas dngos po med pas rang bzhin med par rnam par bsgoms la //
T02TD2590E:229a-11: aom sva bh'a wa shuddha: sarbba dharmm'a:zhes bya ba dang thal mo lan gsum brdabs te //
T02TD2590E:229a-12: rang bzhin gyis dag par mos la /
T02TD2590E:229a-13: rang gi sems gdod ma nas ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa las rnam par grol ba //
T02TD2590E:229a-14: de'i ngo bo nyid du bdag nyid rang gi sngags tsam la yi ge ho dang spel bar bsams la //
T02TD2590E:229a-15: aom las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ji skad du bshad pa'i gzhal yas khang gi dbus na bzhugs pa rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa /
T02TD2590E:229a-16: ma lus pa'i lha rnams kyi 'khor lo'i nang du chud pa mdun du bzhugs par bsams nas /
T02TD2590E:229a-17: aom tsitta pra ti bya dham k'a ro mi zhes brjod do //
T02TD2590E:229a-18: 'di de byang chub bde mchog ste /
T02TD2590E:229a-19: 'di las gzhan pa'i bde mchog med //
T02TD2590E:229a-20: de thob par ni 'dod bzhin du //
T02TD2590E:229a-21: de nas dri za'i sems can 'dra //
T02TD2590E:229a-22: nye bar len pa'i rgyu yis ni //
T02TD2590E:229a-23: phra ba'i sbyor ba nyid 'dzin bzhin //
T02TD2590E:229a-24: rang bdag zhal nas rgya padmar //
T02TD2590E:229a-25: skyes pa'i dus su blo yi zhugs //
T02TD2590E:229a-26: 'dod chags chen po'i me gzugs su //
T02TD2590E:229a-27: ra ni chu skyes su legs sam //
T02TD2590E:229a-28: de yi 'od kyi mthu yis ni //
T02TD2590E:229a-29: skad cig de las mar bum bzhin //
T02TD2590E:229a-30: byang chub sems zhu nyid gyur pa //
T02TD2590E:229a-31: sangs rgyas sras bcas pa yis gzigs //
T02TD2590E:229a-32: shin tu mnyam gzhag sems can bzhin //
T02TD2590E:229a-33: rang gi bdag nyid der dbyer med //
T02TD2590E:229a-34: sdug pa'i snying po dag pa che //
T02TD2590E:229a-35: nam mkha' bzhin du dri ma med //
T02TD2590E:229a-36: gnas ngan len ni kun las grol //
T02TD2590E:229a-37: rnam par rtog la sel ba'i mchog //
T02TD2590E:229b-0: nyon mongs @229b dri ma thams cad dag //
T02TD2590E:229b-1: zla ba lta bur sems tsam pa //
T02TD2590E:229b-2: sems tsam gyur pa'i sems can dang //
T02TD2590E:229b-3: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sras bcas pa //
T02TD2590E:229b-4: de'i 'od lcags kyus bkug pa yis //
T02TD2590E:229b-5: rang gi sems kyis gcig tu bya //
T02TD2590E:229b-6: 'di sangs rgyas kun yon tan dang //
T02TD2590E:229b-7: sa dang pha rol phyin la sogs //
T02TD2590E:229b-8: aa sogs dbyangs yig lta bu ni //
T02TD2590E:229b-9: mkha' dang mnyam par bsgom par bya //
T02TD2590E:229b-10: rgyun ltar rang phyogs nas 'ongs te //
T02TD2590E:229b-11: dkar ba'i tshul gyis rnam par zhugs //
T02TD2590E:229b-12: bsod nams tshogs kyis nus pa nyis //
T02TD2590E:229b-13: sems tsam du ni rnam par bsam //
T02TD2590E:229b-14: 'di ltar snying rjes bskul ba ni //
T02TD2590E:229b-15: sa 'og bar du bsam par bya //
T02TD2590E:229b-16: kye ma sems can 'khor ba la //
T02TD2590E:229b-17: dga' bas sdug bsngal nyid du 'gyur //
T02TD2590E:229b-18: shes rab thabs kyis bdag nyid bral //
T02TD2590E:229b-19: yun ring dus su yang yang 'khor //
T02TD2590E:229b-20: de rnams rdzogs par byang chub phyir //
T02TD2590E:229b-21: 'jam gsung rang nyid gyur par bya //
T02TD2590E:229b-22: aom bho dhi tsitta autpala da y'a mi //
T02TD2590E:229b-23: de las byung ba'i 'od tshogs las //
T02TD2590E:229b-24: ka sogs yi ge rgyas pa yis //
T02TD2590E:229b-25: rim gyis nye bar 'phel ba'i sems //
T02TD2590E:229b-26: sems can rjes su 'dzin byed cing //
T02TD2590E:229b-27: snying rje rjes chags las byung ba //
T02TD2590E:229b-28: byang chub sems kyi zla dkyil 'khor //
T02TD2590E:229b-29: dge ba'i chos kyis yang dag rdzogs ;
T02TD2590E:229b-30: / nyon mongs thams cad des 'joms yin //
T02TD2590E:229b-31: sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur sogs //
T02TD2590E:229b-32: sna tshogs gos dang rgyan ldan pa'i //
T02TD2590E:229b-33: kun du bzang po'i bdag nyid du //
T02TD2590E:229b-34: mthong nas rang la yig gsum dgod //
T02TD2590E:229b-35: spyi bor 'khor lo la gnas pa'i //
T02TD2590E:229b-36: gi ge aom ni kha dog ser//
T02TD2590E:229b-37: khar ni padma'i lte ba yi //
T02TD2590E:229b-38: dbus nas aa ni kha dog dkar //
T02TD2590E:229b-39: snying gar rdo rje de yi ni //
T02TD2590E:229b-40: lte ba la gnas yi ge h'um //
T02TD2590E:229b-41: sngon po 'od zer tshogs rnams ni //
T02TD2590E:229b-42: rnam par 'phro ba dgod par bya //
T02TD2590E:229b-43: rdo rje'i yi ge de rnams las //
T02TD2590E:229b-44: 'od kyi sprin rnams spros nas ni //
T02TD2590E:229b-45: sems can khams kun sbyang la sogs //
T02TD2590E:229b-47: aom las byung ba'i sku rdo rje'i //
T02TD2590E:229b-48: sprin las sku yi rdo rje ni /
T02TD2590E:229b-49: pam byung padma la bzhugs pa //
T02TD2590E:229b-50: dag pa'i shel ltar dri ma med //
T02TD2590E:229b-52: zhal gsum rnam pa'i mchog kun ldan //
T02TD2590E:230a-2: sprin las gsung gi rdo rje'i lcer //
T02TD2590E:230a-3: h'um las byung ba'i thugs rdo rjes //
T02TD2590E:230a-4: sprin las thugs kyi rdo rje ni //
T02TD2590E:230a-5: ting 'dzin byin rlabs snying ga yi //
T02TD2590E:230a-6: zla bar rnam par bsam par bya //
T02TD2590E:230a-7: de ltar yig gsum byin rlabs lus //
T02TD2590E:230a-8: snying gar gnas pa'i zla ba'i thugs //
T02TD2590E:230a-9: der ni ye shes tshogs kyi ni //
T02TD2590E:230a-11: de las byung ba'i autpala ni //
T02TD2590E:230a-13: de bus ye shes sems dpa' ni //
T02TD2590E:230a-14: dgyes bskyed bya ba la bzhugs //
T02TD2590E:230a-15: de las byung ba'i 'od sprin las //
T02TD2590E:230a-16: sangs rgyas sprin las sngags pas spro //
T02TD2590E:230a-17: byang chub sems ni yang dag bskyed //
T02TD2590E:230a-18: bde ba che la nges sbyar bas //
T02TD2590E:230a-19: 'jig rten ma lus legs sbyangs te //
T02TD2590E:230a-20: de bsdus nas ni gzhug pa bya //
T02TD2590E:230a-21: de kun yongs su gyur pa las //
T02TD2590E:230a-23: mgon po sangs rgyas kun gyis dngos //
T02TD2590E:230a-24: dngos po kun gyi srang bzhin can //
T02TD2590E:230a-25: srid pa sgyu ma ltar mkhyen pas //
T02TD2590E:230a-26: gzhon nu'i sku mdog gur kum 'dra //
T02TD2590E:230a-28: sgeg dang bcas pa'i nyams kyis rgyas //
T02TD2590E:230a-29: sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas nas ni //
T02TD2590E:230a-30: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dag la bzhugs//
T02TD2590E:230a-31: sna tshogs rin chen 'dab ma bzang //
T02TD2590E:230a-32: padma'i rgyal po gdan du bya //
T02TD2590E:230a-33: sngo dang ser dang dkar po che //
T02TD2590E:230a-34: zhal gsum gyis ni rnam par mdzes //
T02TD2590E:230a-35: dpa' bo spyan gsum phyag drug pa //
T02TD2590E:230a-36: mchog tu dga' bas shin tu mdzes //
T02TD2590E:230a-37: mchog sbyin ral gri mda' rnams ni //
T02TD2590E:230a-38: g-yas pa'i phyag na bsnams par mdzad //
T02TD2590E:230a-39: g-yon na shes rab pha rol phyin //
T02TD2590E:230a-40: autpala sngo dang gzhu nyid do //
T02TD2590E:230a-41: sangs rgyas sprin chen spros pa yis //
T02TD2590E:230a-42: nam mkha' gtos kun khyab par mdzad //
T02TD2590E:230a-43: sna tshogs me tog gis cher mdzes //
T02TD2590E:230a-44: zur phud gsum gyis rnam par brgyan //
T02TD2590E:230a-45: thog ma dbus dang mtha' las grol //
T02TD2590E:230a-46: byis pa'i rgyan gyis nye bar mdzes //
T02TD2590E:230a-47: byams dang thugs rje sogs rgyu mthun //
T02TD2590E:230a-48: chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can //
T02TD2590E:230a-49: shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo nyid //
T02TD2590E:230a-50: de ltar mkhas pas bdag nyid bsgom //
T02TD2590E:230a-51: de nas ma h'a sa ma ya satva ham zhes bya ba dang //
T02TD2590E:230b-1: rang gi rgyud du gtogs pa'i sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang //
T02TD2590E:230b-2: nam mkha' rnams la spyan ma dang /
T02TD2590E:230b-5: sgrol ma dang nam mkha' rdo rje lam mam pam tam aam zhes bya ba'i sa bon rnams las rim bzhin du dgod par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:230b-10: rnam par shes pa'i phung po la rnam par snang mdzad dang //
T02TD2590E:230b-14: me bskyod pa bhr'um a'am dzr'i kham h'um zhes bya bas so //
T02TD2590E:230b-20: yid kyi skye mched rnams la //
T02TD2590E:230b-21: kshim dzram kham gam shkam sam zhes bya ba las sa'i snying po dang /
T02TD2590E:230b-25: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /
T02TD2590E:230b-31: reg bya dang chos kyi skye mched rnams la //
T02TD2590E:230b-32: dza:h'um bam ho:kham ram zhes bya bas gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa lha mo rnams so //
T02TD2590E:230b-38: aam h'um tr'am aam kham zhes bya bas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa dgod do //
T02TD2590E:230b-39: de nas spyi bor gnas pa'i aom las byung ba'i sku rdo rje rab tu dga' ba'i bde bas rnam par rmongs par bsams la //
T02TD2590E:230b-40: lus thams cad nas yang dag par spros te //
T02TD2590E:230b-41: mdun du phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba sras dang bcas par rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2590E:230b-43: de'i phyag gi zhags pas drangs la rang gi lus la bcug stem /
T02TD2590E:230b-44: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zhu bar gyur pa dang /
T02TD2590E:230b-45: de'i bdag nyid can du rang gi lus la sku rdo rje'i ngo bo nyid du rnam par bsams la //
T02TD2590E:230b-47: aom dzi na dzika aa dhi ti shtha sva m'am /
T02TD2590E:230b-48: rdo rje bsdams pa las mthe bo gnyid bsgreng ste /
T02TD2590E:230b-49: spyi bor gzhag pa ni sku byin gyis rlob par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2590E:230b-50: de nas sangs rgyas thams cad zhugs nas byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02TD2590E:231a-0: mtshan dang dpe byed kyis bdag nyid rnam par brgyan par lhag par mos par @231a * //
T02TD2590E:231a-2: / de bzhin du lkog mar gnas pa'i yi ge a'a: las byung ba'i gsung gi rdo rje bsams la /
T02TD2590E:231a-3: gos dkar mo yang dag par spros te snga ma bzhin du de zhugs pas rang gi lce gsung rdo rje'i ngo bo nyid du byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:231a-4: aom a'a ro li ka aa dhi tishtha sva m'am /
T02TD2590E:231a-5: de nyid las g-yon pa'i mthe bo nang du bcug ste /
T02TD2590E:231a-6: g-yas pa bsgreng ba ni gsung byin gyis brlab pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2590E:231a-7: de nas zla ba kha ma pa lta bu chos thams cad kyi gnas su gyur par dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi lce mos par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:231a-8: de bzhin du snying gar gnas pa'i yi ga h'um las byung ba'i thugs rdo rjer bsams la de bzhin du m'a ma ka'i spro ba sngon du 'gro bas bcug la /
T02TD2590E:231a-9: rang gi sems thugs rdo rje'i ngo bo nyid du byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:231a-10: aom badzra dhrika aa dhi tishtha sva m'am /
T02TD2590E:231a-11: de nyid la mthe bo g-yas pa nang du bcug la /
T02TD2590E:231a-12: g-yon pa bsgred [*bsgreng?] ba ni thugs byin gyis brlab pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2590E:231a-13: de nas h'um las byung ba'i snying gi padma'i zla ba chos 'byung ba'i phyag rgyas mtshan pa dang bcas pa'i 'od kyi phred ba kun du 'phro bar bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:231a-16: dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la snga ma bzhin bu snying ga la sogs par rdo rje la sogs pa bsams te /
T02TD2590E:231a-17: de dang sa ma ya sa tva aa dhi tishtha sva m'am zhes bya ba dang byin gyis brlabs la rang gi sngags brjod nas sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjes kyang 'jam pa'i rdo rjer bdag nyid bsgom par bya zhing /
T02TD2590E:231a-18: manydzu badzro& ham zhes bya ba'i nga rgyal bya'o ;
T02TD2590E:231a-19: / de nas de bzhin du phyag rgya chen pos gnas la /
T02TD2590E:231a-20: sa ma ya aa: zhes brjod de /
T02TD2590E:231a-21: mdun du pam las byung ba'i padma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i aom mu: aa: zhes bya ba las autpala rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2590E:231a-22: chos bdag med pa'i dam tshig gi nang du zhugs te //
T02TD2590E:231a-23: manydzu badzro& ham zhes bya ba'i nga rgyal sngon du 'gro ba dang /
T02TD2590E:231a-24: 'jam pa'i rdo rjer bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:231a-25: de nas de'i 'og tu sngags dang phyag rgya 'di rnams kyis ye shes sems dpa' bkug cing bcug la bcings te dbang du bya'o //
T02TD2590E:231a-26: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis las mdzub mo lcags kyu bcid ba ni /
T02TD2590E:231b-0: mthe @231b chung las te lcags kyu che //
T02TD2590E:231b-1: mkhrig ma mdud pa mdzub gnyis gdub //
T02TD2590E:231b-2: rgyab gnyis kyang ni bsnyams te mnan //
T02TD2590E:231b-4: aom badzra aam gu sha dza: h'um /
T02TD2590E:231b-5: aom badzra p'a sha h'um h'um /
T02TD2590E:231b-6: aom badzra spho ta h'um bam /
T02TD2590E:231b-7: aom badzra a'a we sha h'um ho: zhes bya ba'i sngags so //
T02TD2590E:231b-8: aom ai mra ta kunta li bibhna nta ka h'um /
T02TD2590E:231b-9: 'di'i phyag rgya ni bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi sku bsams la /
T02TD2590E:231b-10: lag pa gnyis kyis sor mo'i rtse mo gsum pa lta bur brkyang la /
T02TD2590E:231b-11: dpung pa'i rtsar khros pas bzhag na /
T02TD2590E:231b-12: mtshams bcing ba byas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2590E:231b-13: de bzhin du phyogs bcing ba la sogs pa yang bya ste /
T02TD2590E:231b-14: spe la ba'i sbyor bas phyogs bcing ba dang /
T02TD2590E:231b-15: ra ba dang dra ba la sogs kyang bya ste /
T02TD2590E:231b-16: spel ba'i sbyor bas phyogs bcing ba dang /
T02TD2590E:231b-17: ra ba dang dra ba la sogs pa yang bsrung ba'i don du bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:231b-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das la pa las byung ba'i padma'i gdan /
T02TD2590E:231b-19: aom ka ma la h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis bstabs la /
T02TD2590E:231b-20: thal mo kha phye ba dang /
T02TD2590E:231b-21: rang gi sngags kyis mchod yon phul te /
T02TD2590E:231b-22: aom pra ba ra satk'a ram pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a zhes bya ba'i sngags dang /
T02TD2590E:231b-23: g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyi mthe bo dang /
T02TD2590E:231b-24: mdzub mo sbyar bas me tog blangs la zhabs ba sil dbul te /
T02TD2590E:231b-25: sor mo lhag ma rnams zlum po'i rnam pas brkyang bas phyag rgyas kyang zhabs bsil phul la dam tshig bstan par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:231b-26: de la dam tshig ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2590E:231b-27: thal mo khong stong du sbyar te mdzub mo gnyis kyis srin lag gnyis kyi sen mo mnan nas /
T02TD2590E:231b-28: autpa la kha phye ba lta bur bzhag la /
T02TD2590E:231b-29: mgon po 'jam pa'i dbyangs la bskul bar bya zhing 'di bcings la /
T02TD2590E:231b-30: rdo rje lta bas blta bar bya'o //
T02TD2590E:231b-31: aom mu dri shya ho: zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2590E:231b-32: yang dag par bskul la de nyid la dza: h'um bam ho: zhes brjod de /
T02TD2590E:231b-33: rang gi lus la bcom ldan 'das dgug pa dang /
T02TD2590E:231b-36: dbang du bya ba byas la sam ya stvam zhes brjod de /
T02TD2590E:231b-37: rgyab tu zla ba bsams la dza: h'um bam ho: sam ya stvam /
T02TD2590E:231b-38: aom mu: zhes lan gsum brjod de ye shes sems dpa' dang /
T02TD2590E:231b-39: lhan cig gcig tu bsgoms la /
T02TD2590E:231b-40: rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:232a-0: de nas phyag rgya chen pos gnas @232a * //
T02TD2590E:232a-1: la lha thams cad kyi gnas su ma ya aa zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2590E:232a-2: ci rigs par zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang /
T02TD2590E:232a-3: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rang gi lus la rnam par bkod la /
T02TD2590E:232a-4: rang gi snying pos spyi gtsug gi dbus su bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad /
T02TD2590E:232a-7: lkog mar 'od dpag tu med pa /
T02TD2590E:232a-8: spyi bor don yod grub pa /
T02TD2590E:232a-10: mi bskyod pa'i g-yon logs su m'a ma k'i /
T02TD2590E:232a-11: 'od dpag tu med pa'i g-yon logs su gos dkar mo /
T02TD2590E:232a-12: don yod par grub pa'i g-yon logs su sgrol ma ;
T02TD2590E:232a-13: mi bskyod pa la g-yas logs su rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa bzhi'o //
T02TD2590E:232a-14: mi bskyod pa'i rgyab tu skul byed ma /
T02TD2590E:232a-15: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi g-yon logs su rin chen sgrol ma /
T02TD2590E:232a-16: 'od dpag tu med pa'i rgyab tu khro gnyer can /
T02TD2590E:232a-17: don yod par grub pa'i rgyab tu rdo rje lu gu rgyud /
T02TD2590E:232a-19: smin mtshams su gzhan gyis mi thub pa /
T02TD2590E:232a-21: gsang bar bdud rtsi thab spyor /
T02TD2590E:232a-22: dpral pa'i steng du 'phags pa mi g-yo ba /
T02TD2590E:232a-23: mi bskyod pa'i mdun du 'dod pa'i rgyal po'o //
T02TD2590E:232a-24: dpung pa gnyis la dbyig sngon /
T02TD2590E:232a-25: rkang pa gnyis la stobs po che ;
T02TD2590E:232a-26: rnam par snang mdzad kyi mdun du gnod mdzes rgyal po /
T02TD2590E:232a-27: rkang pa gnyis kyi 'og tu rdo rje sa 'og / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad la byams pa la sogs /
T02TD2590E:232a-28: spyi gtsug gi stang du 'khor los sgyur ba /
T02TD2590E:232a-29: brum las byung ba rin po che'i ri la bzhugs pa padma dang /
T02TD2590E:232a-30: rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02TD2590E:232a-33: phyag la sogs pa rnam par snang mdzad dang 'dra ba /
T02TD2590E:232a-34: 'od zer lnga pa'i gtsug tor gyi 'khor lo'i phreng ba dang /
T02TD2590E:232a-35: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dmar po 'bar ba dang bcas pa'i phreng ba can /
T02TD2590E:232a-36: rin po che'i cod pan mnga' ba /
T02TD2590E:232a-37: spyan la sogs pa'i lha mo rin po che dang /
T02TD2590E:232a-40: autpa la rin po che bzhin du bsnams pa /
T02TD2590E:232a-41: gnyis gnyis kyis logs gnyis su mdzes par byas par rang gi snying po nyid kyis bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:232a-42: de nas rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la /
T02TD2590E:232a-43: lag ngar gnyis rdo rje bcing bar bsnol te /
T02TD2590E:232b-0: @232b mdzub mo gnyis lcags kyur byas la /
T02TD2590E:232b-2: gung mo gnyis kyis se gol brdebs shing dza: h'um bam ho: zhes brjod la /
T02TD2590E:232b-3: rang gi lus la rnam par snang mdzad la sogs par yid kyis rnam par bsams pa legs so zhes bya ba'i sbyor bas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa bkug nas bcug ste /
T02TD2590E:232b-4: bcings la dbang du byas nas aom a'a: h'um zhes bya ba'i yi ge gsum rnams par bkod pa sngon du 'gro bas snga ma bzhin du rang gi phyag rgya byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2590E:232b-5: yi ge brgya pas brtan par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:232b-6: aom badzra satva sa ma ya /
T02TD2590E:232b-8: badzra satva tve no pa tishtha dri dho me bha ba /
T02TD2590E:232b-9: su to shyo me bha ba /
T02TD2590E:232b-10: aa nu rakto me bha ba /
T02TD2590E:232b-11: su po shyo me bha pa /
T02TD2590E:232b-13: sarbba karmma su tsa me tsittam shre ya: ku ru h'um /
T02TD2590E:232b-14: ha ha ha ha ho: bha ga w'ana sarbba ta th'a ga ta badzra m'a me munytsa /
T02TD2590E:232b-15: badzr'i bha ba ma h'a sa ma ya satva a'a:/
T02TD2590E:232b-18: spyi bo rnams su rdo rje sems ma la sogs pas byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
T02TD2590E:232b-19: rdo rje bsdams pa las gung mo gnyis sbyar la /
T02TD2590E:232b-20: aom satva badzri aa dhi tishtha sva m'am h'um /
T02TD2590E:232b-21: de nyid las gung mo'i tshigs dbus ma bcag pa ni rin po che ste /
T02TD2590E:232b-22: aom ratna badzri aa dhi tishtha sva m'am h'um /
T02TD2590E:232b-23: de nyid las gung mo padma'i 'dab ma ltar bya'o //
T02TD2590E:232b-24: aom dha rmma badzri aa dhi tishtha sva m'am h'um /
T02TD2590E:232b-25: de nyid las gung mo sbyar ba'i rtse mo bcag pa ni ral gri'o //
T02TD2590E:232b-26: aom karmma badzri aa dhi tishtha sva m'am h'um /
T02TD2590E:232b-27: gnas 'di dag tu rdo rje dang rin po che dang padma dang /
T02TD2590E:232b-28: ral gri nang du chud pa'i rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams byin gyis brlab par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:232b-29: de nas yang dbang bskur ba'i phyir gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
T02TD2590E:232b-30: rdo rje can gyis 'gro bskyab phyir //
T02TD2590E:232b-31: sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskur ba //
T02TD2590E:232b-32: yon tan 'byung gnas ji ltar stsal //
T02TD2590E:232b-33: de bzhin ded ni bdag la stsol //
T02TD2590E:232b-34: de nas nam mkha'i khongs thams cad til gyi gang bu bzhin du kun du gang ba'i rig pa'i lha mo de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi bdud rtsis gang ba'i bum pa thogs shing mchod pa'i yo byad dang ldan pa rnams byon nas mi bskyod pa'i cod pa na gyi sbyor bas rtse bran gyi rtsa bar bzhag pas /
T02TD2590E:233a-1: zhing 'di skad du gsung bar bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:233a-2: dbang bskur ba yi rdo rje che //
T02TD2590E:233a-3: khams gsum pas ni phyag byas pa //
T02TD2590E:233a-4: gsang ba gsum gyi gnas las byung //
T02TD2590E:233a-5: sangs rgyas kun gyis sbyin par bya //
T02TD2590E:233a-6: de nas dbang bskur ba de phyag rgya 'di dag gis brtan par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:233a-8: mthe bo gnyis ni bsnol byas la //
T02TD2590E:233a-9: mdzub mo'i rtse mo bkug pas ni //
T02TD2590E:233a-10: gung mo mnyam pa'i tshigs su sbyar //
T02TD2590E:233a-11: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mor bshad //
T02TD2590E:233a-12: sngags ni aom badzra dh'a tv'i shva ri h'um /
T02TD2590E:233a-13: badzri ni aa bhi shinytsa m'am /
T02TD2590E:233a-14: de nyid gung mo rdo rjer bya //
T02TD2590E:233a-16: gung mo gnyis ni nor bur bya //
T02TD2590E:233a-18: padma srin lag mthe'u chung gung /
T02TD2590E:233a-20: lag pa'i sor mo rab tu brkyang //
T02TD2590E:233a-22: aa bhi shinytsa m'am zhes bya ba ni thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2590E:233a-23: phyag rgya 'di dag kyang spyi bo dang /
T02TD2590E:233a-25: rna ba g-yas pa'i ltag dang mgo'i rgyab dang /
T02TD2590E:233a-26: rna ba g-yon pa'i ltag gi gnas rnams su rim pa bzhin du sbyar te /
T02TD2590E:233a-27: dpag tu med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lnga po bsdus pa'i ngo bo nyid byang chub kyi sems dam pa rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa nyid cod pan du bsam par bya'o ;
T02TD2590E:233a-28: / la la ni rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya dag gis dbang bskur bar 'dod do //
T02TD2590E:233a-29: de nas rdo rje khu tshur gnyis mdun du mdud pa lta bus bcing bar bya zhing rgyab tu yang de bzhin du mdud la /
T02TD2590E:233a-30: bsgyings pa dang bcas pas mtha' ma la sogs pa nas dgrol bas /
T02TD2590E:233a-31: rna ba gnyis kyi dar dbyangs 'phyang ba byas la /
T02TD2590E:233a-32: mthar thal mo mnyam pas mnyes par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:233a-34: yang cod pan gyi steng du kam ham kam zhes bya ba bkod la /
T02TD2590E:233a-35: aom tum zhes bya bas go bgos te /
T02TD2590E:233a-36: rdo rje kha tshur snying gar mdud pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bskor la /
T02TD2590E:233a-38: yang de bzhin du snying gar ro //
T02TD2590E:233a-39: de nas nu ma'i bar dang yang snying gar ro //
T02TD2590E:233a-42: mgo bor de bzhin du dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba bcings pa'i mdud pa'i sbyor ba mtha' ma la sogs pa sor mo thams cad bkrol la /
T02TD2590E:233b-0: dar dpyangs @233b kyi tshul du byas la mthar mnyam pa'i thal mos mnyes par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:233b-1: de nas rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya nyid snying ga la sogs par bkrol bas rang gi snying po ni snying gar dgod par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:233b-2: nye ba'i snying po la sogs par bsam pas ni snying ga'i gong du'o //
T02TD2590E:233b-3: spyi bor bsam pas ni mgo bor ro //
T02TD2590E:233b-4: spyi gtsug la sogs par bsam pas ni spyi gtsug tu'o //
T02TD2590E:233b-5: go cha la sogs par bsam pas ni nu ma'i bar du'o //
T02TD2590E:233b-6: mtshon cha la sogs par bsam pas ni lag pa g-yas par ro //
T02TD2590E:233b-7: nye ba'i snying po la sogs par bsam pas ni lag pa g-yon du'o //
T02TD2590E:233b-8: lcags mda' la sogs par bsam pas ni phrag pa g-yas su'o //
T02TD2590E:233b-9: mda'i dra ba la sogs par bsam pas ni phrag pa g-yon du'o //
T02TD2590E:233b-10: mtshon cha thams cad du bsam pas ni lus thams cad du dgod par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:233b-11: de nas sgeg mo la sogs pas bdag nyid yang dag par mchod de ;
T02TD2590E:233b-12: rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2590E:233b-13: bdag po'i dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2590E:233b-14: mi gi dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2590E:233b-15: dngos grub kyi rdo rje'i brtul zhugs rnams de'i sngags nyid kyis blang bar bya ste /
T02TD2590E:233b-16: bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje bdag gi slob dpon du gyur nas /
T02TD2590E:233b-17: thams cad mdzad do zhes lhag par mos par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:233b-18: sangs rgyas rdo rje'i dbang bskur bas /
T02TD2590E:233b-19: deng khyod bdag ni bskur bar 'gyur //
T02TD2590E:233b-20: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad nyid //
T02TD2590E:233b-21: rab tu grub phyir rdo rje long //
T02TD2590E:233b-22: aom badzra aa dhi pa ti stvam /
T02TD2590E:233b-24: tishtha badzra sa ma ya stvam /
T02TD2590E:233b-25: de nas rdo rje dril bu dang bcas par spyi bor bzhag la /
T02TD2590E:233b-26: ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur te /
T02TD2590E:233b-29: badzra n'a ma aa bhi she ka ta /
T02TD2590E:233b-30: kye dpal mchog sbyin rdo rje zhes bya ba /
T02TD2590E:233b-31: de nas rdo rje'i brtul zhugs ni //
T02TD2590E:233b-32: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad de //
T02TD2590E:233b-33: rdo rje sems dpa'i lag na gnas /
T02TD2590E:233b-34: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcad //
T02TD2590E:233b-35: phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan //
T02TD2590E:233b-36: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta siddhi badzra sam ya tishtha ae sha stvam /
T02TD2590E:233b-37: dha ra mi badzra satva hi hi hi hi hi h'um zhes bya ba'i glu blang bar bya'o //
T02TD2590E:233b-38: de'i 'og tu dam tshig gsum sbyin pa bya ste /
T02TD2590E:234a-0: h'um las rdo rje mi bskyod pa'i ngo bo de bzhin @234a * //
T02TD2590E:234a-1: gshegs pa thams cad kyi mi phyed pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin du rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2590E:234a-2: de kho na nyid kyis gzung bar bya ste /
T02TD2590E:234a-3: thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02TD2590E:234a-4: rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che //
T02TD2590E:234a-5: kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid //
T02TD2590E:234a-6: rdo rje bsnyems pa bdag po'i bdag / dang po'i mchog gi skyes bu ni //
T02TD2590E:234a-7: bcom ldan 'das so zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid kyis ni rdo rje'o //
T02TD2590E:234a-8: 'di ni sangs rgyas de kun gyi //
T02TD2590E:234a-9: shes rab sgra yis rjes 'gror bshad //
T02TD2590E:234a-10: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //
T02TD2590E:234a-11: byang chub mchog tu rgyal ba bzhed //
T02TD2590E:234a-13: aa:'i sa bon las byung ba 'dril bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung dbyangs kyi bdag nyid can /
T02TD2590E:234a-14: shes rab kyi ngo bo nyid kyi dril bu yang dag par blangs la /
T02TD2590E:234a-15: srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag / ngo bo nyid kyis dngos med byas //
T02TD2590E:234a-16: ngo bo nyid dag sems dpa' mchog / srid pa mchog ni byed par 'gyur //
T02TD2590E:234a-19: de nas srid pa yongs su dag pa'i thabs rtog pa thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po rtag tu bsten par bya ste //
T02TD2590E:234a-20: srid pa'i bde ba shin tu chung //
T02TD2590E:234a-21: sdug bsngal chen po dag bya'i phyir //
T02TD2590E:234a-22: shin tu bde ba dam pa'i thabs //
T02TD2590E:234a-23: dam tshig 'di ni rtag tu srungs //
T02TD2590E:234a-24: 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad ni //
T02TD2590E:234a-25: ci 'dod par ni bsten bzhin du //
T02TD2590E:234a-26: rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2590E:234a-27: bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya //
T02TD2590E:234a-28: ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni //
T02TD2590E:234a-29: mkhas mchog 'dug bar gyur pa'i tshe //
T02TD2590E:234a-30: de srid mtshungs med sems can don //
T02TD2590E:234a-31: mya ngan mi mnga' byed par nus //
T02TD2590E:234a-32: shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i thabs //
T02TD2590E:234a-33: bsod nams byin rlabs kyis bsgrubs pa //
T02TD2590E:234a-34: dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug grub //
T02TD2590E:234a-35: sems can don rnams brtan par byed //
T02TD2590E:234a-36: yid kyi gzugs ni brtan phyir ro //
T02TD2590E:234a-37: phyag rgya dam tshig yin par bshad //
T02TD2590E:234a-38: gang gis gzugs kun brtan gyur pa //
T02TD2590E:234a-39: des na phyag rgya rab tu bsgrags //
T02TD2590E:234a-41: dam tshig gis sku la sogs pa'i gsang ba'i bdag nyid can gyi phyag rgyar byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:234b-0: de nas @234b dam tshig gsum gyi glu'i mchod pa bya ste /
T02TD2590E:234b-1: aom man mkha' las byung mtshan ldan phyir //
T02TD2590E:234b-2: thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog / sems dpa' rdo rje che rang bzhin //
T02TD2590E:234b-3: rdo rje sems dpar bdag grub mdzod //
T02TD2590E:234b-4: kun mchog dngos grub chen po ste //
T02TD2590E:234b-5: dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha ;
T02TD2590E:234b-6: ; rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal //
T02TD2590E:234b-7: mi 'gyur mchog tu bdag grub mdzod //
T02TD2590E:234b-8: nyes pa mi mnga' rtag pa'ang khyod //
T02TD2590E:234b-9: 'dod chags kun gyi rjes su brnyes //
T02TD2590E:234b-10: 'dod chags chen po dga' ba che //
T02TD2590E:234b-11: bcom ldan de nyid kyis grub mdzod //
T02TD2590E:234b-12: shin tu dag pa kun gyi mchog / gdod nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD2590E:234b-13: kun du bzang po'i kun bdag nyid //
T02TD2590E:234b-14: byang chub sems dpar bdag grub mdzod //
T02TD2590E:234b-15: dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog / dbang phyug che sogs phyag rgya yis //
T02TD2590E:234b-16: grub pa'i rdo rje cher bstod pas //
T02TD2590E:234b-17: rdo rje bsnyems bdag bdag mdzod cig / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02TD2590E:234b-18: aom sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham /
T02TD2590E:234b-19: aom sarbba sa mo& ham zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2590E:234b-21: rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje autpa la'i dbus su rang gi sngags rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2590E:234b-22: de nyid yid la zlos shing ba sam par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:234b-23: de nas de bzhin du phyag rgya chen pos gnas la g-yon pa'i mig tu ta las zla ba bya /
T02TD2590E:234b-24: g-yas par ma bkod nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ba skyed /
T02TD2590E:234b-25: h'um gis mig 'bras bskal pa'i me lta bu /
T02TD2590E:234b-26: yid kyis nam mkha'i phyogs su gnas par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:234b-27: snod kyi 'jig rten gyi 'og tu yi ge h'um de las byung ba'i rdo rje rtse lnga ba yi ge bam dbus su bkod pa rdo rje me'i 'od dang mnyam pas dus mtha'i rlung gis spar ba'i bskal ba sreg pa'i gzugs can lta bu'i rdo rje des sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad thal bar byas par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:234b-28: de nas nam mkha'i phyogs su stong gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi tshad tsam gyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la yi ge kham gnas pa de las bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug mas kun du 'khyud pa byung bas //
T02TD2590E:234b-29: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyun rnams kyis kun du bsreg pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bkrus nas /
T02TD2590E:235a-1: rlabs 'khrug pa'o ma'i rgya mtsho lta bur kun du bkang nas gnas so //
T02TD2590E:235a-2: de nas de'i dbus su yi ge ras rang gi 'od kyis 'o ma'i rgya mtsho bskol ba dang /
T02TD2590E:235a-3: padma chen po'i gzugs la padma mtha' yas pas yongs su bskor bar bsams nas /
T02TD2590E:235a-4: de'i lte bar gser gyi mdog can gyi ra ba bsams la /
T02TD2590E:235a-5: der yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad nam mkha'i phyogs nas byon te bzhugs so //
T02TD2590E:235a-6: de nas h'um sum h'um zhes bya ba ste /
T02TD2590E:235a-7: de thams cad yongs su gyur pa las ri'i rgyal po ri rab zur bzhi pa rin po che sna bzhi'i rang bzhin can /
T02TD2590E:235a-10: gser gyi ri bdun la sogs pas yongs su bskor bar bsams la /
T02TD2590E:235a-11: aom badzra dri dho me bha ba raksha sarbam sv'a h'a zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2590E:235a-12: rdo rje bsdams pa brkyang ste /
T02TD2590E:235a-13: sa la bzhag pas byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2590E:235a-14: de lta bu gtsang ma'i gnas kyi gnas rnam pa kun du rab tu gnas pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis nges par bsten pa /
T02TD2590E:235a-16: yi ge bhr'um las gzhal yas khang //
T02TD2590E:235a-17: zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02TD2590E:235a-18: rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan //
T02TD2590E:235a-19: dril bu dang ni ba dan sogs //
T02TD2590E:235a-20: sgo khyud kyis ni nye bar mdzes //
T02TD2590E:235a-21: grva dang mtshams rnams thams cad du ;
T02TD2590E:235a-22: / rdo rje rin chen dag gis spras //
T02TD2590E:235a-23: dra ba dra phyed yang dag ldan //
T02TD2590E:235a-24: zla ba nyi ma sogs kyis brgyan //
T02TD2590E:235a-25: sna tshogs pa yi bla re bres //
T02TD2590E:235a-26: gos dang phreng ba sna tshogs ldan //
T02TD2590E:235a-27: mtshams su zla phyed rin chen mchog / rdo rje mdzes pas rnam par brgyan //
T02TD2590E:235a-28: thig bzhi yongs su btab pa dang //
T02TD2590E:235a-29: kha khyer gyis ni yongs su bskor //
T02TD2590E:235a-30: de yi dbus su 'khor lo gzhan //
T02TD2590E:235a-31: de bzhin de yi dbus su'ang gzhan //
T02TD2590E:235a-32: rdo rje phreng bas yongs bskor cing //
T02TD2590E:235a-33: rdo rje ka ba brgyad kyis brgyan //
T02TD2590E:235a-34: rtsig pa rin chen sna lnga 'bar //
T02TD2590E:235a-35: ye shes kyis sprul gzhal yas khang //
T02TD2590E:235a-36: nam mkha'i grangs med ltar rgya che //
T02TD2590E:235a-38: kha ba can gyi ri ltar dkar //
T02TD2590E:235a-39: mchod rten chen po'i nang du chud //
T02TD2590E:235a-41: phyogs kyi tshogs rnams khyab gyur pa //
T02TD2590E:235a-42: yid kyi rang bzhin mchod chen 'di //
T02TD2590E:235b-0: khyad @235b par 'phags pa rnams kyis brgyan //
T02TD2590E:235b-1: de ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i //
T02TD2590E:235b-2: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang /
T02TD2590E:235b-3: chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid sgyu ma lta bu dang /
T02TD2590E:235b-4: mig yor tsam gyi khang pa brtsegs ma rnam par bsgoms la /
T02TD2590E:235b-5: de'i dbus su yang h'um sam h'um zhes bya ba las seng ge'i gdan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis mnan pa der babs nas 'dug ste /
T02TD2590E:235b-6: rang gi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:235b-7: bzlas brjod byed par 'dod pas rang gi snying ga las bdag po rang gi sngags kyis bton la /
T02TD2590E:235b-10: mchod pa la sogs pa byas nas /
T02TD2590E:235b-11: zung du gnas pa'i sbyor ba'am /
T02TD2590E:235b-12: gnyis su med pa'i sbyor bas 'og nas bshad pa'i tshul gyis bzlas brjod dang gshegs su gsol ba la sogs pa bya ste /
T02TD2590E:235b-14: mdor bsdus pa'i rim pa ni /
T02TD2590E:235b-15: byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa sngon du 'gro ba nyid kyis spros pa dang /
T02TD2590E:235b-17: rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan par //
T02TD2590E:235b-18: skad cig ye shes kyis rdzogs pa /
T02TD2590E:235b-19: rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor zhes bshad do //
T02TD2590E:235b-21: yang na rnal 'byor rgya chen po byed par 'dod na /
T02TD2590E:235b-22: de'i tshe lha thams cad kyi gnas su yang pam las sna tshogs padma'i gdan la /
T02TD2590E:235b-23: aa dang aam las zla ba dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ci rigs par rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2590E:235b-24: de bzhin du dbus ma'i seng ge'i gdan la dus yun ring po nas goms par byas pa'i thugs rje chen po mngon du bsgoms la /
T02TD2590E:235b-25: 'gro ba ma lus pa 'di dag thabs dang shes rab dang bral bas sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa la blta ste /
T02TD2590E:235b-26: thabs 'dis de rnams kyi don bya'o zhes bsams la /
T02TD2590E:235b-27: rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dri ma med pa ji srid mdun du spros la /
T02TD2590E:235b-28: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta aa nu t'a ga na badzra sva bh'a ba a'a tma ko& ham zhes bya bas rjes su mnyes par byas la /
T02TD2590E:235b-29: aom badzra ko sha gu hya h'um zhes bya bas bskul ba dang /
T02TD2590E:236a-0: byang chub kyi sems dam pa bskyed pa de nyid kyis 'gro ba ma lus pa'i don byed par dga' bas mchog tu dga' ba @236a * //
T02TD2590E:236a-1: thob par bdag nyid shes nas sems can gyi khams ma lus pa dang /
T02TD2590E:236a-3: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yang dag par gang ba'i rang gi byang chub kyi sems shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bdag nyid du zhu bar gyur cing /
T02TD2590E:236a-4: nang du chud par byas la /
T02TD2590E:236a-6: yi ge aom las byung ba bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa //
T02TD2590E:236a-7: zhi ba ral pa dang thor tshugs 'chang ba //
T02TD2590E:236a-8: rin po che rnams kyis brgyan pa //
T02TD2590E:236a-13: sku mdog ser po phyag drug pa /
T02TD2590E:236a-14: phyag dang po gnyis kyis bsam gtan gyi phyag rgya mdzad pa //
T02TD2590E:236a-15: g-yas na bgrang phreng dang mda' bsnams pa /
T02TD2590E:236a-16: g-yon gyis lha mo'i nu ma dang /
T02TD2590E:236a-18: lha rnams 'jigs shing skrag par mdzad pas zhabs kyi padma la phyag 'tshal ba /
T02TD2590E:236a-19: sangs rgyas kyi sprin chen po 'phro ba /
T02TD2590E:236a-20: aom a'a: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis yang dag par spros la /
T02TD2590E:236a-21: nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor ma lus par khyab ste /
T02TD2590E:236a-22: 'gro ba ma lus pa'i don mdzad nas //
T02TD2590E:236a-23: sngags 'di nyid kyis bdag nyid la gzhug pa dang brtan par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:236a-24: h'um las mi bskyod pa sku mdog aindra n'i la'i 'od dang mnyam pa /
T02TD2590E:236a-26: spyan gsum pa cung zad bzhad cing sgeg pa /
T02TD2590E:236a-29: zhal dbus ma sku dang 'dra ba /
T02TD2590E:236a-30: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02TD2590E:236a-31: phyag brgyad pa g-yas kyis ba dan gsum pa'i gung mo'i dbus su rdo rje thugs kar 'degs par brtson pa /
T02TD2590E:236a-32: g-yon gyi rdo rje khu tshur dkur brten pas dril bu bsnams pa /
T02TD2590E:236a-33: yang g-yas na ral gri dang /
T02TD2590E:236a-36: g-yon na lha mo'i nu ma dang /
T02TD2590E:236a-39: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par gyur pa'i mi bskyod pa'i cod pan can rol pa'i stang stabs kyis legs par bzhugs pa /
T02TD2590E:236a-40: aom h'um: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis spros la /
T02TD2590E:236a-41: snga ma bzhin du 'gro ba'i don byas nas slar byon te /
T02TD2590E:236b-0: rang gi sngags nyid kyis shar phyogs kyi re'u cha @236b la dgod par bya zhing brtan par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:236b-1: de bzhin du gzhan dag kyang rang rang gi sa bon las byung ba /
T02TD2590E:236b-2: rang rang gi sngags kyis yang dag par spros te /
T02TD2590E:236b-3: rang rang gi sngags nyid kyis rang rang gi gnas su gzhag par bya zhing brtan par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:236b-4: zhal gsum gyi dbus ma ni sku dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o //
T02TD2590E:236b-5: tam las rin chen 'byung ldan spyan gsum pa /
T02TD2590E:236b-6: rin po che'i cod pan gyis brgyan pa /
T02TD2590E:236b-7: sku mdog dmar po zhal g-yas sngo /
T02TD2590E:236b-8: g-yon dkar ba phyag dang po gnyis kyis dam tshig gi phyag rgya mdzad pa /
T02TD2590E:236b-9: g-yas na rdo rje bsnams pa /
T02TD2590E:236b-10: g-yon na rin po che bsnams pa /
T02TD2590E:236b-11: snga ma bzhin du lho phyogs kyi re'u cha la dgod do //
T02TD2590E:236b-12: a'a: las byung ba'i 'od dpag tu med pa 'jig rten dbang phyug sku rnam par byung ba /
T02TD2590E:236b-13: ral pa dang thor tshugs 'chang ba /
T02TD2590E:236b-14: zhi ba thams cad mkhyen pas dbu rgyan byas pa /
T02TD2590E:236b-16: ston ka'i zla ba'i mdog can /
T02TD2590E:236b-19: phyag g-yon pas padma'i rtsa ba bzung nas dkur brten pa //
T02TD2590E:236b-20: g-yas pas rang gi thugs kar padma rnam par 'byed pa /
T02TD2590E:236b-21: yang g-yas gnyis na bgrang phreng dang rdo rje bsnams pa /
T02TD2590E:236b-22: g-yon gnyis na nu ma dang /
T02TD2590E:236b-23: ril ba spyi blugs bsnams pa /
T02TD2590E:236b-25: gdan gcig pa nub kya re'u cha la'o //
T02TD2590E:236b-26: kham las byung ba'i don yong grub pa marka ta gyi mdog can /
T02TD2590E:236b-29: phyag dang po gnyis kyis bsam gtan gyi phyag rgya bcas pa /
T02TD2590E:236b-30: yang g-yas dang g-yon gnyis kyis ral gri dang /
T02TD2590E:236b-32: rin po che'i cod pan can byar du'o //
T02TD2590E:236b-33: 'di dag ni sems dpa'i skyil mo klung gis bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2590E:236b-34: aom tr'am aom hr'i: aom kham zhes bya bas ni rim bzhin du 'di rnams kyi sngags yin no //
T02TD2590E:236b-37: kham tsum ram phrim h'um zhes bya bas sa bon gyi yi ge 'di rnams las spyan la sogs pa'i lha mo'i 'khor lo rnams rim bzhin du bskyed la /
T02TD2590E:236b-38: gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bkod par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:236b-39: de la dbang ldan gyi phyogs su lha mo spyan sku mdog ser ba /
T02TD2590E:236b-40: phyag g-yas na mchog sbyin dang /
T02TD2590E:237a-1: mdzub dang ldan pa'i zhags pa dang /
T02TD2590E:237a-2: rin po che'i snye ma dang //
T02TD2590E:237a-5: me'i phyogs su m'a ma k'i autpa la sngon po'i mdog can khro ba dang bcas pa bzhad pa'i zhal dang ldan pa //
T02TD2590E:237a-7: rdo rje dang mda' bsams pa'o //
T02TD2590E:237a-11: bden bral gyi phyogs su gos dkar can /
T02TD2590E:237a-12: zla ba'i mdog can g-yas na mi 'jigs pa dang rdo rje dang mdas brgyan pa /
T02TD2590E:237a-14: bgrang phreng dang gzhu bsnams pa /
T02TD2590E:237a-15: rol pa'i stang stabs can no //
T02TD2590E:237a-16: rlung gi phyogs su sgrol ma marka ta kyi mdog can g-yas na mi 'jigs pa dang rdo rje dang mda' bsnams pa /
T02TD2590E:237a-20: gsum po 'di dag ni sems dpa'i skyil mo krung can no //
T02TD2590E:237a-21: dkyil 'khor gnyis par shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su rdo rje sems ma dang /
T02TD2590E:237a-24: las kyi sems ma rim bzhin du mi bskyod pa la sogs pa dang //
T02TD2590E:237a-25: sku mdog dang phyag mtshan la sogs pa 'dra ba yin mod kyi //
T02TD2590E:237a-26: gzhan du na g-yon pa'i gnyis pas nu ma bsnams pa med pa'i phyir //
T02TD2590E:237a-27: ci rigs par sdigs mdzub dang ldan pa'i zhags pa bsnams par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:237a-28: byang shar mtshams su lha mo skul byed ma /
T02TD2590E:237a-29: zla ba'i mdog can phyag dang po gnyis kyi sa 'og nas bshad pa'i rtsa ba'i phyag rgya bcings pas /
T02TD2590E:237a-30: thugs ka'i gnas rnam par brgyan pa /
T02TD2590E:237a-31: g-yas rnams na mi 'jigs pa dang /
T02TD2590E:237a-41: ba dan gsum pa'i tshul dang /
T02TD2590E:237a-43: g-yon rnams na yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan dang /
T02TD2590E:237b-0: shes rab kyi pha rol tu @237b phyin pa'i glegs bam bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2590E:237b-1: shin tu dang ba'i dar la'i zheng chung du'i stong g-yogs legs par bgos pa /
T02TD2590E:237b-2: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02TD2590E:237b-3: dar la bab cing skal ba bzang ba /
T02TD2590E:237b-12: zhi ba zhes bya ba'i nyams dgu dang ldan pas spyi bo dang /
T02TD2590E:237b-20: zhabs rnams su de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dang //
T02TD2590E:237b-23: yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang /
T02TD2590E:237b-28: rdo rje sen mo can gyis gnas su byas pa /
T02TD2590E:237b-29: 'di'i zhal dang po cung zad bzhad pa /
T02TD2590E:237b-30: sku'i mdog can zhal g-yas pa gdengs pa /
T02TD2590E:237b-31: autpa la sngon po'i mdog can /
T02TD2590E:237b-32: mche ba cung zad gtsigs pas rnam par brgyan pa /
T02TD2590E:237b-34: zhal g-yon pa ser po tshem kyis sgros gnon pa'o //
T02TD2590E:237b-35: shar lho mtshams su rin chen sgrol ma sku mdog ser po //
T02TD2590E:237b-36: phyag dang po gnyis kyis thugs kar rin po che'i thal mo sbyar te 'jog pa /
T02TD2590E:237b-37: yang g-yas kyi gnyis pas mi 'jigs pa dang /
T02TD2590E:237b-39: g-yon gyi gnyis kyis sdigs mdzub dang /
T02TD2590E:237b-42: lho nub mtshams su khro gnyer can zla ba'i mdog can g-yas na rdo rje dang /
T02TD2590E:237b-48: nub byang mtshams su rdo rje lu gu rgyud sku mdog ljang gu //
T02TD2590E:237b-49: g-yas na rdo rje lcags sgrog dang /
T02TD2590E:237b-55: gdug pa thams cad nges par 'dul ba ste /
T02TD2590E:237b-56: 'di dag ni rol ba'i stang stabs dang ldan pa yin no //
T02TD2590E:237b-57: spyan la sogs pa'i lha mo 'di dag thams cad ni zla ba'i gdan dang /
T02TD2590E:238a-1: 'khor dmar po dang spyan gsum dang rang gi phyogs kyi bdag po dang 'dra ba'i zhal gsum dang /
T02TD2590E:238a-2: rang gi bdag po rin po che'i cod pan dang ldan pa /
T02TD2590E:238a-3: gos dang rgyan tshogs pa mnga' ba yin no //
T02TD2590E:238a-4: aom ga ga na lo tsa ne sv'a h'a /
T02TD2590E:238a-5: aom ri ri ri ri m'a ma k'i h'um /
T02TD2590E:238a-6: aom ka te bi ka te ni ka te ka tam ka te ka ro ta bidye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2590E:238a-7: aom t'a te du tt'a re tu re sv'a h'a /
T02TD2590E:238a-12: aom tsa le tsu le tsunda sv'a h'a /
T02TD2590E:238a-13: aom ratnol ke ratna dzva li ni sv'a h'a /
T02TD2590E:238a-15: aom badzra shrim kha le h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD2590E:238a-16: 'di dag ni ci rigs par 'di rnams kyi sngags yin no //
T02TD2590E:238a-17: de nas dkyil 'khor gsum par rim pa bzhin du shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su byams pa la sogs pa rang rang gi sa bon las byung ba dgod par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:238a-18: de la shar phyogs su yi ge meem las byung ba'i byams pa gser gyi mdog can phyag bzhi pa //
T02TD2590E:238a-19: phyag dang po gnyis kyis chos 'chad pa'i phyag rgyar byas pa //
T02TD2590E:238a-21: g-yon gyis me tog dang bcas pa'i n'a ga ge sar gyi snye ma bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2590E:238a-22: 'phags pa 'jam dpal ni sngar ji skad bstan pa'i rang bzhin can no //
T02TD2590E:238a-23: gam las byung ba'i spos kyi glang po ni mdog ljang gu g-yon na bum pa bsnams pa /
T02TD2590E:238a-24: g-yas kyis glang po che'i mchu 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD2590E:238a-25: dzam las byung ba'i ye shes tog sku mdog ser po g-yon na yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2590E:238a-28: aom gandha ha sti ne h'um //
T02TD2590E:238a-29: aom dzny'a na ke tu dzny'a na ba ti aom /
T02TD2590E:238a-30: 'di dag ni rim pa bzhin du 'di rnams kyi spro ba la sogs pa'i sngags yin no //
T02TD2590E:238a-31: yang lho phyogs su bha las byung ba'i bzang skyong sku mdog dmar po phyag thal mo sbyar ba'o //
T02TD2590E:238a-32: sa las byung ba'i rgya mtsho'i blo gros kyang /
T02TD2590E:238a-33: dung dang kunda ltar dkar ba /
T02TD2590E:238a-34: phyag gnyis brkyang ba'i sor mo thams cad kyis rlabs ltar mdzad pa'o ;
T02TD2590E:238a-35: / aa las byung ba'i blo gros mi zad pa ni gser gyi mdog can khu tshur yod pa /
T02TD2590E:238a-36: thugs kar 'jog pa g-yas pas mchog sbyin no //
T02TD2590E:238a-37: pra las byung ba'i spobs pa brtsegs pa ni sku mdog ljang gu g-yon gyi khu tshur pang par 'jog pa /
T02TD2590E:238a-38: g-yas kyi khu tshur se gol brdebs pa'o//
T02TD2590E:238b-0: @238b aom bha dra ba ti bha dra b'a le sv'a h'a /
T02TD2590E:238b-1: aom sva ga re ma h'a s'a ga re h'um /
T02TD2590E:238b-3: aaksha ya karma aa ba ra na bi sho dha ni sv'a h'a /
T02TD2590E:238b-4: aom pra ti bh'a ne pra te bh'a na k'u te h'um /
T02TD2590E:238b-5: 'di dag ni rim bzhin du 'di rnams kyi sngags yin no //
T02TD2590E:238b-6: nub phyogs su ma las byung ba'i mthu chen thob sku mdog dkar po g-yon pas padma cung zad kha phye ba bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2590E:238b-7: sa las byung ba'i ngan song kun 'dren sku mdog dkar po phyag gnyis sdig pa 'thor ba ltar mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2590E:238b-8: sa nyid las byung ba'i mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros gser gyi mdog can //
T02TD2590E:238b-9: phyag gnyis thal mo sbyar ba 'phyar ba'i tshul mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2590E:238b-10: dza las byung ba'i dra ba can gyi 'od sku mdog dkar po //
T02TD2590E:238b-11: g-yon na autpa la la gnas pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2590E:238b-12: aom sth'a me stha' me ma h'a sth'a me ba ti sv'a h'a /
T02TD2590E:238b-13: aom sarbba a'a b'a y'a dza he sarbba aa ba dza ye sarbba aa p'a ya bi sho dha ni h'um /
T02TD2590E:238b-14: aom aom sarbba sho ka ta mo nir gha te na ma ti h'um /
T02TD2590E:238b-15: aom dza li ni ma h'a dza li ni h'um zhes bya ba ni 'di dag gi sngags so //
T02TD2590E:238b-16: byang phyogs su tsa las byung ba'i zla ba'i 'od /
T02TD2590E:238b-17: zla ba'i mdog can autpa la la gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2590E:238b-18: aa las byung ba'i 'od dpag tu med pa sku mdog dmar po phyag gnyis kyis dbang bskur ba'i bum pa bsnams pa'o /
T02TD2590E:238b-19: ga las byung ba'i nam mkha' mdzod gser gyi mdog can //
T02TD2590E:238b-21: g-yon gyi rdo rje'i khu tshur bsnyems pa'i tshul gyis rked par 'jog pa /
T02TD2590E:238b-22: g-yas pa nam mkhar yongs su bskor ba'o //
T02TD2590E:238b-23: skam las byung ba'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba sku mdog sngon po'am dkar po /
T02TD2590E:238b-25: g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyis mthe bong dang /
T02TD2590E:238b-26: mdzub mo sbyar nas 'dri ba'i tshul du 'jog pa'o //
T02TD2590E:238b-27: aom tsandra su tsandra bya ba lo ki te sv'a h'a /
T02TD2590E:238b-28: aom aa mri ta pra bhe aa mi ta ba ti h'um /
T02TD2590E:238b-29: aom ga ga na pa ra lo tsa ne h'um /
T02TD2590E:238b-30: aom sarbba ni ba ra na biskam bi ni h'um zhes bya ba ni 'di rnams kyi spro ba la sogs pa'i sngags so //
T02TD2590E:238b-31: byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag thams cad kyang padma'i gdan can zla ba'i 'od mnga' ba sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis gnas pa //
T02TD2590E:239a-1: gsum pa zhal gsum pa ring gi phyogs kyi bdag po dang 'dra ba mnga' zhing de'i cod pan can //
T02TD2590E:239a-2: rgyan dang na bza' sna tshogs 'chang ba //
T02TD2590E:239a-3: phyag dang po gnyis kyis ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya bcings pa khyad par gyi tshig tu smos pa ma gtogs pa g-yas na mchog sbyin dang mda' dang /
T02TD2590E:239a-5: shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams kyi ngos gnyis gnyis kyi snam bul gnyis gnyis bdag po la mngon par phyogs nas bzhugs par rim pa bzhin bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:239a-6: de nas h'um las 'phags pa gshin rje gshed dus mtha'i sprin lta bu /
T02TD2590E:239a-7: phyag g-yas na ral gri dang /
T02TD2590E:239a-10: g-yon na sdigs mdzub bsgreng ba /
T02TD2590E:239a-11: zhags pa dang bcas pas bsdigs par mdzad pa /
T02TD2590E:239a-12: g-yon gyi gnyis pas padma dkar po thogs pa'i lha mos g-yas kyis 'khyud pa la brtson pa'i zla ba'i mdog can gyi nu ma 'dzin pa /
T02TD2590E:239a-13: gsum pa ni gzhu bdungs pa bsnams pa /
T02TD2590E:239a-14: g-yas logs su lha mo marka ta ltar ljang ba /
T02TD2590E:239a-15: lag pa g-yas na autpa la sngon po thogs shing /
T02TD2590E:239a-16: lag pa g-yon pas mgul nas 'khyud pas nye bar mdzes pa byas pa /
T02TD2590E:239a-20: zhal dang po ha ha zhes rnam par bzhad pa /
T02TD2590E:239a-23: bzhi pa mi bzad pa chen po //
T02TD2590E:239a-24: lnga pa rdo rje mche ba can //
T02TD2590E:239a-25: drug pa ljags rnam par bskyod pa /
T02TD2590E:239a-26: spyan dmar pa khro bo'i lta ba 'jigs su rung ba /
T02TD2590E:239a-27: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis yang dag par brgyan pa /
T02TD2590E:239a-28: lha dang bgegs 'jigs pas kun du khyab par du ma 'og na gnas shing 'dud par byed pa rol pa'i sta bstabs kyis ma he'i steng na bzhugs pa snga ma bzhin du gdug pa 'dul ba la sogs pa mdzad pa'i phyir //
T02TD2590E:239a-29: kun du spros la yang dag par bsdus te ;
T02TD2590E:239a-30: rang gi sngags kyis rtsa ba'i shar sgor dgod par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:239a-31: de bzhin du lho'i sgor pra las byung ba'i gzhan gyis ma thub pa sku mdog ser po phyag g-yas pas rdo rje dang /
T02TD2590E:239a-32: dbyug pa dang mda' bsnams pa /
T02TD2590E:239a-33: g-yon na sdigs mdzub zhags pa can dang /
T02TD2590E:239b-0: nu ma dang gzhu @239b bsnams pa /
T02TD2590E:239b-1: mi'u thung gi gzugs can no //
T02TD2590E:239b-2: nub kyi sgor ha las byung ba'i rta mgrin sku mdog dmar po phyag g-yas na rdo rje dang dbyug pa dang /
T02TD2590E:239b-3: mtshon rtse gcig pa dang mda' bsnams pa /
T02TD2590E:239b-4: g-yon pas sdigs mdzub zhags pa can dang /
T02TD2590E:239b-7: byang gi sgor h'um las byung ba'i bdud rtsi thab sbyor sngon po zhabs kyis bgegs rnams gnon pa /
T02TD2590E:239b-9: dgra sta dang mda' gsor ba bsnams pa /
T02TD2590E:239b-10: g-yon na sdigs mdzub zhags pa can dang /
T02TD2590E:239b-11: nu ma dang gzhu bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2590E:239b-12: dbang ldan gyi phyogs su h'um las byung ba'i mi g-yo ba sku mdog sngon po //
T02TD2590E:239b-13: mi g-yo ba byis pa'i gzugs can //
T02TD2590E:239b-14: gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa //
T02TD2590E:239b-18: g-yon na sdigs mdzub zhags pa can dang //
T02TD2590E:239b-19: nu ma dang gzhu bsnams pa //
T02TD2590E:239b-20: bung ba ltar gnag pa'i zur phud gcig g-yon du 'phyang ba mnga' ba //
T02TD2590E:239b-21: zhal g-yas pa'i ljags khrag gis brlan pa bsgril ba //
T02TD2590E:239b-22: rin po che'i ri'i steng na padma la bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2590E:239b-23: me'i phyogs su h'um las byung ba'i 'dod pa'i rgyal po sku mdog sngon po ;
T02TD2590E:239b-24: / phyag dang po gnyis kyis rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcas pa yang g-yas gnyis na rdo rje dang mda' bsnams pa //
T02TD2590E:239b-25: g-yon gnyis na nu ma dang gzhu bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2590E:239b-26: bden bral gyi phyogs su h'um las byung ba'i dbyug sngon can sku mdog sngon po //
T02TD2590E:239b-28: dbyug pa dang mda' bsnams pa //
T02TD2590E:239b-29: g-yon na sdigs mdzub zhags pa can dang /
T02TD2590E:239b-30: nu ma dang gzhu bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2590E:239b-31: rlung gi phyogs su h'um las byung ba'i stobs po che sku mdog sngon po //
T02TD2590E:239b-32: g-yas na rdo rje dang be con dang /
T02TD2590E:239b-33: ral gri dang mda' bsnams pa //
T02TD2590E:239b-34: g-yon na sdigs mdzub zhags pa can dang //
T02TD2590E:239b-35: nu ma dang tho ba dang /
T02TD2590E:239b-37: steng du h'um las byung ba'i gnod mdzes rgyal po sku mdog sngon po /
T02TD2590E:239b-38: phyag dang po gnyis kyis rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya bcings pa /
T02TD2590E:239b-39: yang g-yas gnyis na ral gri dang mda' bsnams pa /
T02TD2590E:240a-1: gnyis na nu ma dang gzhu bsnams pa /
T02TD2590E:240a-2: khams gsum ma lus pa las rnam par rgyal bar mdzad pa'o /
T02TD2590E:240a-3: 'og tu h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje sa 'og char sprin sngon po lta bu //
T02TD2590E:240a-4: phyag g-yas rnams kyis rdo rje dang /
T02TD2590E:240a-5: lcags kyu dang mda' bsnams pa /
T02TD2590E:240a-6: g-yon sdigs mdzub zhags pa can dang /
T02TD2590E:240a-7: nu ma dang gzhu bsnams pa /
T02TD2590E:240a-8: sa 'og na gnas pa'i lha ma yin ma lus pa'i tshogs rab tu 'joms par bsam par bya'o /
T02TD2590E:240a-9: khro bo 'di dag thams cad kyang spyan gsum pa /
T02TD2590E:240a-11: khro bo'i lta ba 'jigs su rung ba //
T02TD2590E:240a-12: mtha' yas dang rigs ldan nag pos dbu skra bcings pa /
T02TD2590E:240a-13: 'jog po gser gyi mdog can gyis rna rgyan du byas pa /
T02TD2590E:240a-14: padma chen po gser btso ma'i kha dog can gyis gdu bur byas pa /
T02TD2590E:240a-15: karko ta kha dog dkar pos mchod phyir thogs su byas pa /
T02TD2590E:240a-16: nor rgyas kha dog dmar pos 'og pag byas pa /
T02TD2590E:240a-19: dkar bas zhabs gdub byas pa /
T02TD2590E:240a-20: 'di dag thams cad kyang gdengs ka 'jigs su rung ba dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD2590E:240a-21: na bza' stag gi pags pa bsnams pa /
T02TD2590E:240a-23: dbu spra 'khyil pa gyen du bsgreng pa bcings pa //
T02TD2590E:240a-24: mi bskyod pa'i chod pan can aag cho dmar ser can ;
T02TD2590E:240a-27: zhal dang po cung zad bzhad pa //
T02TD2590E:240a-28: zhal g-yas pa rnam par gdangs pa //
T02TD2590E:240a-29: g-yon gyi tshems kyis sgros gnon pa dang /
T02TD2590E:240a-30: mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa //
T02TD2590E:240a-32: rol pa'i stang stabs kyis bzhugs par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:240a-36: aom aa mri ta kunda li bi ghn'anta ka h'um //
T02TD2590E:240a-38: aom ta kki h'um dza: aom n'i la danda ma h'a danda h'um /
T02TD2590E:240a-39: aom kro dha na h'um dza: aom sumbha ni sumbha h'um /
T02TD2590E:240a-41: gri hn'a pa ya gri hn'a pa ya h'um /
T02TD2590E:240a-42: a'a na ya ho: bhag w'an bidya r'a dza h'um phat ;
T02TD2590E:240a-43: aom badzra p'a t'a la bhanydza bha nydza h'um zhes bya ba ni rim bzhin du 'di dag gi spro ba la sogs pa'i sngags yin no //
T02TD2590E:240a-44: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas so //
T02TD2590E:240a-45: rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa bzhi ni spyan la sogs pa'i rigs kyi yum gyi phyag rgyas so //
T02TD2590E:240b-0: spyan @240b la sogs pa ni rang gi phyag rgyas so //
T02TD2590E:240b-1: skul byed ma la sogs pa'i pho nya mo rnams ni lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas so //
T02TD2590E:240b-2: byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rdo rje'i phyag rgyas so //
T02TD2590E:240b-3: gshin rje gshed la sogs pa khro bo rnams ni zhal gyi phag rgyas so //
T02TD2590E:240b-4: 'phags pa mi g-yo ba la sogs pa'i bran rnams ni zhags pa'i phyag rgyas spyan drang bar bya'o //
T02TD2590E:240b-5: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la sogs pa de rnams kyang 'khor lo'i tshogs dang bcas pa //
T02TD2590E:240b-6: rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas spyan drangs pa na 'od zer gyi tshogs rnams 'gyed par mdzad pas //
T02TD2590E:240b-7: sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas nyid la sogs pas dngos grub thams cad stsol bar mdzad cing zhal 'dzum pa dang /
T02TD2590E:240b-8: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la mngon par phyogs te /
T02TD2590E:240b-9: byon nas steng du bzhugs par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:240b-10: de la khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya nyid las g-yas pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyur bya ba ni rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2590E:240b-11: aom badzra aam ku sha / a'a karsha ya h'um dza: zhes bya ba ni sngags so //
T02TD2590E:240b-12: sbyan [*spyan] la sogs pa'i phyag rgya ni 'og nas 'chad do //
T02TD2590E:240b-13: lcags kyu'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya nyid do //
T02TD2590E:240b-14: thal mo khong stong du sbyar nas srin lag gnyis nang du bcug ste /
T02TD2590E:240b-15: gung mo gnyis gshibs pa'i tshigs gsum par mdzub mo gnyis rdo rje lta bur gzhag pa ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2590E:240b-16: h'um dza: zhes bya ba 'di dag thams cad kyi sngags so //
T02TD2590E:240b-17: rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya nyid las mdzub mo gnyis zhags par bya ba ni zhags pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2590E:240b-18: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis mthe'u chung gnyis mche blta bur rnam par bzlog nas /
T02TD2590E:240b-19: mkhur ba gnyis su bzhag la //
T02TD2590E:240b-20: lce bskyod cing khro bo'i lta bas blta ba ni zhal gyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2590E:240b-21: la la ni 'phags pa gshin rje gshed kyi phyag rgya nyid zhal gyi phyag rgya nyid yin te /
T02TD2590E:240b-22: de ni kha dang 'dra ba'i phyir ro zhes zer ro //
T02TD2590E:240b-23: dza: h'um bam ho: zhes bya ba ni thams cad kyi sngags yin no //
T02TD2590E:240b-24: de nas snga ma bzhin du shar sgor 'phags pa gshin rje gshed kyi nga rgyal dang ldan pas rdo rje lcags kyus bkug la /
T02TD2590E:241a-0: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ni rang gi snying ga dang de las @241a * //
T02TD2590E:241a-1: gzhan pa nas rang rang gi rnam pa la'o //
T02TD2590E:241a-2: 'phags pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i nga rgyal gyis lho sgor rdo rje zhags pas bcug la /
T02TD2590E:241a-3: 'phags pa rta mgrin gyi nga rgyal gyis nub sgo nas rdo rje lcags sgrog gis bcings la /
T02TD2590E:241a-4: 'phags pa bdud rtsi thab sbyor du nga rgyal byas pa'i rdo rje 'bebs pas byang sgo nas dbang du byas la /
T02TD2590E:241a-5: 'phags pa bdud rtsi thab sbyor nyid kyis bgegs bskrad pa la sogs pa byas te /
T02TD2590E:241a-8: zhabs bsil la sogs pa phul la /
T02TD2590E:241a-9: rang gi sngags dang phyag rgya rnams kyis sku byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD2590E:241a-10: rang gi snying gar h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje bsams la /
T02TD2590E:241a-11: dam tshig gi phyag rgya bstan par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:241a-12: de la dam tshig ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2590E:241a-13: g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyi mdzub mo brkyang la g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyis bzung ba ni bcom ldan 'das dpal rnam par snang mdzad kyi'o //
T02TD2590E:241a-14: sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas nas /
T02TD2590E:241a-15: lag pa g-yon pa rang gi pang par bzhag ste /
T02TD2590E:241a-16: g-yas pas gnon pa lta bu ni mi bskyod pa'i 'o //
T02TD2590E:241a-17: de las g-yas mchog sbyin par bya ba ni /
T02TD2590E:241a-19: de nyid las lag pa gnyis bsam gtan gyi tshul du bya ba ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i 'o //
T02TD2590E:241a-20: de nyid las lag pa g-yas pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin par byed pa ni don yod par grub pa'i 'o //
T02TD2590E:241a-21: aom bee ro tsa na dri shya ho /
T02TD2590E:241a-23: lhag ma rnams kyi ni rang gi mtshan brjod par blta bar bya'o //
T02TD2590E:241a-24: lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du byas la /
T02TD2590E:241a-25: mdzub mo gnyis gdu bu lta bur byas te /
T02TD2590E:241a-26: mthe bo'i rtse mor mig gi tshul du gzhag pa ni spyan gyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2590E:241a-27: rdo rje bcing ba las gung mo bsgreng ba'i tshigs gsum par mdzub mo gnyis nas gang tsam gyis ma reg par rdo rje'i tshul du gzhag pa ni m'a ma k'i'i 'o //
T02TD2590E:241a-28: lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du byas te /
T02TD2590E:241a-29: padma kha bye ba'i tshul du byas pa ni gos dkar can gyi'o //
T02TD2590E:241a-30: lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar la /
T02TD2590E:241a-31: mdzub mo gnyis bkug pas gung mo'i sen mo mnan te /
T02TD2590E:241a-32: mthe bo gnyis dbus su gshibs nas gzhag pa ni sgrol ma'i 'o //
T02TD2590E:241b-0: rdo rje sems ma la sogs @241b pa'i ni sngar bshad pa'i rang gi phyag rgya nyid do //
T02TD2590E:241b-1: lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar te /
T02TD2590E:241b-2: mdzub mo gnyis gung mo'i tshigs dbus mar gdu bu'i tshul du bzhag la mthe bong gnyis mdzub mo gnyis kyi glo'i rtsa bar bzhag pa ni skul byed ma'i 'o //
T02TD2590E:241b-3: rdo rje bcing ba byas ba las mdzub mo gnyis mthe bo'i rtse mor bkug ste sbyar la /
T02TD2590E:241b-4: rin po che lta bur gzhag pa ni rin chen sgron ma'i'o //
T02TD2590E:241b-5: lag pa gnyis kyi thal mo brkyang la mthe bos rang rang gi mthe'u chung gi sen mo mnan nas /
T02TD2590E:241b-6: sor mo lhag ma rnams so sor sbyar te /
T02TD2590E:241b-7: rdo rje lta bur gzhag pa ni kho gnyer can gyi'o //
T02TD2590E:241b-8: lag pa gnyis so sor rdo rje khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung gnyis lu gu rgyud ltar bcing ba ni /
T02TD2590E:241b-9: rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi'o //
T02TD2590E:241b-10: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la mthe bo dang mdzub mo dang gung mo so sor phan tshun phyogs par n'a ga ge sar gyi me tog lta bur gzhag pa ni byams pa'i 'o //
T02TD2590E:241b-11: lag pa g-yon pa pang par bkan te bzhag la /
T02TD2590E:241b-12: lag pa g-yas pa brkyang nas glang po che'i sna ltar byas pa ni spos kyi glang po'i 'o //
T02TD2590E:241b-13: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur spyi bor bteg la /
T02TD2590E:241b-14: de'i 'og tu lag pa g-yas pa'i sor mo ba dan gyi tshul du bskyod pa ni ye shes tog gi'o //
T02TD2590E:241b-16: thal mo khong stong du sbyar te snying gar gzhag pa ni bzang skyong gi'o //
T02TD2590E:241b-17: lag pa gnyis brkyang la sor mo thams cad kyis chu rlabs ltar bya ba ni rgya mtsho'i blo gros kyi'o //
T02TD2590E:241b-18: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur snying gar bzhag la /
T02TD2590E:241b-19: g-yas pa mchog sbyin du bya ba ni blo gros mi zad pa'i 'o //
T02TD2590E:241b-20: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur phang par bzhag la /
T02TD2590E:241b-21: lag pa g-yas pas rdo rje khu tshur byas nas mthe bo dang mdzub mo gnyis kyis se gol gtogs pa'i tshul du byed pa ni spob sa pa brtsegs pa'i 'o //
T02TD2590E:241b-22: lag pa gnyis padma cung zad kha bye ba'i tshul du byas pa ni mthu chen thob kyi'o //
T02TD2590E:241b-23: lag pa gnyis kyis sdig pa 'thor ba'i tshul du byed pa ni ngan song thams cad spong ba'i 'o //
T02TD2590E:241b-24: lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar bas bsnun pa'i tshul du byas pa ni mya ngan thams cad kyi mun pa nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros kyi'o //
T02TD2590E:242a-0: lag pa gnyis brkyang nas 'od 'phro ba'i tshul @242a * //
T02TD2590E:242a-1: du byed pa ni dra ba can gyi 'od kyi'o //
T02TD2590E:242a-2: lag pa g-yas pa mchog sbyin par byas la /
T02TD2590E:242a-3: g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyi mdzub mo dang mthe bo thad kar brkyang ba zla ba lta bur byas pa ni zla ba'i 'od kyi'o //
T02TD2590E:242a-4: lag pa gnyis bum pa'i tshul du byas la dbang bskur ba'i gnas su 'jog pa ni 'od dpag tu med kyi'o //
T02TD2590E:242a-5: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur rked par bzhag la g-yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur nam mkha' la yongs su bskor ba ni nam mkha' mdzod kyi'o //
