T02TD2590E:242a-6: lag pa g-yon pas sa la reg pa'i tshul du bzhag la /
T02TD2590E:242a-7: g-yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi mthe bo dang /
T02TD2590E:242a-8: mdzub mo sprad nas zhu ba'i tshul du 'jog pa ni sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i 'o //
T02TD2590E:242a-9: lag pa gnyis kyi khu tshur nang du bcangs la /
T02TD2590E:242a-10: gung mo gnyis gshibs te srin lag gnyis kyang de bzhin du rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa las bsgreng la /
T02TD2590E:242a-11: mdzub mo gnyis gdu bu'i tshul du byas nas /
T02TD2590E:242a-12: mthe bo gnyis kyi mdun du bzhag la cung zad bkug nas kha'i tshul du byas pa ni /
T02TD2590E:242a-13: 'phags pa gshin rje gshed kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2590E:242a-14: g-yon pa'i khu tshur snying gar bzhag la /
T02TD2590E:242a-15: lag pa g-yas pa thal lcag gi tshul du phyar ba ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i 'o //
T02TD2590E:242a-16: lag pa gnyis rdo rje khu tshur bcangs la /
T02TD2590E:242a-17: mthe'u chung gnyis lu gu rgyud du mdud pa bya ste /
T02TD2590E:242a-18: mdzub mo gnyis gshibs nas bzlog la smin mtshams su gzhag pa ni rta mgrin gyi'o //
T02TD2590E:242a-19: rang gi mthe bos mthe'u chung gi sen mo mnan la sor mo lhag ma rnams rdo rje'i tshul du byas nas lag ngar gyi rdo rje bcings pas /
T02TD2590E:242a-20: mchan khung gi rtsar gzhag pa ni bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi'o //
T02TD2590E:242a-21: lag pa gnyis brkyang la mthe bos rang gi srin lag dang /
T02TD2590E:242a-22: mthe'u chung gi sen mo mnan nas /
T02TD2590E:242a-23: lag pa g-yon pa'i nang du lag pa g-yas pa'i gung mo dang srin lag bcug la snying gar bzhag nas shubs nas 'dren pa'i tshul du drangs la /
T02TD2590E:242a-24: lag pa g-yas pa ral gri'i tshul du gzhag pa ni 'phags pa mi g-yo ba'i 'o //
T02TD2590E:242a-25: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis phan tshun rgyab sprad de /
T02TD2590E:242a-26: mthe'u chung gnyis lu gu rgyud du bcings nas mdzub mo gnyis bsgreng ba las zhags pa'i tshul du bya ba ni 'dod ba'i rgyal po'i 'o //
T02TD2590E:242b-0: g-yon pa'i khro bo'i mdzub @242b mo snying gar bzhag la /
T02TD2590E:242b-1: g-yas pa'i khro bo'i mdzub mo be con gyi tshul du bsgreng nas gzhag pa ni dbyug sngon can gyi'o //
T02TD2590E:242b-2: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur snying gar bzhag la /
T02TD2590E:242b-3: g-yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur brdeg pa'i tshul du bsgreng ba ni stobs po che'i 'o //
T02TD2590E:242b-4: 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya nyid las mdzub mo gnyis bsgreng pa ni gnod mdzes kyi'o //
T02TD2590E:242b-5: lag pa gnyis ka'i mthe'u chung dang /
T02TD2590E:242b-6: mthe bo gcig la gcig lu gu rgyud du byas te /
T02TD2590E:242b-7: sor mo lhag ma rnams ba dan gsum pa'i tshul du gyen du bsgreng la /
T02TD2590E:242b-8: stang stabs dang bcas pa'i h'um bya ba ni rdo rje sa 'og ga ste ;
T02TD2590E:242b-9: dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams so //
T02TD2590E:242b-10: phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab pa'i bya ba ni rgyud 'dir ma thos te /
T02TD2590E:242b-11: 'di dag tsam nyid kyis 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs par bcom ldan 'das kyis lung dang man ngag gis bdag cag la sogs pa 'jug pa ni 'bras bu dang 'dra bar mthong ste /
T02TD2590E:242b-12: ma thos par yongs su brtag pa des ci zhig bya //
T02TD2590E:242b-13: de lta na yang mgu bar ma gyur na /
T02TD2590E:242b-14: lce la h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje bzang po rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2590E:242b-15: rang gi sngags nyid ni chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2590E:242b-16: rang gi snying gar aa las byung ba'i sna tshogs rdo rje rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2590E:242b-17: phyag rgya chen po las rang gi mtshan ma med par gar las byung ba ni las kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2590E:242b-18: rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsams la /
T02TD2590E:242b-19: sngar bshad pa'i sku mdog la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya chen po bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:242b-20: thal mo sbyar la sor mo'i rtse mo phan tshun bsnol ba ni rdo rje thal mo'i 'o //
T02TD2590E:242b-21: de bzhin du sor mo rnams kyi rtsa ba shin tu bsngags pa ni rdo rje bsdams pa'o //
T02TD2590E:242b-22: mthe'u chung du srin lag gi bar du mthe bo bcug la mdzub mo bkug pas bsdams pa ni rdo rje khu tshur zhes bshad de phyag rgya bcing ba thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2590E:242b-23: de nas sngar bshad pa'i rim gyis dbang bskur bar gsol ba btab pa sngon du 'gro bas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo ma lus pa nyid dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya sngags dang bcas pa dang gsang ba'i mchod pa rnams kyis dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2590E:243a-0: des kyang gang gi dbang bskur ba'i cod @243a * //
T02TD2590E:243a-1: pan gang yin par gsungs pa de'i gzugs su yongs su gyur par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:243a-2: de ltar dbang bskur nas dar dbyangs dbyang ba sngon du 'gro bas thams cad la badzra tushya ho: zhes bya ba nyid dang mnyam pa'i thal mos mnyes par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:243a-3: de nas rang gi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs shing rang gi thugs ka'i zla ba la bkod pa'i sngags kyi 'od zer rnams kyis phyogs kyi tshogs ma lus pa snang bar mdzad cing /
T02TD2590E:243a-4: lha'i 'khor lo ma lus pa phyogs bcur sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa sprul pa'i sprin gyis rang gi las la brtson par mdzad do //
T02TD2590E:243a-5: de la bcom ldan 'das dpal 'jam pa'i rdo rje ni sems can thams cad la shes rab dang ye shes kyi snang ba mdzad do //
T02TD2590E:243a-6: dpal rnam par snang mdzad ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi stobs rdzogs par mdzad do //
T02TD2590E:243a-7: mi bskyod pa ni sems kyi stobs mtha' yas pa rdzogs par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po chen po'i shugs mdzad do //
T02TD2590E:243a-8: rin chen 'byung ldan ni rin po che mngon par mtho ba'i ye shes kyi rdo rje'o //
T02TD2590E:243a-9: 'od dpag tu med pa ni rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog tu rgyas pa'i chos kyi mdzod do //
T02TD2590E:243a-10: don yod par grub pa ni nam mkha' snang bar byed pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje'o //
T02TD2590E:243a-11: spyan ni ye shes kyi spyan gyis snang bar byed pa'i rdo rje 'jo tshul lo //
T02TD2590E:243a-12: m'a ma k'i ni sgyu 'phrul bskyed pa'i stobs kyi ye shes zab mo nyid do //
T02TD2590E:243a-13: na bza' dkar mo ni padma'i gzugs kyi 'jo tshul du sangs rgyas kyi rgyal ba 'dren pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje'o //
T02TD2590E:243a-14: sgrol ma ni sems can thams cad dbang du 'gro zhing dga' bar byed pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje'o //
T02TD2590E:243a-15: rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa bzhi po ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rjes su mnyes par mdzad do //
T02TD2590E:243a-16: skul byed ma ni rgyal ba mtha' yas pa'i ye shes skul bar byed pa'i stobs kyis rnam par rgyal ba'o //
T02TD2590E:243a-17: rin chen sgrol ma ni rin po che'i sprin gyi ye shes kyis snang bar byed pa'o //
T02TD2590E:243a-18: khro gnyer ma ni 'jigs ba thams cad 'jig par byed pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje'o //
T02TD2590E:243b-0: rdo rje lu gu rgyud ni rdo rje sgrog @243b 'grol ba'i ye shes so //
T02TD2590E:243b-1: byams pa ni byams pa'i stobs kyi ye shes kyi rnam par rgyal ba'o //
T02TD2590E:243b-2: 'phags pa 'jam dpal ni nyon mongs pa sra ba dang bral ba'o //
T02TD2590E:243b-3: spos kyi glang po ni mi shes pa'i dregs pa sel ba'o //
T02TD2590E:243b-4: ye shes tog ni zag pa med pa'i ye shes kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng pa'o //
T02TD2590E:243b-5: bzang skyong ni phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba'o //
T02TD2590E:243b-6: rgya mtsho'i blo gros ni mtha' yas pa'i ye shes kyi rgyal mtshor 'dren pa'o //
T02TD2590E:243b-7: blo gros mi zad pa'i ni zad mi shes shing tshad med pa'i zag pa med pa'i shes rab thob pa'o //
T02TD2590E:243b-8: spobs pa brtsegs pa ni mtha' yas shing sna tshogs pa'i chos rnams rab tu snang ba'o //
T02TD2590E:243b-9: mthu chen thob ni mi snang ba'i stobs chen po thams cad thob pa'o //
T02TD2590E:243b-10: ngan song thams cad spong ba ni ngan song gsum po ma lus par rnam par sbyong ba'o //
T02TD2590E:243b-11: mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros ni /
T02TD2590E:243b-12: mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa la sogs pa'i mun pa ma lus par nges par 'joms pa'o //
T02TD2590E:243b-13: dra ba can gyi 'od ni nyon mongs pa'i dra ba ma lus par rgyun du rab tu 'jig pa'o //
T02TD2590E:243b-14: zla ba'i 'od ni mi shes pa'i mun pa thams cad nges par 'jig pa'o //
T02TD2590E:243b-15: 'od dpag tu med pa ni dpag tu med pa'i ye shes kyi 'od zer snang ba'o //
T02TD2590E:243b-16: nam mkha'i mdzod ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang /
T02TD2590E:243b-17: rin po che'i char la sogs pa 'bebs pa'o //
T02TD2590E:243b-18: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba ni sgrib pa rnam pa lnga sel ba'o //
T02TD2590E:243b-19: 'di dag kyang thog ma nyid du byung zhing gdod ma nas dag pa ngo bo nyid dam /
T02TD2590E:243b-20: yi ge med pa'i chos thugs su chud par mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2590E:243b-21: 'phags pa gshin rje ni gshed byed thams cad slong bar byed pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje gshin rje gsod pa'i 'dul ba la 'jug par mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2590E:243b-22: gzhan gyis mi thub pa ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje'o //
T02TD2590E:243b-23: rta mgrin ni rta mchog gi rdo rje drag po rtsal lo //
T02TD2590E:243b-24: bdud rtsi thab sbyor ni bgegs thams cad 'jig pa'i rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje'o //
T02TD2590E:244a-0: 'phags pa mi g-yo ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs su chud pa'i mi g-yo ba'i ye shes kyis rnam par rol @244a * //
T02TD2590E:244a-2: 'dod pa'i rgyal po ni snying thams cad 'gugs pa'i rnam par rgyal pa'i ye shes so //
T02TD2590E:244a-3: dbyug sngon can ni cung zad rdeg pa'i ye shes kyi rnam par rgyal ba'o //
T02TD2590E:244a-4: stobs po che ni 'chol ba'i ye shes kyi stobs kyis rnam par rgyal ba'o //
T02TD2590E:244a-5: rdo rje h'um mdzad ni khams gsum ma lus pa 'dul ba'o //
T02TD2590E:244a-6: rdo rjes 'og ni lha ma yin dang /
T02TD2590E:244a-7: bdud thams cad nges par bsreg pa la bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:244a-8: de ltar dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo rnams rang rang gi las rnams mdzad cing bdag nyid kyang de dang tha mi dad par shes rab dang ye shes kyis snang ba 'jam pa'i rdo rje 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus na gnas par rnam par bsgoms la /
T02TD2590E:244a-9: rang gi ting nge 'dzin las byung ba'i gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa nam mkha'i khongs thams cad khyab pa'i gsang ba'i mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2590E:244a-10: sgeg mo la sogs pas kyang mchod par bya ste /
T02TD2590E:244a-11: yi ge h'um gis glu len cing gar byed pa sngon du 'gro bas rdo rje khu tshur gnyis rked pa'i phyogs kyi g-yas dang g-yon du bzhag la /
T02TD2590E:244a-12: 'gying bag dang bcas par g-yon pa'i brla cung zad phab nas gnas pa ni rdo rje sgeg mo'o //
T02TD2590E:244a-13: de bzhin du phreng pa bcing ba ni phreng ba ma'o //
T02TD2590E:244a-14: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi mdzub mo bsgreng ba'i yu ba la g-yas pa'i mdzub mos gar byed pa'i rnam pa dang /
T02TD2590E:244a-15: sgeg pas lus cung zad bsgul zhing pi wang brdung ba ni glu ma'o //
T02TD2590E:244a-16: lag pa gnyis bsgor te bkrol la rtsi ba logs gnyis su bskor la sgeg pa'i nyams kyis rgyas pa nyid dang /
T02TD2590E:244a-17: spyi bor bzhag ste gar byed pa'i tshul ni gar ma'o //
T02TD2590E:244a-18: de bzhin du gar sngon du 'gro bas rdo rje thal mo spyi bor bzhag ste /
T02TD2590E:244a-19: snying gar phab nas me tog 'bul ba ltar byed pa ni me tog ma'o //
T02TD2590E:244a-20: de bzhin du rdo rje khu tshur phan tshun rgya ba sprad la gung mo bsgreng ste /
T02TD2590E:244a-21: bdug spos 'bul ba ltar byed cing lag pa bskor ba ni bdug pa ma'o //
T02TD2590E:244a-22: de bzhin du rdo rje bsdams pa las byung ba'i ma the bo gnyis bsgreng la /
T02TD2590E:244a-23: mar me 'bul ba ltar byed cid [*cing?] lag pa bskor ba ni mar me ma'o //
T02TD2590E:244a-24: rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings la /
T02TD2590E:244b-0: mthe bo zlum por byas @244b nas mdzub mo brkyang ste /
T02TD2590E:244b-1: rtse mo sbyar la yongs su bskor te /
T02TD2590E:244b-2: mchod yon 'bul ba ltar byas la /
T02TD2590E:244b-3: gar 'gro sngon du 'gro bas lag pa gnyis kyis byug pa ltar byed pa ni byug pa ma'o //
T02TD2590E:244b-4: 'di dag kyang rang gi phyag rgya bcing ba las byung ba'i sgeg mo la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams 'gying bag dang bcas shing /
T02TD2590E:244b-5: rnam par sgeg pa'i lag pa mchog gis gar byed pas nam mkha'i ngos ma lus par khyab pa /
T02TD2590E:244b-6: chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur rtogs pa re zhig rang gi gzugs dpag tu med pas mchod pa'i sprin gyi dra ba sna tshogs rnam par sprul pas bdag nyid dang /
T02TD2590E:244b-7: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo mchod pa byed par rnam par brtag par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:244b-14: aom badzra a'a lo ke / aom badzra gandhe zhes bya ba ni rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du sgeg mo la sogs pa'i sngags yin te /
T02TD2590E:244b-16: de nas sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza ya h'um zhes re re zhing brjod la rdza rda brdung ba'i tshul la du la ga pas bya'o //
T02TD2590E:244b-17: de bzhin du zangs dung la sogs pa'i rol mo'i tshul dang /
T02TD2590E:244b-18: gling bu dang dung 'bud pa'i tshul gyis sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2590E:244b-19: rnga yab ltar lag pa gnyis bya ba ni rnga yab po //
T02TD2590E:244b-20: nyi ma la 'dzin pa'i tshul du bya ba ni nyi ma 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD2590E:244b-21: bsil yab kyi tshul gyis lag pa bskyod pa ni bsil yab go //
T02TD2590E:244b-22: lag pa gnyis brkyang la srin lag gnyis ba dan gsum pa'i tshul du bya ba ni rgyal mtshan no //
T02TD2590E:244b-23: lag pa gnyis gyen du brkyang la rlung gis bteg pa ltar kun du bskor la 'og tu phab pa ni ba dan no //
T02TD2590E:244b-24: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur rin po che'i phye ma 'gyed pa'i tshul du bya ba ni tshon gyi phreng ba 'gyed pa'o //
T02TD2590E:244b-25: lag pa g-yon pa snod kyi tshul du bzhag la /
T02TD2590E:244b-27: rdo rje thal mo brkyang bas ni na bza' dbul ba'o //
T02TD2590E:244b-28: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis na bza' bskon pa'i tshul du bya'o //
T02TD2590E:244b-29: lag par g-yas pas zur bzhi'i tshul du 'jam pa ltar bya ba ni khang pa brtsegs ma'o //
T02TD2590E:244b-30: mkhrig ma'i gong du gdu bu bcing ba ltar bya ba ni gdu bu'o //
T02TD2590E:244b-31: brang du do shal 'dogs pa ltar bya ba ni do shal lo //
T02TD2590E:245a-0: de bzhin du zhabs la zhabs gdub @245a * //
T02TD2590E:245a-5: sor bzhi dor bar srung skud dang /
T02TD2590E:245a-7: g-yon pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur du byas pa'i steng du lag pa g-yas pa kha spub ste brkyang pa ni gdugs so //
T02TD2590E:245a-8: lag pa g-yon pa phang bar bsam gtan gyi tshul du bzhag la /
T02TD2590E:245a-9: lag pa g-yas pa kha spub ste nam mkha' la bskor ba ni bla re'o //
T02TD2590E:245a-12: dril bu g-yer ka'i dra bas brgyan pa dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2590E:245a-13: de nas spyi bor thal mo khong stong du bzhag la /
T02TD2590E:245a-14: yi ge aom las byung ba'i gzigs ma la dang /
T02TD2590E:245a-17: glang po dang rta la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2590E:245a-19: dpag bsam gyis shing la sogs pas nam mkha'i khams khyab pa dang mnyam pas bdag nyid dang dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo mchod par bsams la /
T02TD2590E:245a-20: lag pa g-yon dang g-yas kyis rim bzhin du dril bu dang /
T02TD2590E:245a-21: rdo rje a'a: h'um zhes bya ba'i sa bon gnyis kyis blangs nas 'di brjod cid dkrol bar bya'o //
T02TD2590E:245a-22: aom badzra ghante ra ni ta /
T02TD2590E:245a-24: sarbba buddha kashe tra pra tsa li ne /
T02TD2590E:245a-25: pra dzny'a p'a ra mi t'a n'a da sva bh'a be /
T02TD2590E:245a-26: badzra dha rma hri da ya /
T02TD2590E:245a-27: santo sha ni h'um h'um h'um /
T02TD2590E:245a-28: de nas de bzhin du rdo rje dang dril bu 'chang zhing bstod par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:245a-29: bde ba las 'khrungs rdo rje 'chang ba yi //
T02TD2590E:245a-30: dngos dang dngos min 'byung gnas chen por mkhyen //
T02TD2590E:245a-31: gang du dang po rnam par snang mdzad ni //
T02TD2590E:245a-32: dag cing dri med blos ni aom du sprul //
T02TD2590E:245a-33: gzugs mang tshul gyi phreng bas bskor ba yi //
T02TD2590E:245a-34: sgyu 'phrul dra ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2590E:245a-35: gsung snyan yi ge kun la khyab pa yis //
T02TD2590E:245a-36: spros med gsung du 'jig rten dbang phyug bzhugs //
T02TD2590E:245a-37: mig gsum lha mo dang bcas 'dul mdzad pa //
T02TD2590E:245a-38: rdzu 'phrul tshul mang ldan pa 'ga' ma mchis //
T02TD2590E:245a-39: gang du bde chen rang bzhin rjes chags pa //
T02TD2590E:245a-40: lha mo dag dang lhan cig bzhad cing bzhugs //
T02TD2590E:245a-41: g-yas pa'i phyag gis rdo rje gsor nas su //
T02TD2590E:245a-42: g-yon pa'i phyag gis dril bu'i sgra snyan dkrol //
T02TD2590E:245b-0: lha mo mtha' dag @245b bcun mor gyur pa yi //
T02TD2590E:245b-1: dam tshig rnams kyis bya ba byas par 'gyur //
T02TD2590E:245b-2: gcig gi lag pa kun nas 'khyud pa ste //
T02TD2590E:245b-3: gnyis pa rjes su chags phyir bde ba'i mthu //
T02TD2590E:245b-4: gsum pa mi bzod me tog phreng ba mthor //
T02TD2590E:245b-5: bzhi pa bde ba yi ni mda' yang 'phen //
T02TD2590E:245b-6: gang zhig glu 'di len par byed pa dag / bde ba'i rdo rje can dang mnyam par 'gyur //
T02TD2590E:245b-7: mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud //
T02TD2590E:245b-8: yang dag mtha' gyur khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2590E:245b-9: stong nyid las byung khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2590E:245b-10: sangs rgyas byang chub khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2590E:245b-11: sangs rgyas chags pa khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2590E:245b-13: sangs rgyas dgyes pa khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2590E:245b-17: sangs rgyas gsung nyid khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2590E:245b-19: med pa las byung khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2590E:245b-21: nam mkha' las byung khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2590E:245b-22: ye shes las byung khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2590E:245b-24: sangs rgyas rol ston khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2590E:245b-25: thams cad thams cad khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2590E:245b-26: ye shes sku nyid khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2590E:245b-27: de nas mchod pa 'di dag thams cad byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
T02TD2590E:245b-28: aom aa nutta ra sarbba p'u dza me gha sa mungga te spa ra na ai mam ga ga na khamh'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD2590E:245b-29: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi bdag nyid yang dag par mchod par gyur cing /
T02TD2590E:245b-30: thams cad kyang sgyu ma lta bu dang /
T02TD2590E:245b-31: mig yor tsam du shes par byas la /
T02TD2590E:245b-32: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza badzra sva bh'a ba aatma ko& ham zhes brjod do //
T02TD2590E:245b-33: de bzhin du phyag rgya chen pos gnas la //
T02TD2590E:245b-34: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid 'dis bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:245b-36: de nas rang bzhin dag pa ste /
T02TD2590E:245b-37: sva bh'a wa shuddho & ham zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD2590E:245b-38: de nas thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis kyang lha thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid du bya ste /
T02TD2590E:245b-39: aom sarbba sa mo& ham zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD2590E:246a-0: de nas rang gi sngags brjod la 'di dag thams cad ni bdag yin @246a * //
T02TD2590E:246a-2: g-yo ba'i dngos po'i ngo bo nyid lus dang ngag dang sems dmigs na /
T02TD2590E:246a-3: ngo bo nyid kyis dmigs su med //
T02TD2590E:246a-4: sngags kyis lus su sbyor ba la //
T02TD2590E:246a-5: byang chub med cing bsgom pa med //
T02TD2590E:246a-7: stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid can /
T02TD2590E:246a-8: thabs dang shes rab ro gcig pa //
T02TD2590E:246a-9: zag pa med pa zag med pa //
T02TD2590E:246a-10: nyams pa med pa'i bde ba chen po sgrub pa'i thabs sgyu ma lta bu'i mtha' yas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bde ba'i gnas nam mkha' khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin las byung ba'i dam tshig chen po'i de kho ma nyid kyi mchod pa'i sprin dang /
T02TD2590E:246a-11: sngar bshad pa'i mchod pa'i tshogs dang //
T02TD2590E:246a-12: kun du snang bar gnas pa'i yul rnams kyis yang dag par mchod cing dkyil 'khor pa thams cad kyang rang gi snying po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs shing dbyer me phyed la thog ma dang dbus dang tha ma dang bral bas sangs rgyas dang ;
T02TD2590E:246a-13: / byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa'i 'od kyi spyin mtha' yas pa rnam par 'phro bas 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i phyir dang /
T02TD2590E:246a-14: nam mkha'i gtos thams cad khyab pa /
T02TD2590E:246a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rings kyi rdul phra rab las bsgrubs pa /
T02TD2590E:246a-16: rtag pa dang chad pa la sogs pa dang bral ba /
T02TD2590E:246a-17: so so rang rang gis rig par rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba /
T02TD2590E:246a-18: mchog tu dga' ba'i ngo bo nyid dpal 'jam pa'i rdo rjer bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:246a-19: gal te skyo bar gyur na rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la sngags kyi phreng ba mar me gsal bas khang pa'i nang snang bar byas pa ltar /
T02TD2590E:246a-20: lus thams cad snang bar byed pa bkod la /
T02TD2590E:246a-21: blo dang ldan pas bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02TD2590E:246a-22: myur ches pa dang bul ba dang //
T02TD2590E:246a-23: mi gsal gug skyed nyams pa dang /
T02TD2590E:246a-24: rtog pa ngan pa rnam spangs nas //
T02TD2590E:246a-25: de nas gsang sngags bzlas brjod bya //
T02TD2590E:246a-26: zlos pa na yang lha thams cad kyi zhal nas sngags kyi sgra byung bar gyur par bsams par bya ste //
T02TD2590E:246a-27: de lta byus ni lha thams cad kyis bzlas par gyur pa yin no //
T02TD2590E:246a-28: bzlas par bya ba'i sngags ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2590E:246a-30: yang na rgyud gzhan las gsungs pa'i sngags /
T02TD2590E:246b-0: aom b'a kye da na ma: @246b aom badzra tikshna zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'phags pa sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud stong phrag bcu drug pa las gsungs pa'am /
T02TD2590E:246b-1: bdag cag gi rmi lam du rnyed pa 'di bzla bar bya ste /
T02TD2590E:246b-2: aom dharmma dh'a tu w'a g'i shva ra h'um zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2590E:246b-3: yang na aom aa b'i ra h'um /
T02TD2590E:246b-4: khe tsa ra zhes bya ba'i yi ge brgyad pa'i sngags 'di ni nan song thams cad sbyongs bar byed pa /
T02TD2590E:246b-5: don thams cad sgrub par byed pa /
T02TD2590E:246b-6: bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal rang nyid sngags kyi gzugs kyis bzhugs pa bzla bar bya'o //
T02TD2590E:246b-7: ldang ba'i dus su yang bstod pa'i mchod pa byas la /
T02TD2590E:246b-8: mchod yon phul ba sngon du 'gro bas dza:h'um ba ho: zhes brjod la yid gnyis kyis rang gi lus la dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo nang du bcug la /
T02TD2590E:246b-10: mthe bo gshibs par mdzub mo'i rtse mo sbyar ba'i rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya snying ga las byung bas /
T02TD2590E:246b-11: aom badzra ratna aa bhi shinytsa zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2590E:246b-12: dbang bskur ba las sor mo gnyis kyis phreng ba bcings te /
T02TD2590E:246b-13: sarbba mu dra mee dri dhi ku ru ba ra ka ba tse na bam zhes bya ba dang //
T02TD2590E:246b-14: go bgos la mthar mnyam pa'i thal mos mnyes par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:246b-15: de na dril bu dkrol la /
T02TD2590E:246b-16: dam tshig gsum gyi glu'i mchod pa bya ste /
T02TD2590E:246b-17: yi ge brgya pas rang gis phyag rgya chen po brtan par byas nas /
T02TD2590E:246b-18: rang gi lha'i rgyal nyid kyis stan las 'gying bag dang bcas par langs la /
T02TD2590E:246b-19: dbang po thams cad kyi yul du gyur pa'i dngos po rnams rang gi lhag pa'i lha'i sbyor bas rang gi mchod pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid du bsams la /
T02TD2590E:246b-20: mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i rnal 'byor pas bya ba ma lus par rdzogs par bya'o /
T02TD2590E:246b-21: de ltar thun mtshams dang po rdzogs nas bya ba thams cad byas te /
T02TD2590E:246b-22: nyi ma gung la yang lha'i khang par zhugs te /
T02TD2590E:246b-24: rang gi sngags dang rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs pa sngon du 'gro bas rang gi lha'i da rgyal byas la /
T02TD2590E:246b-25: re re'i rang gi sngags brjod pas dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i 'khor lo phyung ba'am /
T02TD2590E:246b-26: skad cig mar rdzogs par byas la //
T02TD2590E:246b-27: yang dag par mchod cing legs par bstod la /
T02TD2590E:247a-0: dam tshig gsum blang ba'i glu'i mchod pa sngon du 'gro bas @247a * //
T02TD2590E:247a-1: nga rgyal gsum po yang dag par bskyed la mnyam par bzhag ste bzlas pa dang bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:247a-2: de nas langs la sngam bzhin du mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i rnal 'byor la spyod cing gnas par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:247a-3: de ltar thun gnyis rdzogs nas mtshan phyed la ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par mchod cing legs par bstod la /
T02TD2590E:247a-4: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs nye ba bsags pa thams cad mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos sgrub kyi phyir yongs su bsngos la /
T02TD2590E:247a-5: bzod pa gsol te lag pa gnyis kyi srin lag dang mthe'u chung dang mthe bo lu gu rgyud du sbrel la /
T02TD2590E:247a-6: gung mo dang mdzub mo brkyang bas chan pa'i tshul du bya ba ni rdo rje'i chan pa'i ste /
T02TD2590E:247a-7: des bsrung pa bshig pa'i tshul du bya bas gsal la /
T02TD2590E:247a-8: rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya bcings pa gyen du dgrol ba dang /
T02TD2590E:247a-9: snying po 'dis bcom ldan 'das gshegs su gsol lo ;
T02TD2590E:247a-10: / aom kri to ba sarbba satv'a rtha //
T02TD2590E:247a-11: siddhi ma datt'a y'a nu ga //
T02TD2590E:247a-13: pu na ra ga ma na ya tstsha /
T02TD2590E:247a-14: aom mu: mu: de nas sprul pa rang gi lus la bcug la snga ma bzhin du rdo rje rin chen gyi dbang bskur ba la sogs pa byas la //
T02TD2590E:247a-15: shes rab dang snying rjer ldan pas seng ge'i nyal thabs su rab tu brtag par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:247a-16: de ltar nyin re zhing thun bzhir bya ste /
T02TD2590E:247a-17: ji srid zla ba'am zla ba drug gam lo gcig gam /
T02TD2590E:247a-18: ji srid dkyil 'khor thams cad mngon sum du snang bar gyur pa'am /
T02TD2590E:247a-19: ji srid bye ba gnyis yongs su rdzogs 'gyur ba'am /
T02TD2590E:247a-20: dus ji srid kyi lha rnams kyis rjes su gnang bar 'gyur ba'am /
T02TD2590E:247a-21: 'gog pa'i rdo rje bsgom par bya ste /
T02TD2590E:247a-22: de bzhin du rnal 'byor byas la rang gi snying ga'i zla ba rang gi sngags kyi yi ge rang gi sems dang gnyis su med par gyur pa /
T02TD2590E:247a-23: 'od zer dkar po dpag tu mer pa dang ldan par srog rtse gcig tu bsdus la ;
T02TD2590E:247a-24: / ji srid yid brtan par gyur pa tsam gyis sgra la sogs pa nyer bar so sor snang ba'i 'dzin pa nye bar spong bar gyur pa de srid du bya'o /
T02TD2590E:247a-25: yang na rang gi snying gar nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sbyor bas zhugs pa'am /
T02TD2590E:247b-0: mdun du gnas pa'i phyogs su dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo @247b sprul la /
T02TD2590E:247b-1: thams cad gzhug cing dbang bskur ba la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pas bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rjes rdzogs par nyin re zhing thun bzhi'i rim pas ji srid de ltar snang bar gyur pa'i bar du bsgom mo //
T02TD2590E:247b-2: de nas brtsams te rgyud thams cad du dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2590E:247b-3: dngos grub thams cad kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2590E:247b-4: de bzhin du rim pa gzhan dag gis kyang bdag nyid nus pa dang ldan ldan par rtogs nas dkyil 'khor bris la zla ba nya la bsgrubs na nges par dpal 'jam pa'i rdo rjer 'gyur ro //
T02TD2590E:247b-5: de ltar bu'i nus pa dang ldan na rgyud 'di dang rgyud gzhan dag las gsungs pa /
T02TD2590E:247b-6: bu mo las sogs pa'i sgrub pa chen po dang /
T02TD2590E:247b-7: gnod sbyin ma la sogs pa'i sgrub pa yang bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang ba yin no //
T02TD2590E:247b-8: de lta bu'i nga rgyal brtan par gyur pa nyid dam /
T02TD2590E:247b-9: rgyun mi 'chad par slob pa la 'jug pa'i las dang po pa rnams la yang mchod rten gyi las rnams dang phyag bya ba la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dgag pa mdzad pa ni thams cad las mchog tu gyur pa'i phyir rnal 'byor 'di las lhag pa'i nan tan nyams su len pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2590E:247b-10: gang yang thal mal pa'i rnam par rtog pa la gnas pa des ni mchod rten kyi las dang byas ba la sogs pa bsod nams su bya ba'i dngos po'i tha snyad du bya ba thams cad nyams su blang bar bya ba'i nyid yin te //
T02TD2590E:247b-11: 'di lam zhu ba za ba lta bur gang rang nyid tha mal pa'i rnam par rtog pa la gnas bzhin du sngar bshad pa mi byed pa ni mi rigs so //
T02TD2590E:247b-12: mnyam par gzhag pa la gnas pa na yang mchod pa dang /
T02TD2590E:247b-14: mchod pa byed pa la sogs pa'i tha snyad kyi dbye ba'i rnam par rtog pa las rnam par grol ba la rang gi lha'i sbyor bas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ba nyid yin te /
T02TD2590E:247b-16: rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis /
T02TD2590E:247b-17: bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya //
T02TD2590E:247b-19: gzhan du ji ltar na shin tu byang bar bslabs pa med par zab cing rgya chen pa'i bdag nyid kyi dngos po rdzogs par 'gyur ba de bas na de dang tha dad pa ni spang bar bya ste /
T02TD2590E:248a-0: phyag bya ba'i gnas la sogs pa'i rtog pa @248a * //
T02TD2590E:248a-1: de nyid tha mal pa'i kun du rtog pa yin pas /
T02TD2590E:248a-2: rang rang gi dngos por yongs su rtog pa ji ltar spong bar 'gyur //
T02TD2590E:248a-3: bdag nyid la bdag nyid mchod pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs par gsungs te //
T02TD2590E:248a-4: 'di ni rnal 'byor pa de las so so'i sbyor bas rang gi lha'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo mngon sum du bya ba nyid skye 'gyur gyi /
T02TD2590E:248a-5: zab cing rgya chen po'i bdag nyid dngos po rdzogs pa'i rgyu nyid du mchod rten gyi las dang phyag bya ba la sogs pa de ga la 'gyur /
T02TD2590E:248a-6: gzhan du na gal te bla ma rnams la bsnyen bkur ma byas pas thos pa med cing shes rab ma sbyangs pa de nyid ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis mchod rten gyi la las sogs pa mi byed pa ni ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i rgyu yin no //
T02TD2590E:248a-7: shin tu spros pas chog go //
T02TD2590E:248a-8: gang zhig dam tshig tsam 'dod pa'i phyir /
T02TD2590E:248a-10: des bsgoms pas dge ba'i mtshan ma cung zad cig rnyed pa'am /
T02TD2590E:248a-11: bsgom pa mi nus pas dkyil 'khor pa'i lha rnams kyi re re zhing 'bum phrag gcig gam /
T02TD2590E:248a-12: yang na dpal 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i 'bum phrag gsum gzhan dag gi bzlas brjod khri byas la bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2590E:248a-13: ting nges 'dzin gsum bsgom pa ni 'dir thos pa med de rgyud gzhan las mthong ba las ltos med du bya ba ni ha cang thal ches so //
T02TD2590E:248a-14: yang na don gyi bsgom pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas ji ltar 'dod pa'i mid du bya ba la nyes pa med do //
T02TD2590E:248a-15: nyin te zhing yang lha'i khang pa'i phyi rol du dpung bzangs kyi rgyud las gsungs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis 'byor pa dang /
T02TD2590E:248a-16: rjes su mthun pa'i gtor ma mtshan mo sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:248a-17: de ltar mkhas shin byang ba'i sngon du bsnyen pa'i 'di bshad pa'i //
T02TD2590E:248a-18: bsod nams 'dis ni 'gro la phan pa'i dngos grib 'byung gyur cing //
T02TD2590E:248a-19: bdag kyang ji srid nam mkha'i khams kyi mthar thug srid gsum la //
T02TD2590E:248a-20: phan pa mdzad pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang skur gcig nyid gyur cig //
T02TD2590E:248a-21: sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2590E:248a-22: rnam par rtog spangs zab cing rgya che la /
T02TD2590E:248a-23: sna tshogs sprul pas 'gro ba'i don mdzad cing /
T02TD2590E:248a-24: rnam dag rig dang gnyis med sku 'chang ba //
T02TD2590E:248a-25: 'dod lha 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2590E:248b-0: de ltar sngon du bsnyen @248b pa byas nas dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad yang dag par bsags na /
T02TD2590E:248b-1: tshes grangs dang gza' rgyu skar dang /
T02TD2590E:248b-2: byed pa la sogs pa shis pa la snga dro'i dus su grogs bzang po dang /
T02TD2590E:248b-3: dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi yongs su brtag par bya ste /
T02TD2590E:248b-8: byang gi phyogs kyi cha mdor na sa gzhi bzang zhing snum pa /
T02TD2590E:248b-9: zug rngu'i nyes pa dang bral ba /
T02TD2590E:248b-10: shar ram byang du gzhol ba /
T02TD2590E:248b-11: me tog gi shing la sogs pa dang ldan pa /
T02TD2590E:248b-13: yang na yin mngon par dga' ba gang yang rung ba der brtsam par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:248b-14: de nas bdag po 'i sbyor ba byas las /
T02TD2590E:248b-15: gnas kyi bdag po la sogs pa la gtor ma dang mchod pa byas nas blang bar bya'o //
T02TD2590E:248b-16: gal te rmi lam la sogs pa de thob par ma gyur na //
T02TD2590E:248b-17: de'i tshe nyin zhag gzhan gyi nyi ma'i gung la dkyil khor gyi sa'i dbus su khro bo'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas dug dang khrag dang /
T02TD2590E:248b-18: lan tshva ba la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2590E:248b-20: phat gyi mtha' dang ldan pas mngon spyod kyi sbyin sreg gi cho gas g-yon pa'i mdzub mo dang mthe bo sbyar ba dang /
T02TD2590E:248b-21: dkyil 'khor gyi bgegs nye bar gzhom pa'i phyir sbyin sreg byas la phyi dro'i dus su khrus bya zhing lus dri zhim pos byugs la zhi ba'i sbyin sreg de'i cho gas byas la /
T02TD2590E:248b-22: bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyis bgegs bskrad de gnas bsrung ba byas la /
T02TD2590E:248b-23: de yang de nyid kyis yungs kar dang chu la sogs pa la lan bdun bzlas pas mngon par gtor te /
T02TD2590E:248b-26: rked pa tsam 'og tu dngos grub mchog dang bar ma'i dbye bas brkos la /
T02TD2590E:248b-32: gyo mo la sogs pa bsal nas dri bzang po'i sa gzhan dag pa chu dri zhim pas bkang la /
T02TD2590E:248b-33: yi ge h'um yongs su bzlas pa'i spos chus chags chag btab ste /
T02TD2590E:248b-34: 'thas par brdungs la lag pa'i mthil ltar mnyam par byas nas /
T02TD2590E:248b-35: khang pa brtseg ma'i nang du chud par bya ste /
T02TD2590E:249a-0: skar khung dra ba can gyis kun @249a * //
T02TD2590E:249a-2: shin tu sna tshogs pa'i me tog gi phreng ba dril bu btags pa dang /
T02TD2590E:249a-3: rgyal mtshan dang ba dan gyi mchog bres nas las thams cad pa bzlas ba'i dris nye bar byugs te /
T02TD2590E:249a-4: de nyid bzlas pa'i rin po che dang /
T02TD2590E:249a-5: sman dang 'bru thams cad bu ga'i dbus kyi char gzhug par bya'o /
T02TD2590E:249a-6: zug rngu'i nyes pa thams cad ni //
T02TD2590E:249a-7: gal te dbyung ba rmi nus na //
T02TD2590E:249a-8: lag pa bram zhing gsang sngags bzlas //
T02TD2590E:249a-9: de yi sbyang ba de yin no //
T02TD2590E:249a-10: khang steng dang rdo leb dang /
T02TD2590E:249a-11: ba lang gi lhas dang gtsug lag khang la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2590E:249a-12: chu 'gram dang sa'i cha yongs su sbyangs zin pa rnams su slar yang sbyang ba la sogs pa mi bya'o //
T02TD2590E:249a-13: rnam pa gzhan du bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyis bgegs bskrad la de bzlas pa'i yungs kar dang /
T02TD2590E:249a-14: chu dang thal ba rnams mngon par gtor nas /
T02TD2590E:249a-16: ba'i rnam lngas nye bar byugs la /
T02TD2590E:249a-17: dri'i spos chus kyang yang dag par bsang gtor byas te /
T02TD2590E:249a-18: de nyid bzlas pa'i rin po che sna bdun dang /
T02TD2590E:249a-19: sman dang 'bru rnams der sa'i dbus su gzhug par bya ste /
T02TD2590E:249a-20: 'di gnyi ga ni sa sbyang ba'i cho ga yin no //
T02TD2590E:249a-21: de las sa gzhi de lta bur nyin re'am zla re'am /
T02TD2590E:249a-22: lo re dkyil 'khor bri bar 'dod pas sa yongs su gzung bar bya ste /
T02TD2590E:249a-23: zla ba nya nas brtsams nas phyi ma'i nya'i bar du'am /
T02TD2590E:249a-24: tshes gcig nas brtsams nas tshes brgyad kyi bar du'am /
T02TD2590E:249a-25: chos dgu la sogs pa nas brtsams te /
T02TD2590E:249a-26: zla ba nya nyid dam thun mtshams snga ma'i dus nas brtsams te ;
T02TD2590E:249a-27: / nyin zhag de nyid la dkyil 'khor gyi las la shin tu mkhas pa dag gis bya ste /
T02TD2590E:249a-28: ji skad du bshad pa'i cho ga yongs su rdzogs pas nyin zhag 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin no //
T02TD2590E:249a-29: de la nyin zhag dang gza' la gcig tu mngon par zhen pa rnams kyi phyir /
T02TD2590E:249a-30: bcom ldan 'das kyis nyin zhag gi nges par gsungs pa yin gyis /
T02TD2590E:249a-31: blo rnams par dag pa rnams kyi phyir ni ma yin no //
T02TD2590E:249a-32: de la slob dpon bdag nyid 'jam pa'i rdo rje ji lta ba bzhin du gyur par byas las /
T02TD2590E:249a-33: dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus kyi dbus mar 'dug ste /
T02TD2590E:249b-0: sngar bshad pa'i rim pas bgegs @249b gzhom pa dang /
T02TD2590E:249b-1: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo spro pa la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bar byas la /
T02TD2590E:249b-2: rol pa'i stang stabs kyis rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sprul pa'i sprin bkye nas phyogs bcur de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad la khyed rnams kyis 'dir byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas mdzad de //
T02TD2590E:249b-3: slob dpon dang de'i slob ma rnams kyi bsrung bar mdzod cig ces bskul la /
T02TD2590E:249b-4: de nye bar bsdus te rang gi snying ga'i rdo rje'i nang du bsgoms la /
T02TD2590E:249b-5: de las byung ba'i dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD2590E:249b-6: gcig tu byas la bdag nyid dpal 'jam pa'i rdo rje de'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs pa sngon du 'gro bas skyil mo krung bshig ste langs la //
T02TD2590E:249b-7: g-yon pa'i mig tu ta las zla ba bya //
T02TD2590E:249b-8: g-yas par ma bkod nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bskyed /
T02TD2590E:249b-9: h'um gis mig 'bras bskal pa'i me lta bu //
T02TD2590E:249b-10: gnas pa 'dis ni rdo rje'i blta ba bya //
T02TD2590E:249b-11: lag pa g-yas pas rdo rje gsor te /
T02TD2590E:249b-12: g-yon pa dkur brten bas dril bu dkrol zhing rkang pa'i 'og tu dbyangs kyi yi ge tha ma bkod pa las byung ba'i sna tshogs rdo rje 'bar ba dang /
T02TD2590E:249b-13: khro bo rgyan dang bcas pa'i rgyal dang ldan pas thams cad du rnam par blta zhing bskor bas yongs su song la bskrad cing dgug pa thams cad la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:249b-14: slob dpon ming 'di zhes bya ba /
T02TD2590E:249b-15: slob ma che ge mo zhes bya ba rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dang /
T02TD2590E:249b-16: sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi 'bras bu thob pa'i phyir sa phyogs 'dir dpal 'jam pa'i rdo rje 'byung zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po'i 'dri yis /
T02TD2590E:249b-31: rgan mo g-yog dang 'khor du bcas pa gang dag 'khod pa rnams dengs shig /
T02TD2590E:249b-32: deng 'di ltar rdo rje 'chang gi bka' thos nas myur ba nyid du dengs shig /
T02TD2590E:250a-1: dag mi 'gro ba de dag nga'i ye shes kyi rdo rjes mgo tshal ba brgyar rnam par 'gas par bya'o zhes lan gsum brjod la shin tu 'jigs su rung ba lta bu'i khro ba'i gzugs dpag tu med pa phyung ste /
T02TD2590E:250a-2: de rnams nyid kyis gong du smos pa thams cad 'byer bar byas par rnam par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:250a-3: de nas mthun pa'i rkang stabs kyi gnas pas 'dug la /
T02TD2590E:250a-4: spyi bor thal mo sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2590E:250a-5: sngags pa shar phyogs kha bltas nas //
T02TD2590E:250a-6: de bzhin gshegs rnams phyag byas la /
T02TD2590E:250a-7: rnam par 'gyur zhing sgeg mchog bcas //
T02TD2590E:250a-8: rdo rje gom pas gar bya'o //
T02TD2590E:250a-9: thal mo spyi bo nas phab ste //
T02TD2590E:250a-10: snying gar padma'i sul gyis ni //
T02TD2590E:250a-11: yongs bskor rdo rje khu tshur gyis //
T02TD2590E:250a-12: phyogs nas kun du bcing bar bya //
T02TD2590E:250a-13: khu tshur de ni gnyis byas la //
T02TD2590E:250a-14: bsnyems pas gsor bar rab brtson pas /
T02TD2590E:250a-15: dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsams nas ni //
T02TD2590E:250a-16: tsham dam thams cad bcing bar bya //
T02TD2590E:250a-17: zhes bya ba'i rim pa 'di dang de bzhin du khro bo'i nga rgyal bsgyings dang bcas shing brjid bag dang bcas pas gar sngon du 'gro ba'i g-yas brkyang pa la sogs pa'i rdo rje 'gros kyis yongs su bskor la /
T02TD2590E:250a-18: gnas ji lta bur h'um rdo rje che ge mo bdag go zhes brjod nas /
T02TD2590E:250a-19: dkyil 'khor gyis gzhi gtan pa la thug gi bar du 'bar zhing 'bar ba lta bu'i rdo rje rtse mo gyes pa'i rang bzhin du sa gzhi byin gyis brlabs par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:250a-20: g-yas brkyang pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2590E:250a-21: byin pa g-yon pa bkug la /
T02TD2590E:250a-22: g-yas pa rgyar mtho lngar brkyang ba ni g-yas brkyang ba'o //
T02TD2590E:250a-23: g-yas pa bkug la g-yon brkyang ba ni g-yon brkyang pa'o //
T02TD2590E:250a-24: rkang pa'i sor mo phyir bstan la sor mo nyi shu rtsa drug gis chod par byas nas /
T02TD2590E:250a-25: pus mo brkyang bar byas pa ni sa ga'i 'dug stangs su 'gyur ro //
T02TD2590E:250a-26: de bzhin du gnas pa las lag pa gnyis brkyang ste ngang pa'i gshog pa ltar bya ba ni zlum po'i 'dug stangs so //
T02TD2590E:250a-27: rkang pa'i mthe bo dang sor mo rnams 'byor par phan tshun bcer ba ni mthun pa'i rkang stabs so //
T02TD2590E:250b-0: rkang pa g-yas pas rkang pa g-yon mnan pa ni rus @250b sbal gyi rkang stabs so //
T02TD2590E:250b-1: rdo rje snying gar bstod pa'i tshul du 'jog pa ni rdo rje brdeg pa'o //
T02TD2590E:250b-2: rdo rje nyid sgeg pa dang bcas pas bskor ba ni 'jo tshul lo //
T02TD2590E:250b-3: rkang pa gcig bteg la gcig gis g-yas su bskor ba ni rkang pa gcig gi stang stabs so //
T02TD2590E:250b-4: lus kyi g-yas dang g-yon dag tu kun nas bskor ba ni bung ba 'phur ba'i stang stabs so //
T02TD2590E:250b-5: g-yas brkyang bas rang gi khar lag pa g-yon pa'i mkhrig ma brkyang la de'i steng du g-yas pa'i mkhrig ma sbyar te lag pa brkyang pa ni seng ge'i stang stabs so //
T02TD2590E:250b-6: 'di nyid las rgyab tu lta ba byed pa ni seng ge'i glal bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2590E:250b-7: snying gar rdo rje bcing ba dral bar byed pa ni rdo rje lcags sgrog go //
T02TD2590E:250b-8: lag pa gnyis kyis rdo rje bskor te steng du gzhag pa ni rdo rje gsor ba'o //
T02TD2590E:250b-9: rdo rje bsnun pa'i tshul ni rdo rje'i stang stabs so //
T02TD2590E:250b-10: rdo rje gar byas las lag pa g-yon pa brkyang ste /
T02TD2590E:250b-11: de'i rtsa bar g-yas pa kha ti khas gzhag pa ni rdo rje gar du 'gyur ro //
T02TD2590E:250b-12: kha'i steng 'og shin tu gdangs la de nyid dang 'jigs su rung ba lta bur byed pa ni rdo rje 'jigs su rung ba'o //
T02TD2590E:250b-13: lag pa gnyis kyis ro bzung la 'cha' ba'i tshul du byed cing yongs su bskor ba ni rdo rje ro langs ma'o //
T02TD2590E:250b-14: rdo rje khu tshur gyis tho ba 'degs pa ltar byed pa ni rdo rje tho ba'o //
T02TD2590E:250b-15: shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su mi bskyod pa las sogs pa'i sbyor bas stong pa nyid la sogs pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo bzhi bsgom zhing yongs su bskor ba ni sgo bzhi byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2590E:250b-16: bskor zhing rdo rje yongs su bskor la rim gyis sa las rkang pa gnyis 'jog pa ni rdo rje gdu bu'o //
T02TD2590E:250b-17: rdo rje gar sngon du 'gro ba'i dkur brten pa gnyis kyis mgo g-yon phyogs su 'dud pa ni bud med kyi sgyu 'phrul lo //
T02TD2590E:250b-18: lag pa g-yon gnas pa'i khro bo'i rdo rje'i nang du gdug pa thams cad chud par bsams la /
T02TD2590E:250b-19: lag pa g-yas na gnas pa'i khro bo'i rdo rjes bsnun pa ni rdo rje dral ba'o //
T02TD2590E:250b-20: lag pa g-yon pa rdo rje rtse gsum pa lta bur byas la g-yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis yi ltar byas pas bteg nas 'jog pa ni stobs po che 'degs pa'o //
T02TD2590E:250b-21: rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya ni bshad zin to //
T02TD2590E:251a-1: ha zhes dgod pas yang dang yang du byed pa ni rdo rje bzhad par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2590E:251a-2: rdo rje dril bu dkrol ba ni rdo rje sgra'o //
T02TD2590E:251a-3: g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyis shugs la drangs te /
T02TD2590E:251a-4: g-yas pa'i khu tshur ral gri'i tshul du gzhag pa ni ral gri'i thabs so //
T02TD2590E:251a-5: g-yas pa'i rdo rje rtse gsum pa 'degs pa ni rdo rje'i thabs so //
T02TD2590E:251a-6: snying gar rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis mthe'u chung dang mdzub mo phan tshun rdo rje bcing ba byas la /
T02TD2590E:251a-7: 'khor lo ltar dgrol ba ni 'khor lo'i thabs so //
T02TD2590E:251a-8: rdo rje bsdams pas gtun shing 'dzin pa'i tshul du bya ba ni gtun shing gi thabs so//
T02TD2590E:251a-9: g-yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi mdzub mo dang gung mo sgeg pa dang bcas pas gyen du brkyang la 'jog pa ni ba dan gyi thabs so //
T02TD2590E:251a-10: 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya nyid ni zhags pa'i thabs so //
T02TD2590E:251a-11: thal mo khong stong las padma lta bur byed pa ni padma'i tshul lo //
T02TD2590E:251a-12: g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyi mthe bo nang nas bteg pa'i pa ni be con gyi thabs so //
T02TD2590E:251a-13: lag pa g-yas pas mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i tshul du byed pa ni mi 'jigs pa'i tshul lo //
T02TD2590E:251a-14: g-yas pa'i mdzub mos 'gugs pa'i tshul du byed pa ni lcags kyu'i thabs so //
T02TD2590E:251a-15: lag pa g-yas pa'i sor mo rnams brkyang la bskum pa na gdengs ka'i tshul lo //
T02TD2590E:251a-16: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis 'degs pa ltar byed pa ni mdung thung gi thabs so //
T02TD2590E:251a-17: lag pa g-yon pas gzhu 'dzin pa ltar byed pa ni gzhu'i thabs so //
T02TD2590E:251a-18: g-yas pa'i mdzub mo dang gung mo gnyis kyis mda' 'dzin pa ltar byed pa ni mda' bzung ba'i thabs so //
T02TD2590E:251a-19: de dag nyid kyis mda' 'phen pa ltar byed pa ni mda' 'phang ba'i thabs so //
T02TD2590E:251a-20: lag pa g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyis thag mdung bskor ba'i tshul du byed pa ni thag mdung gi thabs so //
T02TD2590E:251a-21: lag pa g-yas pas mchog sbyin pa'i tshul du 'jog pa ni mchog sbyin pa'i tshul lo //
T02TD2590E:251a-22: gsor ba sngon du 'gro bas lag pa g-yas pas mdung thung 'phen pa ltar byed pa ni mdung thung gi thabs so //
T02TD2590E:251a-23: mtshon rtse gcig pa 'phan pa'i tshul du byed pa ni /
T02TD2590E:251a-24: mtshon rtse gcig pa'i thabs so //
T02TD2590E:251b-0: thal mo sbyar ba stod par byed pa'i tshul gyis snying gar 'jog pa ni phyag @251b 'tshal ba'i tshul lo //
T02TD2590E:251b-1: da ni rdo rje'i 'dug stangs la sogs pas dbus su gnas la /
T02TD2590E:251b-2: yi ge h'um 'don pa sngon du 'gro bas de bzhin du sa gzhi rdo rje'i rang bzhin du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:251b-3: de la mi bskyod pa'i phyag rgya nyid ni rdo rje'i 'dug stangs so //
T02TD2590E:251b-4: 'od dpag tu med pa'i phyag rgya nyid ni bsam gtan gyi tshul lo //
T02TD2590E:251b-6: brla'i dbus su rkang pa g-yon pa bzhag la de'i steng du g-yas pa gzhag pa ni rdo rje'i skyil mo krung ngo //
T02TD2590E:251b-7: byin pa g-yas pas byin pa g-yon pa mnan la /
T02TD2590E:251b-8: pus mo gnyis phab pa ni padma'i 'dug stangs so //
T02TD2590E:251b-9: brla g-yon pa'i steng du rkang ba g-yas pa bzhag la /
T02TD2590E:251b-10: g-yon pa de'i 'og tu gzhag pa sems dpa'i skyil mo krung ngo //
T02TD2590E:251b-11: rkang pa g-yon pa'i skyil mo krung phyed pa bcas pa de dang nye bar rkang pa g-yas pa drang por gzhag pa ni dpa' bo'i 'dug stangs so //
T02TD2590E:251b-12: rkang pa gnyis drang por brkyang la stan la gnas te 'jog pa ni bzang po'i 'dug stangs so //
T02TD2590E:251b-13: rkang pa gnyis mtho gang gis chod par stan la bzhag la tsog tsog por 'dug pa ni tsog po'i 'dug stangs so //
T02TD2590E:251b-14: rkang pa g-yan pa sems dpa'i skyil mo krung phyed par brten par byas la g-yas pa sgeg pa dang bcas pas brkyang pa ni rtse pa'i stang stabs so //
T02TD2590E:251b-15: 'di nyid du rdo rje'i lta ba dag gis mdun du lta ba ni mdun du bsgrub pa'o //
T02TD2590E:251b-16: 'di nyid du rgyab tu lta ba ni phyir 'gyed pa'o //
T02TD2590E:251b-17: de nas snga ma bzhin du gar byas la /
T02TD2590E:251b-18: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis phan tshun kha sprad de /
T02TD2590E:251b-19: rkeng [*rkang] pa g-yon par bzhag pas stang stabs nye bar bsdus la dbus dang dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su mtha' yas dang rnam par rgyal ba dang /
T02TD2590E:251b-21: gsus po che dang rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i phur bu lnga po bdag po lda'i ngo bo nyid khro bo'i gzugs su byung ba /
T02TD2590E:251b-22: sku smad rdo rje rtse gcig pa lta bu ao gha gha zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis rim bzhin du btab la /
T02TD2590E:251b-23: de rnams kyis kyang sa 'og la thug gi bar du phur bus btab par ji lta ba bzhin du bsams la /
T02TD2590E:251b-24: dpal 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02TD2590E:252a-0: yi ge h'um zlos shing bdag nyid ni dpal 'jam pa'i rdo rje yin @252a * //
T02TD2590E:252a-1: no zhes nges par bya ba gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD2590E:252a-2: de nas yi ge h'um gis chos kyi dbyings khyab la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /
T02TD2590E:252a-4: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba ste /
T02TD2590E:252a-5: rnam par thar ba'i sgo bzhi po'i ngo bo nyid stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs rnams kyis brgyan pa /
T02TD2590E:252a-6: ston ka'i zla ba ltar dkar ba'i padma byang chub kyi sems kyis yongs su gang ba /
T02TD2590E:252a-7: 'o ma can gyi rgya mtsho lta bu bsams la /
T02TD2590E:252a-8: der yang hri gnas pa las byung ba'i padma nam mkha'i khams ma lus pa dang /
T02TD2590E:252a-9: mnyam par 'jug pa'i tshad tsam gyi lte ba la aa las byung ba'i sna tshogs rdo rje de'i steng du chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgya zur gsum par gnas pa'i yi ge bhr'um gyi 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa las byung ba'i rnam par snad mdzad rig pa dang bcas pa las byug ba'i thub pa'i dbang po dpag tu med pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gsal bas phyogs bcu'i tshogs thams cad khyab pa /
T02TD2590E:252a-10: yid kyi rang bzhin gyi mchod pa chen po'i khyad par gyis brgyan pa bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid ri gangs can ltar dkar ba'i mchod rten chen po'i nang du chud pa /
T02TD2590E:252a-11: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi bzhugs gnas rin po che ma lus pa las bsgrubs pa'i bdag nyid can gnas gtsang ma'i steng na gzhal yas khang sgyu ma lta bu mig yor tsam du snang ba rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2590E:252a-12: sngar bshad pa'i rim gyis phur bu dang /
T02TD2590E:252a-16: phyogs bcing ba la sogs pa byas nas gnas te /
T02TD2590E:252a-17: 'di ltar 'bar ba'i phreng ba kun du 'khrug pa /
T02TD2590E:252a-18: rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2590E:252a-19: bsang gtor la sogs pa yang dag par sbyangs te /
T02TD2590E:252a-20: sgo bzhi dang mtshams bzhir spos snod la sogs pa dang glu dang rol mo dang /
T02TD2590E:252a-21: gar la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2590E:252a-22: lag pas bram zhing dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad dang bcas pa'i yi ge brgya pa lan bdun yang dag par bzlas nas /
T02TD2590E:252b-0: de @252b nyid du yid mnyam par bzhag nas nyal bar bya'o //
T02TD2590E:252b-1: sa yongs su gzung ba'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2590E:252b-2: de nas nyi ma gnyis pa la nang par nyid du bdag po'i sbyor ba byas la /
T02TD2590E:252b-3: yi ge bam las byung ba'i sa'i lha mo lag na bum pa thogs pa 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgyas bkug la dbus su gnas pa la dgug pa la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD2590E:252b-5: skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD2590E:252b-6: spyod pa'i tshul gyi khyad par dang //
T02TD2590E:252b-7: sa dang pha rol phyin pa la //
T02TD2590E:252b-8: lha mo khyod ni dpang du gyur //
T02TD2590E:252b-9: dngos grub thams cad 'phel ba'i phyir //
T02TD2590E:252b-10: bdag gis dkyil 'khor bri bar bya //
T02TD2590E:252b-11: zhes lan gsum brjod pas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02TD2590E:252b-12: de nas phyi dro'i dus su khrus bya zhing lus dris bsgos la /
T02TD2590E:252b-13: ji snyed pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan te /
T02TD2590E:252b-14: shin tu dmar po'i gos bgo ba dang /
T02TD2590E:252b-15: me tog gi phreng ba gdags shing kha dri zhim por byas pa dang /
T02TD2590E:252b-16: dkyil 'khor gyi sa dris nye bar byugs la me tog gi dri zhim po dang dris nye bar mdzes par snga ma bzhin du byas la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug ste /
T02TD2590E:252b-17: sgrub pa'i thabs kyi rim pas bgegs bsal ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas //
T02TD2590E:252b-18: rnal 'byor chen po rdzogs par byas nas sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du 'dug ste /
T02TD2590E:252b-19: dpal 'jam pa'i rdo rje bdag nyid spro ba bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:252b-20: deng ni bdag tshe 'bras bu yod //
T02TD2590E:252b-21: bdag gi gson pa'ang 'bras bur bcas //
T02TD2590E:252b-22: lha dang dam tshig bri mnyam par //
T02TD2590E:252b-23: gyur par bdag ni som nyi med //
T02TD2590E:252b-24: byang chub sems dang sems gcig las //
T02TD2590E:252b-25: mi ldog par ni bdag gyur te //
T02TD2590E:252b-26: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su ni //
T02TD2590E:252b-27: deng bdag skye bar the tshom med //
T02TD2590E:252b-28: deng bdag nyi ma dam pa ste //
T02TD2590E:252b-29: bdag gi mchog sbyin bla na med //
T02TD2590E:252b-30: sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren pas //
T02TD2590E:252b-31: deng bdag 'dus pa'i mchog yin no //
T02TD2590E:252b-32: ma lus phyogs na bzhugs pa yi //
T02TD2590E:252b-33: sangs rgyas thams cad dgongs su gsol //
T02TD2590E:252b-34: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis //
T02TD2590E:252b-35: rdo rje can gyi dkyil 'khor bri //
T02TD2590E:252b-36: deng 'dir sangs rgyas kun gshegs te //
T02TD2590E:253a-3: dkyil 'khor spro ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas snga ma bzhin du bskyed la /
T02TD2590E:253a-4: dpal 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i gnas na gnas shing de'i phyag rgya chen po dang ldan pa /
T02TD2590E:253a-5: de'i gsang sngags zlos pa la brtson pa'i rnal 'byor pa la nam mkha'i ngos nas mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis sam /
T02TD2590E:253a-6: de'i phyag rgya'i nga rgyal dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa'i grogs mchog thams cad kyis dkyil 'khor chen po bri bar bya ba'i phyir bdag nyid la gsol ba 'debs par gyur //
T02TD2590E:253a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba //
T02TD2590E:253a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas //
T02TD2590E:253a-10: chos kun bdag med pa yi mchog / dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol //
T02TD2590E:253a-11: mtshan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs //
T02TD2590E:253a-12: mtshan min thams cad rnam spangs pa //
T02TD2590E:253a-13: kun du bzang po'i sku yi mchog / dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol //
T02TD2590E:253a-14: zhi ba'i chos ni mchog las byung //
T02TD2590E:253a-15: ye shes spyod pa rnam sbyong ba //
T02TD2590E:253a-16: kun du bzang po gsung gi mchog / dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol //
T02TD2590E:253a-17: sems can kun gyi sems chen po //
T02TD2590E:253a-18: rang bzhin dag pa dri ma med //
T02TD2590E:253a-19: kun bzang thugs mchog kha lo sgyur //
T02TD2590E:253a-20: dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol //
T02TD2590E:253a-21: de nas langs la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis nam mkha' kun du gang bar bsams nas de'i zhabs la phyag byas la nga rgyal bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:253a-22: bdag nyid rdo rje can rang nyid //
T02TD2590E:253a-23: 'jam pa'i rdo rje bdag rang nyid //
T02TD2590E:253a-24: bdag ni sangs rgyas rgyal po che //
T02TD2590E:253a-25: stobs chen rdo rje can bdag yin //
T02TD2590E:253a-26: rnal 'byor dbang phyug rgyal po bdag / phyag na rdo rje brtan bdag ste //
T02TD2590E:253a-27: bdag po rdo rje chen por bdag / byin gyis brlab pa mi 'dor ro //
T02TD2590E:253a-28: de nas rdo rje dang dril bu 'chang bas h'um badzrong tishtha zhes bya ba ji ltar sprul pa'i 'khor lo nam mkha'i phyogs su bteg la /
T02TD2590E:253b-0: snga ma bzhin du g-yas brkyang ba la sogs pa'i stang stabs kyis sa gzhi rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas la gzhal yas khang @253b yang bskyed de //
T02TD2590E:253b-1: de'i 'og tu sna tshogs rdo rje'i steng du yi ge h'um las byung ba /
T02TD2590E:253b-5: phyag bzhi pa rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang padma dang dril bu bsnams pa /
T02TD2590E:253b-6: rdo rje'i rgyu'i ngo bo nyid dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid bsams la /
T02TD2590E:253b-7: sgo dbye ba'i phyag rgyas sgo phye ste /
T02TD2590E:253b-8: 'dis gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dgug par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:253b-9: aom badzra mandal la h'um mdza: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis mdzub mo dang mthe bo'i rdo rje ni 'di'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2590E:253b-10: de nas yongs su gyur pa las zur bzhi la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i rnam pa 'dir byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:253b-11: aom ma h'a badzra tsakra aa dhi tishtha siddhi h'um /
T02TD2590E:253b-12: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis mgal me'i 'khor lo ltar bskor ba ni 'di'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2590E:253b-13: de nas seng ldeng gi phur bu sngar bshad pa'i bsam gtan gyi phur bu lta bu la /
T02TD2590E:253b-15: srad bu dmar po dang phreng ba dmar pos dkris pa bzhi la bzlas brjod lan brgya bya ste /
T02TD2590E:253b-16: g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyis bzung nas g-yas pas rdo rje 'bar ba'i tho ba tsandan dmar pos byugs shing srad bu dmar po dang /
T02TD2590E:253b-17: me tog dmar pos dkris pas phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams bzhir gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:253b-18: aom badzra k'i li k'i la ya /
T02TD2590E:253b-20: rdo rje phur bu'i sngags so //
T02TD2590E:253b-21: aom badzra mudga ra aa ko ta ya h'um /
T02TD2590E:253b-23: sngags bshad pa'i mtha' yas dang rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pas gnas lngar phur bus gdab pa'am /
T02TD2590E:253b-24: phyag rgyas phur bus gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:253b-25: rdo rje bsdams pa las nang du bcings la gung mo gnyis gshibs te mdzub mo gnyis bkug la mthe bo'i steng du gzhag pa ni phur bus gdab pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2590E:253b-26: de nas bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyis bgegs bskrad pa la sogs pa byas la de nyid zos pa'i grogs kyis dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi dris nye bar byugs pa dang /
T02TD2590E:253b-27: me tog dri zhim po'i sil mas nye bar mdzes par byed du bcug la /
T02TD2590E:253b-28: de bzhin du rang gi bdag po'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas h'um zlos pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /
T02TD2590E:253b-29: lha thams cad kyi gnas su dri'i dkyil 'khor bya'o //
T02TD2590E:254a-1: sam rang rang gi sngags kyis dkyil 'khor ba'i lha rnams bton la /
T02TD2590E:254a-2: gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bzhag nas /
T02TD2590E:254a-3: sngar bshad pa'i spyan drangs pa la sogs pa'i rim gyis nam mkha'i gnas nas phab ste /
T02TD2590E:254a-4: gcig tu byas la sku la sogs pa'i byin gyis brlab pa sngon du 'gro bas rang gi sngags dang phyag rgya dang bcas pa nye bar brtan la /
T02TD2590E:254a-5: dbang bskur nas yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD2590E:254a-6: legs par bstod nas phyag bya'o //
T02TD2590E:254a-7: de nas rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa rtsa ba mi gnag pa mchu 'phyang ba dang /
T02TD2590E:254a-10: me tog gi phreng ba dang /
T02TD2590E:254a-11: ras kyis mgul ba bcings pa /
T02TD2590E:254a-12: 'dab ma dri zhim po dang 'bras bus kha bkab pa /
T02TD2590E:254a-13: rang gi bdag po'i mtshan mas mtshan pa blangs la /
T02TD2590E:254a-14: kanda ka ri dkar po dang /
T02TD2590E:254a-17: gi ri ka ra ni dkar po dang /
T02TD2590E:254a-29: mu tig dang nor bu ste /
T02TD2590E:254a-30: rin po che lnga dang ldan pa /
T02TD2590E:254a-31: yi ge bam las rin po che'i rang bzhin du bskyed la /
T02TD2590E:254a-32: bdag po'i sngags dang yi ge h'um re re zhing lan brgya rtsa brgyad dam /
T02TD2590E:254a-33: stong rtsa brgyad mchod yon la yongs su bzlas te bum pa'i steng du bzhag nas chu cung zad bcug la /
T02TD2590E:254a-34: de'i dbus su pam las byung ba'i padma de'i steng du aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams la /
T02TD2590E:254a-35: der lha rnams kyi 'khor lo rang gi dam tshig gi gnas pas bzhugs par yi ge h'um ngam /
T02TD2590E:254a-36: rang gi sngags kyis bsams la /
T02TD2590E:254a-37: de las byung ba'i byang chub kyi chus yongs su gang bar bsgoms nas rdo rje sems mas yongs su bzung ba'i me tog gi lcug mas rdo rje dang bcas pa dang /
T02TD2590E:254a-38: dkyil 'khor ba'i lha thams cad kyi sngags mngon par bzlas la /
T02TD2590E:254a-39: aom badzrod ka h'um zhes bya ba brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bzlas te /
T02TD2590E:254a-40: bdud rtsi thab sbyor yongs su bzlas pa'i me tog bcug la /
T02TD2590E:254a-42: sgeg mo la sogs pas yang dag par mchod nas /
T02TD2590E:254b-1: bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i spyan sngar gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:254b-2: de bzhin du dkyil 'khor du bzhag nas kyang dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i sngags dang /
T02TD2590E:254b-3: yi ge h'um gnyis mngon par bzla bar bya'o //
T02TD2590E:254b-4: bum pa lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2590E:254b-5: de nas phyi rol du song ste phyogs kyi gtor ma byin nas lha rnams tshim par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2590E:254b-6: sbyin sreg kyang byas nas dkyil 'khor gyi sar zhugs te /
T02TD2590E:254b-7: snga ma bzhin du rdo rje lce bsams la /
T02TD2590E:254b-8: aom padma sa ra sva sti /
T02TD2590E:254b-9: sa tyam aa brta ya sho ya h'um hr'i:ra:hr'i:zhes bya bas lce byin gyis brlabs la spos snod lag na thogs shing lus thams cad kyis phyag byas la /
T02TD2590E:254b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad lhag par gnas par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:254b-11: thugs brtse phan pa'i dgongs pa can //
T02TD2590E:254b-12: sangs rgyas bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T02TD2590E:254b-13: rdo rje can bdag 'di zhes bya //
T02TD2590E:254b-15: slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang /
T02TD2590E:254b-16: khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir //
T02TD2590E:254b-17: yo byad ci 'byor pa yis ni //
T02TD2590E:254b-18: nang par bdag ni bri bar bgyid //
T02TD2590E:254b-19: bdag dang slob mar bcas pa la //
T02TD2590E:254b-20: thugs brtse nye bar bzung nas ni //
T02TD2590E:254b-21: tshogs pa thams cad dkyil 'khor du //
T02TD2590E:254b-22: byin gyis rlob par mdzod du gsol //
T02TD2590E:254b-23: sras dang bcas par gshegs nas ni //
T02TD2590E:254b-24: sa gzhi yongs su gzung bar mdzod //
T02TD2590E:254b-25: de nas sems can thams cad lhag par gnas par bya ste /
T02TD2590E:254b-26: de la dang por re zhig slob ma legs par khrus byas shing /
T02TD2590E:254b-27: gos gtsang ma bgos te lag na me tog thogs pas slob dpon la phyag byas la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:254b-28: dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa pas //
T02TD2590E:254b-29: slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol //
T02TD2590E:254b-30: byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bstan pa //
T02TD2590E:254b-31: mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2590E:254b-32: dam tshig de nyid stsal du gsol //
T02TD2590E:254b-33: byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol //
T02TD2590E:254b-34: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02TD2590E:254b-35: skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la stsol //
T02TD2590E:254b-36: thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu //
T02TD2590E:254b-37: mgon po bdag ni 'jug par bgyid //
T02TD2590E:255a-0: de nas slob dpon gyis slob ma'i gtso bo la sogs pa @255a * //
T02TD2590E:255a-1: la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:255a-2: khyod ni tshul chen snod yin te //
T02TD2590E:255a-3: bu tshur theg pa chen po yi //
T02TD2590E:255a-4: gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga ni //
T02TD2590E:255a-5: khyod la yang dag bstan par bya //
T02TD2590E:255a-6: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'das dang //
T02TD2590E:255a-7: de bzhin gang dag ma byon dang //
T02TD2590E:255a-8: da ltar byung ba'i mgon po rnams //
T02TD2590E:255a-9: 'gro la phan phyir bzhugs pa dag / de dag kun gyis gsang sngags kyi //
T02TD2590E:255a-10: cho ga mchog bzang 'di mkhyen nas //
T02TD2590E:255a-11: dpa' bos byang chub shing drung du //
T02TD2590E:255a-12: thams cad mkhyen pa mtshan med brnyes //
T02TD2590E:255a-13: gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med de //
T02TD2590E:255a-14: sh'akya seng ge skyob pa yis //
T02TD2590E:255a-15: bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa //
T02TD2590E:255a-16: dpung chen dag kyang de yis bcom //
T02TD2590E:255a-17: de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir //
T02TD2590E:255a-18: bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig / de ltar yang dag par 'dzin du bcug nas /
T02TD2590E:255a-19: skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa byed du gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:255a-20: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi //
T02TD2590E:255a-21: sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags //
T02TD2590E:255a-22: bsod nams kun la rjes yi rang //
T02TD2590E:255a-23: sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung //
T02TD2590E:255a-24: yang phyag la sogs pa rgya cher byed du gzhug par bya ste /
T02TD2590E:255a-25: gang zhig mi mkhyen cung zad med //
T02TD2590E:255a-26: 'gro la'ang rtag tu skyabs mdzad pa'i //
T02TD2590E:255a-27: bde bar gshegs dang dam pa'i chos //
T02TD2590E:255a-28: tshogs chen bcas la'ang phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2590E:255a-29: 'jig rten sdug bsngal ldan skyob cing //
T02TD2590E:255a-30: de yi sdug bsngal nyid gzir ba'i //
T02TD2590E:255a-31: gtso la kun nas dad pa yis //
T02TD2590E:255a-32: de nyid la ni skyabs su mchi //
T02TD2590E:255a-33: kun nas rnam pa thams cad du //
T02TD2590E:255a-34: de nge mnyes pa la ngas byas te //
T02TD2590E:255a-35: de rnams la ni bdag dbul gyis //
T02TD2590E:255a-36: khyed ni kun du bdag bzhes shig / sdig pa ma lus bshags bgyi zhing //
T02TD2590E:255a-37: slar yang de ltar yong mi bgyid //
T02TD2590E:255a-38: bdag dang gzhan gyis gang byas pa'i //
T02TD2590E:255a-39: dge ba kun la rje yi rang ;
T02TD2590E:255a-40: / rdzogs sangs dam chos ston par mdzod //
T02TD2590E:255a-41: nam yang mya ngan 'da' ma mdzad //
T02TD2590E:255a-42: sems can rnams ni bde mdzad de //
T02TD2590E:255a-43: go 'phang mchog ni thob par mdzod //
T02TD2590E:255a-44: skal chen sangs rgyas de sras kyis //
T02TD2590E:255a-45: ji ltar byang chub thugs bskyed pa //
T02TD2590E:255b-0: de ltar bla med byang chub @255b sems //
T02TD2590E:255b-1: dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi //
T02TD2590E:255b-2: bdag ni thams cad mkhyen gyur nas //
T02TD2590E:255b-3: kun gyi dbang phyug gnas 'dug ste //
T02TD2590E:255b-4: srid pa'i rgya mtsho mtha' med de //
T02TD2590E:255b-5: 'gro ba thams cad bsgral bar bgyi //
T02TD2590E:255b-6: sangs rgyas thob pa'i rgyu la yang //
T02TD2590E:255b-7: ci yong stobs kyis 'jug bgyi zhing //
T02TD2590E:255b-8: der zhen de bzhin brtan pa yis //
T02TD2590E:255b-9: smon lam 'di ni bdag bgyid do //
T02TD2590E:255b-10: de bzhin skye ba thams cad du //
T02TD2590E:255b-11: de yi thabs la brtson pa dang //
T02TD2590E:255b-12: nyes bral yon tan ldan pa ste //
T02TD2590E:255b-13: dbang phyug phun tshogs kun thob shog / bdag gis dge ba gang bgyis dang //
T02TD2590E:255b-14: gang yang bgyid du stsal ba yang //
T02TD2590E:255b-15: des ni bdag dang 'gro ba kun //
T02TD2590E:255b-16: bde gshegs go 'phang 'grub par shog / de nas slob dpon gyis yi ge h'um bzlas pa'i spos snying gar gtor la /
T02TD2590E:255b-17: de nyid kyis slob ma la rdo rje dang bcas pa'i lag pa g-yas pa snying gar gtugs te /
T02TD2590E:255b-18: rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsam pa dang /
T02TD2590E:255b-19: spyi bor yang sna tshogs rdo rje rnam par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:255b-20: de nas h'um gis spyi bor me tog sbyin zhing /
T02TD2590E:255b-21: bdug spos kyis bdug pa dang /
T02TD2590E:255b-22: mar me'i snang ba yang byas la /
T02TD2590E:255b-23: de nyid kyis yongs su bzlas pa'i au dumw'a ra dang /
T02TD2590E:255b-24: aa shvadtha sor bcu gnyis pa rma med pa /
T02TD2590E:255b-26: rtse mo me tog gi phreng bas bcings pa'i so shing /
T02TD2590E:255b-27: slob ma thal mo sbyar zhing kha byang du bltas pa la sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:255b-28: des kyang ba'i ko ba tsam gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug la /
T02TD2590E:255b-29: shar du bltas nas rtse mo nas bca' ste /
T02TD2590E:255b-30: mi dgos par mdun du ltos pa med par dor bar bya'o //
T02TD2590E:255b-31: de la bdag la bltas te lhung na bgegs med par thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2590E:255b-32: gal te kha gyen du bltas pas lhung na /
T02TD2590E:255b-34: kha thur du bltas te lhung bas ni //
T02TD2590E:255b-36: skor phyogs kyi rin gyis shar la sogs par kha bltas te lhung na ni rgyas pa dang /
T02TD2590E:255b-40: dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rim du lhung na ni //
T02TD2590E:256a-0: de nas yi ge bam las byung zhing de nyid bzlas pa'i chus 'thor @256a * //
T02TD2590E:256a-2: aom hr'i: bi shu ddha dha rmm'a: sarbba p'a pa ni shtsa aa sya bi shodhya /
T02TD2590E:256a-3: sarbba bi ka wa aa pa na h'um zhes bzlas pa'i spos chu'i khyor chu gsum 'thung du bcug la /
T02TD2590E:256a-4: yi ge hr'i: las bskyed cing de nyid bzas pa'i ku sha gar zhing ma 'khrugs pa gcig sngas su sbyin pa dang /
T02TD2590E:256a-5: ku sha gnyis pa ham gi sa bon las bskyed cing /
T02TD2590E:256a-6: de nyid bzlas pa stan gyi phyir sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:256a-7: de nas yi ge h'um mngon par bzlas shing //
T02TD2590E:256a-8: yi ge brgya pas brtan par byas pa'i srid bu gsum sgril mdud pa gsum dang ldan pas de rnams kyi dpung pa g-yas par rang nyid bcings la /
T02TD2590E:256a-9: rdo rje go chags yang dag par bsrungs te /
T02TD2590E:256a-10: chos bshad pas gzengs bstod par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:256a-11: bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis //
T02TD2590E:256a-12: rnyed pa mnyam med de ring rnyed //
T02TD2590E:256a-13: gang phyir rgyal ba sras bcas pa //
T02TD2590E:256a-14: bdag nyid chen po kun gyis ni //
T02TD2590E:256a-15: bstan pa 'di la khyed rnams kun //
T02TD2590E:256a-16: yongs su bzung ste skye bzhin pa'i //
T02TD2590E:256a-17: de phyir khyed rnams theg chen la //
T02TD2590E:256a-18: sang ni rab tu skye bar 'gyur //
T02TD2590E:256a-19: theg pa chen po cher 'byung ba'i //
T02TD2590E:256a-20: lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan //
T02TD2590E:256a-21: khyed rnams der ni dong bas ni //
T02TD2590E:256a-22: rang byung skal ba chen po pa //
T02TD2590E:256a-23: 'jig rten thams cad mkhyen pa yi //
T02TD2590E:256a-24: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams su 'gyur //
T02TD2590E:256a-25: yod dang med las rnam par 'das //
T02TD2590E:256a-26: nam mkha' bzhin du dri ma med //
T02TD2590E:256a-27: zab mo rtog ge thams cad kyi //
T02TD2590E:256a-28: rab tu mi rtog gnas med pa //
T02TD2590E:256a-29: spros pa kun dang phral ba ste //
T02TD2590E:256a-30: spros pa rnams kyis ma spros pa ;
T02TD2590E:256a-31: / las dang bya ba la sogs bral //
T02TD2590E:256a-32: bden pa gnyis la gnas pa yi //
T02TD2590E:256a-33: theg pa rab kyi mchog 'di ni //
T02TD2590E:256a-34: tshul la gnas na thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2590E:256a-35: bzhin bzangs longs shig / nang par 'jam dpal rdo rje'i bka' drin gyis //
T02TD2590E:256a-36: dkyil 'khor chen po mthong bar 'gyur gyis /
T02TD2590E:256a-37: ji ltar mthong ba'i rmi lam rnams kyang smros shig ces brjod la gtang bar bya'o //
T02TD2590E:256a-38: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su zhugs te /
T02TD2590E:256a-39: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo phyi dang gsang ba'i mchod pa rnams kyis mchod pa sngon du 'gro bas //
T02TD2590E:256b-0: dkyil 'khor pa de rnams thams cad snga ma @256b bzhin du bteg ste //
T02TD2590E:256b-1: gzhal yas khang shel ltar dang zhing dri ma med pa'i dbus su bzhag la /
T02TD2590E:256b-2: steng dang 'og tu gnas pa'i yi ge bam dang h'um gi bar du chud par byas nas /
T02TD2590E:256b-3: aom gnyis las bskyed pa'i kha sbyar gyi nang du chud par bsgom par bya ba'am rdo rje'i lam nas rang gi snying ga'i rdo rje'i lte ba'i dbus su gnas par byas la /
T02TD2590E:256b-4: dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i mthar slob ma'i gtso bo dang lhan cig yid bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhag pas seng ge'i nyal stabs su nyal bar bya'o //
T02TD2590E:256b-5: zhag gnyis pa la lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2590E:256b-6: de las gzhan pa'i nyi ma gsum pa la rmi lam ngan pa la sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad dam /
T02TD2590E:256b-7: spyan la sogs pa'i sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas pas zhi bar bya'o //
T02TD2590E:256b-8: yang na chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu'o zhes lhag par mos par byas la /
T02TD2590E:256b-9: las thams cad pa'i bum pa yang 'jug pa'i sgor mngon par phyogs par bsang gtor gyi don du gzhag ste /
T02TD2590E:256b-10: dkyil 'khor bri ba brtsam par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:256b-11: dpal 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i rnal 'byor pas sngon po dang /
T02TD2590E:256b-15: ser po'i tshon rtsi dri zhim pos yungs kar gyi phye ma dang bsres pas /
T02TD2590E:256b-16: so sor kha bsgyur ba'i srad bu rim pa nyid kyis bzhag la /
T02TD2590E:256b-18: zhes bya ba'i sa bon gyis mi bskyod pa la sogs pa srad bu rnams la bkod de //
T02TD2590E:256b-19: sa bon de rnams nyid kyis rang gi phyogs na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs kar rang rang gi kha dog ji lta bu'i 'od kyi srad bur gnas par bsams la /
T02TD2590E:256b-20: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dkyil 'khor chen po'i thig gdab pa'i phyir //
T02TD2590E:256b-21: rdo rje'i thig bdag la stsal du gsol zhes mi bskyod pa la sogs pa la yang dag par bskul la /
T02TD2590E:256b-22: aom d'i pta dri shti aam ku sha dza: zhes bya ba mig tu bkod nas /
T02TD2590E:256b-23: rab tu g-yo bar byed pa'i mig / mig gi rdzi ma 'dren par byed pa'i lta bas 'od kyi srad bu mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i thugs ka nas /
T02TD2590E:256b-24: de rnams nyid btang ste drangs nas de rnams kyis /
T02TD2590E:257a-0: rang gi lag na gnas pa'i srad bu la kun du @257a * //
T02TD2590E:257a-2: aa n+yo n+ya aa nu ga ta sarbba dha rmma pa ra spa ra aa nu pra bishta sarbba dharmma aa tayan ta aa nu pra bishta sarbba dha rmma zhes bya ba dang yi ge h'um brjod la bsgril te /
T02TD2590E:257a-3: ma dang ta gnyis las nyi ma dang /
T02TD2590E:257a-4: zla ba gnyis su bskyed la /
T02TD2590E:257a-5: badzra dri ma ta zhes bya bas brtan par byas nas /
T02TD2590E:257a-6: dri dkar po'i chu dang ldan pa'i gser la sogs pa'i snod kyi nang du srad du de bzhag la /
T02TD2590E:257a-9: spos la sogs pas kyang mchod do //
T02TD2590E:257a-10: aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tram ma ti kra ma h'um zhes bya ba rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung la //
T02TD2590E:257a-11: lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzla bar bya'o //
T02TD2590E:257a-12: de nas yi ge h'um dang /
T02TD2590E:257a-13: dkyil 'khor ba'i lha thams kyi sngags kyang bzla bar bya'o //
T02TD2590E:257a-14: de nas yang dkyil 'khor pa'i sa gzhi dris nye bar byugs la /
T02TD2590E:257a-15: me tog gi sil ma gtor te /
T02TD2590E:257a-16: de nam mkha' la bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje 'khor dang bcas pa mngon par dmigs la /
T02TD2590E:257a-17: mchod yon dbul ba sngon du 'gro ba'i dri la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2590E:257a-18: sgeg mo la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de //
T02TD2590E:257a-19: phyag byas nas rang nyid de'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas /
T02TD2590E:257a-20: rang gi snying ga nas sgrub pa'i grogs mchog bdung rtsi thab sbyor gyi gzugs su sprul la /
T02TD2590E:257a-21: mig g-yas dang g-yon du dza: las byung ba'i zla ba dang /
T02TD2590E:257a-22: nyi ma ser por snang ba bsams /
T02TD2590E:257a-23: yi ge h'um bzlas pa'i yungs kar dkar po dang /
T02TD2590E:257a-24: dri dkar po'i chus spangs te /
T02TD2590E:257a-25: chur dkyil 'khor nyis 'gyur la sboms su sgo'i nyi shu'i cha'i srad bu de //
T02TD2590E:257a-26: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung nas /
T02TD2590E:257a-27: lte bar 'dzin cing yi ge dza: thig de sgrub pa'i grogs po'i lag tu aom dza: dza: zhes bya bas btang ngo //
T02TD2590E:257a-28: sgrub pa'i grogs kyis kyang rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung la /
T02TD2590E:257a-29: dza: dza: dza: zhes bya bas drangs nas de bzhin du sngon du phyogs par gnas par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:257a-30: de la phyogs thams cad mnyam pa nyid du dmigs te /
T02TD2590E:257a-31: slob dpon shar dang byang du bltas la /
T02TD2590E:257a-33: tshangs pa'i thig gnyis gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:257a-35: dang por rdo rje dang khu tshur gyis srad bu de bzung la /
T02TD2590E:257b-0: phyis ni ci bde bar thig gdab par bshad @257b do ;
T02TD2590E:257b-1: / mtshan ma med pas dngos mi 'grub //
T02TD2590E:257b-2: srad bu chad na bla ma 'chi //
T02TD2590E:257b-3: ring thung khyer na na par 'gyur //
T02TD2590E:257b-5: slob dpon me dang rlung gi phyogs su 'dug ste /
T02TD2590E:257b-8: lha dang klu'i phyogs su mngon par bltas la ;
T02TD2590E:257b-13: yang me'i phyogs su gnas te /
T02TD2590E:257b-15: bden bral gyi phyogs su gnas te /
T02TD2590E:257b-16: dbang ldan gyi mtshams kyi bar du srad bu brkyang bar bya ba dang /
T02TD2590E:257b-22: dkyil 'khor brgyad du yang rim pa 'di nyid kyis 'gyur ro //
T02TD2590E:257b-23: aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tram /
T02TD2590E:257b-24: ma ti kra ma h'um zhes bzla bar bya'o //
T02TD2590E:257b-25: thig gdab pa'i sgras kyang nam mkha' khyab pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la khyed kyis sems can gyi don mdzad pa'i dus lags pas ;
T02TD2590E:257b-26: 'dir gshegs su gsol zhes bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2590E:257b-27: khru stong gi tshad nas nye bar bzung ste /
T02TD2590E:257b-28: khru gang gi bar du dkyil 'khor thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:257b-29: slob dpon dang sgrub pa'i grogs mchog thams cad du yang g-yas nas bskor te 'gro bar bya'o //
T02TD2590E:257b-30: gru bzhir bgyi zhing sgo bzhi dang ;
T02TD2590E:257b-31: / rta babs bzhis ni mdzes bgyis pa //
T02TD2590E:257b-32: thig bzhi dang ni ldan gyur pa //
T02TD2590E:257b-33: dar dang me tog phreng bas brgyan //
T02TD2590E:257b-34: grva yi phyogs ni thams cad dang /
T02TD2590E:257b-35: sgo khyud kyi ni nang rnams su //
T02TD2590E:257b-36: rdo rje rin chen spras par ni //
T02TD2590E:257b-37: dkyil 'khor phyi rim thig gdab bo //
T02TD2590E:257b-38: de yi rim pa'i nang zhugs la ;
T02TD2590E:257b-39: / de nyid de dang 'dra ba la //
T02TD2590E:257b-40: phyi yi 'khor lo phyed kyi tshad //
T02TD2590E:257b-41: thams cad de 'dra rta babs med //
T02TD2590E:257b-42: rim pa nang par zhugs nas ni //
T02TD2590E:257b-43: de yi phyed kyis gsum pa ni //
T02TD2590E:257b-44: rdo rje thig gis yongs su bskor //
T02TD2590E:257b-45: ka ba brgyad kyis mdzes bgyis pa //
T02TD2590E:257b-46: rdo rje ka ba'i nang logs su //
T02TD2590E:257b-47: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lnga yis brgyan //
T02TD2590E:257b-48: de nas hr'i dang khro lta bas //
T02TD2590E:257b-49: sgo ni rnam par dbye bar bya //
T02TD2590E:257b-50: sgo ni 'khor lo'i brgyad cha ste //
T02TD2590E:257b-51: kha khyer med pa dag tu 'dod //
T02TD2590E:257b-52: sgo khyud sgo yi tshad du ste //
T02TD2590E:257b-53: lha yi snam bu'ang de dang 'dra //
T02TD2590E:257b-54: kha khyer kun du sgo yi phyed //
T02TD2590E:258a-2: dra ba dra phyed nyi zla dang //
T02TD2590E:258a-3: dar dang me tog phreng snam bu //
T02TD2590E:258a-4: tshon gyi sa ni de yi phyed //
T02TD2590E:258a-5: rtsa ba'i thig sa'i phyi rol du //
T02TD2590E:258a-6: rdo rje la sogs ka ba'i thig / sa ni tshon gyis sa dad mnyam //
T02TD2590E:258a-7: sgo las sgo khyud sum 'gyur te //
T02TD2590E:258a-8: ba dan dril bu rnams dang ldan //
T02TD2590E:258a-9: dril gdags rlung gis bskyod pa yi //
T02TD2590E:258a-10: ba dan chu yi mtshams su bya //
T02TD2590E:258a-11: gzhal rnams 'khor lo'i rjes mthun par //
T02TD2590E:258a-12: ji ltar mdzes par rab tu brtag / gal te thig 'debs 'os pa ni //
T02TD2590E:258a-14: phur bus brtod pas grogs med par //
T02TD2590E:258a-15: de bzhin thig ni gdab par bya //
T02TD2590E:258a-16: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar snga ma bzhin du //
T02TD2590E:258a-17: steng dang 'og tu rtse mo lnga pa dang /
T02TD2590E:258a-18: gcig pa'i rdo rje lta bu'i phur bus btab la //
T02TD2590E:258a-19: de la btags pa'i srad bu nyi rim gyi nang dang phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyab tu rdo rje'i thig dang /
T02TD2590E:258a-20: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te /
T02TD2590E:258a-21: g-yas phyogs su thig btab nas ye shes kyi thig gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02TD2590E:258a-22: de nas yam ram bam ham lam gyi sa bon las rim gyis bskyed pa srad bu bshad pa'i kha dog gi rim gyi pa'i sngon po la sogs pa'i tshon rin po cha las byung ba'am /
T02TD2590E:258a-25: yang na s'a su las byung ba'am /
T02TD2590E:258a-26: dmar po ni so phag las //
T02TD2590E:258a-27: nag po ni sol ba las byas pa bzang po la //
T02TD2590E:258a-28: h'um t'ram a'a: kham aom zhes bya ba las bskyed pa phyag rgya ma lus pa'i gzugs can la /
T02TD2590E:258a-29: aom badzra tsitra ma ya h'um zhes brjod la /
T02TD2590E:258a-30: rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyi ga yi //
T02TD2590E:258a-31: mdzub mo rtse mo rab sbyor ba //
T02TD2590E:258a-32: byas nas tshon rtsi thams cad la //
T02TD2590E:258a-33: 'bar ba'i lta bas dgug par bya //
T02TD2590E:258a-34: zhes bya ba'i sngags dang phyag rgyar bcas pas brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas mthar yi ge hri bkod de //
T02TD2590E:258a-35: tshon med po la bden pa gang gis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can thams cad la chags pas chags par mdzad pa'i bden pa des tshon rtsi 'bar bar gyur cig ces byas nas sbar bar bya'o //
T02TD2590E:258a-36: de nas lte bar gnas pa'i phur bu yi ge h'um gis phyung la /
T02TD2590E:258b-0: rang @258b gi lag na gnas pa'i rdo rje blos nang du chud par byas nas phur bu'i ga tshon rtsi lngas bkang la /
T02TD2590E:258b-1: bla na med pa'i shes rab kyi dril bu'i sgra dang /
T02TD2590E:258b-2: rdo rje glu rnams kyi mtshan ma ngan pa bsal nas /
T02TD2590E:258b-3: 'di ni chos dbyings dag pa ste //
T02TD2590E:258b-4: sems can khams na grol byed pa /
T02TD2590E:258b-5: 'jam dbyangs rgyal po rang nyid de //
T02TD2590E:258b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas //
T02TD2590E:258b-8: dang po g-yon pa'i rdo rje'i khu tshur gyis nang du gnas nas //
T02TD2590E:258b-9: aom badzra tsitra sa ma ya h'um zhes brjod la dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te /
T02TD2590E:258b-10: g-yas nas bskor zhing tshon rtsi dgye bar bya ste /
T02TD2590E:258b-12: dang por slob dpon gyis bkye la //
T02TD2590E:258b-13: phyis ni sgrub pa'i grogs pos te //
T02TD2590E:258b-14: 'dab ma 'byor ba dang bcas pa dang /
T02TD2590E:258b-15: g-yas phyogs nas spom phra ran par dgye bar bya zhing ri mo sgo'i nyi shu char bya'o //
T02TD2590E:258b-16: spom par dgye bas nas kyis 'debs //
T02TD2590E:258b-17: phra mos nor ni rnam par 'jig / yon pos rnam 'gras chad pa yis //
T02TD2590E:258b-18: bla ma dang ni slob ma 'chi //
T02TD2590E:258b-19: g-yas skor min par dgye ba yis //
T02TD2590E:258b-20: tshon ni phur bus btab par 'gyur //
T02TD2590E:258b-21: sngon po rin chen rtse rang bzhin //
T02TD2590E:258b-22: de bzhin padma r'a ga'i dngos //
T02TD2590E:258b-23: de la sa gzhan pa kha dog dkar //
T02TD2590E:258b-24: ma rgad 'char ba lta bu gzhan //
T02TD2590E:258b-25: ser po nang du shes bya ste /
T02TD2590E:258b-26: 'di ni tshon gyi rim par bshad //
T02TD2590E:258b-27: shar phyogs su ni sngon po che //
T02TD2590E:258b-28: lhor ni dmar pos yang dag ldan //
T02TD2590E:258b-29: zla ba ltar snang nub kyi cha //
T02TD2590E:258b-30: byang ni ljang gur yang dag ldan //
T02TD2590E:258b-31: dbus ma yi ni sa yi char //
T02TD2590E:258b-32: gser ltar snang ba bla na med //
T02TD2590E:258b-33: rdo rje dril bu rtag 'chang zhing //
T02TD2590E:258b-34: legs mnyam gzhag ste yang dag bri //
T02TD2590E:258b-35: tshon gyi ri mo rnams kyang gang tsam gyis phan tshun ma 'byar bar dgye bar bya'o //
T02TD2590E:258b-36: de la phyi'i dkyil 'khor du ni sngon po dang /
T02TD2590E:258b-40: tshon ser rnams kyis ra ba rnam pa lnga bya'o //
T02TD2590E:258b-41: gnyis pa ni sngon po dang /
T02TD2590E:258b-44: 'khor lo gsum par ni dkar po'i ri mo dgye bar bya'o //
T02TD2590E:258b-45: de nas rdo rje shugs kyis nang du zhugs la /
T02TD2590E:258b-46: aom badzra be ga aa kra ma h'um /
T02TD2590E:259a-0: @259a * // yid kyis ri mo bteg nas ni //
