T02TD2590E:259a-1: rdo rje srad bu'am gzhan yang rung //
T02TD2590E:259a-2: phyir byung nang du zhugs kyang ni //
T02TD2590E:259a-5: ji lta ba bzhin du dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2590E:259a-6: dza: h'um bam ho: zhes brjod de /
T02TD2590E:259a-7: yid kyis kha sbyang bye la /
T02TD2590E:259a-8: nam mkha' la bzhugs pa dang gcig tu byas nas /
T02TD2590E:259a-9: rang gi snying po brjod de dkyil 'khor dubs ma'i lte bar bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa 'jam dpal seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2590E:259a-10: shar la sogs pa'i re'u cha la mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2590E:259a-11: dkyil 'khor gyi dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su ni spyan la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2590E:259a-12: rim pa gnyis pa'i shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su ni rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2590E:259a-13: byang shar la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su ni skul byed ma la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2590E:259a-14: rim pa gsum pa'i shar la sogs pa'i snam bu la ni byams pa la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2590E:259a-15: shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su ni gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2590E:259a-16: mtshams rnams su mi g-yo ba la sogs pa ste /
T02TD2590E:259a-17: de dag sngar bshad pa'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan la sogs pa dang ldan par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:259a-18: phyi'i mtshams dang sgo'i ya phubs rnams la ni /
T02TD2590E:259a-19: rdo rje rnams gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:259a-20: phyogs bzhir ni rta babs rin po che la sogs pa las byas pa /
T02TD2590E:259a-21: me tog gi phreng ba dang dril bu la sogs pas brgyan par yi ge h'um zlos shing bya'o //
T02TD2590E:259a-22: shar la sogs pa'i phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD2590E:259a-24: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba dang /
T02TD2590E:259a-25: gser 'od dam pa'i mdo bklag par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:259a-28: tu ru ska la sogs pa'i spos snod phyogs mtshams brgyad du rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung bar gzhag bar bya'o //
T02TD2590E:259a-29: de nas yi ge h'um bzlas pa'am /
T02TD2590E:259a-30: bdud rtsi thab sbyor bzlas pa'i spos chus dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' kun du byugs pa //
T02TD2590E:259a-31: dri zhim po'i me tog gi sil ma ma gtor nas /
T02TD2590E:259a-32: de nyid bzlas pa'i spos chu nyid kyis dkyil 'khor bsangs la /
T02TD2590E:259b-0: dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab @259b par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2590E:259b-1: yi ge brgya pa lan mang du bzla bar bya'o //
T02TD2590E:259b-2: khro bo brgyad gsungs pas rdo rje sa 'og la sogs pa dgod pa ni /
T02TD2590E:259b-4: steng dang 'og tu dgod par bya ba nus pa yang ma yin no //
T02TD2590E:259b-5: de 'ba' zhig brko ba dang yu ba la dbyangs te bya'o zhe na /
T02TD2590E:259b-6: de yang rigs pa ma yin te /
T02TD2590E:259b-7: mtshan ma tsam nyid yid kyis dgod par bya'i 'di bris pas ci zhig bya ste /
T02TD2590E:259b-8: bri ba'i cho ga 'di yang yid kyis ma yin te /
T02TD2590E:259b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la ba dag cag rnams 'jug pa ni 'bras bu dang 'dra ba yin pas /
T02TD2590E:259b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang bri ba'i cho ga ni brgyad po nyid dgod par rjes gnang bar mdzad pa yin la /
T02TD2590E:259b-11: spro ba ni yid kyi yin pas bcu po spro bar rigs pa de bzhin du rjes su spyad par bya'i nye bar mtshon par bshad pa'i lhag par dgos pas ci zhig dgod //
T02TD2590E:259b-13: gal te bgegs ni byung gyur na /
T02TD2590E:259b-14: de la gtor ma sbyin la sogs //
T02TD2590E:259b-15: 'og nas bshad pas bzlog par bya //
T02TD2590E:259b-16: bgegs ni gzhom par ma nus na /
T02TD2590E:259b-17: mchod yon phul te gshegs gsol la //
T02TD2590E:259b-18: nyi ma gzhan la yo byad rnams //
T02TD2590E:259b-19: legs par bsams te dkyil 'khor bri //
T02TD2590E:259b-20: de nas khrus byas shing lus dris bsgos pa dang /
T02TD2590E:259b-21: kha dri zhim pos bsgos la /
T02TD2590E:259b-22: me tog gi phreng ba btags shing gos gtsang zhing dri zhim pas stod g-yogs dang /
T02TD2590E:259b-23: smad g-yogs dang gtsug gtor byas pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas /
T02TD2590E:259b-24: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i me tog gi phreng ba thogs te /
T02TD2590E:259b-25: h'um bzhi pa'i sngags zlos shing rdo rje shugs kyis dkyil 'khor du zhugs la dril bu dkrol zhing bskor ba lan gsum byas la /
T02TD2590E:259b-26: lhag pa dang ma tshang ba'i nyes par zhi bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2590E:259b-27: dkyil 'khor bltas la phreng bde bcom ldan 'das la phul te /
T02TD2590E:259b-28: slar yang de gar gyis sbyor bas blangs la /
T02TD2590E:259b-29: rang gi mgo la h'um bzhis bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2590E:259b-30: de bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i nga rgyal du dmigs la /
T02TD2590E:260a-0: sngar lhag par gnas par byas pa'i rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa'i yi ge h'um bzlas @260a * //
T02TD2590E:260a-2: srad bu mgul pa bcings la /
T02TD2590E:260a-3: phyi rol du ri mo bris pa rdo rje chen pos byin gyis brlabs pa me tog dkar po dang dri dkar po'i chus yongs su gang ba me tog gi phreng bas bcings pa la snga ma bzhin du bdag po'i sngags dang yi ge h'um brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa ;
T02TD2590E:260a-4: rdo rje sems ma phyag rgyas bzung ba'i me tog gi lcug ma'i rdo rje dang bcas pas badzrod ka h'um zhes bya ba brgya rtsa brgyad dam /
T02TD2590E:260a-5: stong rtsa brgyad bzlas shing lha thams cad kyi sngags bdun bdun bzlas pa dang /
T02TD2590E:260a-6: gnyis pa las thams cad pa'i bum pa bdud rtsi thab sbyor dang /
T02TD2590E:260a-7: yi ge brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas shing bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi mtshan mas mtshan pa dang 'jug pa'i sgor bltas par bzhag la /
T02TD2590E:260a-8: chu des bdag nyid dang slob ma 'jug pa'i tshe //
T02TD2590E:260a-9: dbang bskur ba phyag rgya bcing ba dang 'ching du gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:260a-10: de las gzhan pa'i bum pa bzhil [?] spyan la sogs pa lha mo bzhi'i rang bzhin dam tshig gi phyag rgyas yongs su bzung ba'i me tog gi phreng bas so sor bzlas shing /
T02TD2590E:260a-11: de'i mtshan mas mtshan par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:260a-12: de yang de las gzhan pa'i bzhi la lha rnams cad kyi mtshan ma des mtshan par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:260a-13: de nas de bzhin du bdag po'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa nyid dang /
T02TD2590E:260a-14: yid kyis legs so zhes bya ba'i sbyor bas lha thams cad kyi 'khor lo rang gi bdag nyid kyi nang du chud par byas la /
T02TD2590E:260a-15: de'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas til dang nas dang ku sha dang /
T02TD2590E:260a-16: dri dkar po dang me tog dri zhim po dang /
T02TD2590E:260a-17: tsandan gyi chu dung chos kyi nang du bcug nas /
T02TD2590E:260a-18: bdag po'i sngags lan bdun bzla ba dang /
T02TD2590E:260a-19: dri la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnam pa lnga rang gi sngags sam yi ge h'um yongs su bzla bar bya'o //
T02TD2590E:260a-21: rdo rje slob dpon mnyam gzhag ste //
T02TD2590E:260a-22: rdo rje'i sgo nas bzhi po dag / yid kyis rnam par dbye bar bya //
T02TD2590E:260a-23: aom badzrod gha ta sa ma ya pra pe sha ya h'um zhes bya ba ni sgo dbye ba'i sngags so //
T02TD2590E:260a-24: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis mdzub mo gnyis brkyang la rtse sprad de bzlog nas gnyis su bya ste /
T02TD2590E:260b-0: bzlas brjod dang por byas la mtshan thog thag bsgrubs nas 'di dang badzrod tishtha zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis dkyil 'khor @260b gdeg par bstan par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:260b-1: gnas skabs 'dir dkyil 'khor gdeg pa'i phyag rgya bshad de /
T02TD2590E:260b-2: phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis kyi mkhrig ma phan tshun bzung la bteg na mkhrig ma bteg par 'gyur te /
T02TD2590E:260b-3: 'di ni sgo dbye ba'o phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2590E:260b-4: shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams ni nub la sogs par 'dug ste /
T02TD2590E:260b-5: de bzhin du g-yas brkyang ba la sogs pa'i gnas pas rim gyis blos dbye bar bya'o //
T02TD2590E:260b-6: de nas rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa dang /
T02TD2590E:260b-7: bsang gtor gyi bum pa gnas ji lta ba bzhin du gzhag cing de las gzhan pa'i bum pa rnams phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams su rim bzhin du gzhag go //
T02TD2590E:260b-8: de'i phyi rol du bum pa gang ba bzhag la /
T02TD2590E:260b-9: yi ge h'um zlos pa'am so so'i rang gi sngags dang /
T02TD2590E:260b-11: rim gyis dkyil 'khor ba'i lha'i 'khor lo ma lus pa phyung nas /
T02TD2590E:260b-12: gnas ji lta ba bzhin du phyag rgya'i gzugs su bcug la /
T02TD2590E:260b-13: ye shes sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa rdo rje khro bo'i lcags kyu la sogs pas snga ma bzhin du spyan drangs las /
T02TD2590E:260b-14: lcags kyu la sogs pas dgug pa la sogs pa bya ste /
T02TD2590E:260b-16: phur bu dang ra ba la sogs pa byas pas gnas bsrung ba byas la /
T02TD2590E:260b-17: padma'i gdan dang mchod yon dang zhabs bsil la sogs pa phul nas sku byin gyis brlab pa sogs pa'i phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD2590E:260b-18: rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya nye bar bstan la rang gi dbang bskur bas dbang skur te /
T02TD2590E:260b-19: lag pa gnyis kyis khur tshur byas la mdzub mo brkyang ste /
T02TD2590E:260b-20: mdud pa bya ba ni rdo rje bcing ba'i phyag rgyar 'gyur te /
T02TD2590E:260b-21: 'di dang badzra mashti bam zhes bya ba sngags 'dis kyang dkyil 'khor pa'i lha rnams bcings nas rang gi ting nge 'dzin gyi las la zhugs pa la sgeg mo la sogs pas yang dag pas mchod la /
T02TD2590E:260b-22: yang dri la sogs pas mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:260b-23: de la ras zung 'bum mam stong ngam brgya'am re re zhing zung re'am /
T02TD2590E:260b-24: thams cad la ras re re'am /
T02TD2590E:260b-25: bla re dang rgyal mtshan dang /
T02TD2590E:260b-27: ba dan sna tshogs pa'i yi ge h'um dang /
T02TD2590E:261a-2: badzra spha ra na kham las bya ba 'dis dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2590E:261a-3: de bzhin du aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta gandhe p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis sdar sbyar ba'i ga pur dang /
T02TD2590E:261a-5: tu ru ska la sogs pa'i dri tsandan la sogs pa dang bsres pa dbul lo //
T02TD2590E:261a-6: de bzhin du aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta pushpa p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2590E:261a-9: me tog thams cad dbul lo //
T02TD2590E:261a-10: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta dh'u pa 'u dza me gha sa bu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um zhes bya ba dang spos snod stong ngam brgya dbul bar bya ste /
T02TD2590E:261a-11: bcu las nyung bar ni mi bya'o //
T02TD2590E:261a-12: aa khar zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2590E:261a-13: sva sti ka la sogs par bya ba'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dang myang ba dang /
T02TD2590E:261a-15: btung ba'i bshos kyi rnam pa sna tshogs pa drangs stong snyed dbul lo //
T02TD2590E:261a-16: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta d'i pa p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2590E:261a-17: mar gyi mar me la sogs pa 'bum phrag brgya dang mar me chen po'i snod brgya'am //
T02TD2590E:261a-18: mar me chen po bzhi dbul lo //
T02TD2590E:261a-19: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi lag pa'i sor mo rnams dang //
T02TD2590E:261a-20: yi ge h'um 'don cing rol mo brdung pa'i tshul du byed pa dang /
T02TD2590E:261a-23: gling bu la sogs pa dbul ba dang /
T02TD2590E:261a-24: gar mkhan dang zlos gar mkhan gyi gar dang /
T02TD2590E:261a-27: cod pan la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2590E:261a-29: ba lang gi khyu shin tu brtags pa rnams dbul bar bya ba dang /
T02TD2590E:261a-30: rta babs gos bzang po dang /
T02TD2590E:261a-31: dril bu dang bcas shing rda yab dang bcas pa dang /
T02TD2590E:261a-40: brgyad po shar la sogs par rim pa bzhin phyi rol du bsgreng bar bya'o//
T02TD2590E:261a-41: gzhan yang yid kyi rang bzhin gyi mchod pa'i khyad par nam mkha'i gtos thams cad khyab pa rnams kyis kyang dag par mchod la thal mo sbyar te /
T02TD2590E:261b-0: byin gyis brlabs pa'i rig pa lan gsum brjod nas rdo rje glu rnams kyis yang dag bar @261b bstod de //
T02TD2590E:261b-1: phyag byas la bzod pa gsol nas dngos grub thams cad kyi don mdzod cig ces gsol ba btab la sgrub pa'i grogs po dkyil 'khor du bzhag ste /
T02TD2590E:261b-2: phyi rol du byung ba gtor ma byin nas nye reg bya ste /
T02TD2590E:261b-3: dpal 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2590E:261b-4: lag pa g-yas pa bkan te gung mo dang srin lag cung zad bkug la mngon du phyogs par bzhag ste /
T02TD2590E:261b-5: 'di dag mi mra zhing tsog por 'dug la /
T02TD2590E:261b-6: pus mo gnyis kyis bar nas sor mo'i rtses kha la mang du reg par bya la //
T02TD2590E:261b-13: spyi bor lan gnyis lam gsum reg par bya ba ni nye reg gi cho ba'o //
T02TD2590E:261b-14: de nas bdag po la ni brgya rtsa brgyad //
T02TD2590E:261b-15: dkyil 'khor pa gzhan rnams la ni bdun 'og nas bshad pa rgyas pa'i cho gas sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2590E:261b-16: yang na bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i dbyangs 'khor lo'i tshogs dang bcas pa thab kyi dbus su bsams la /
T02TD2590E:261b-17: de'i zhal du sbyin sreg byas pa lha thams cad kyi zhal du 'brab par bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2590E:261b-18: de lta bus ni thams cad tshig par byas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2590E:261b-19: de nas dkyil 'khor du zhugs la mngon sum bzhin du bsams te mchod la //
T02TD2590E:261b-20: 'og nas bshad pa'i slob ma 'jug pa'i cho gas 'jug pa la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2590E:261b-21: tshigs su bcad pa lnga pas rjes su gnang ba dang /
T02TD2590E:261b-24: sngags bzung ba'i mthar thig gi bar su bcom ldan 'das dpal 'jam pa'i rdo rje rdzogs par mdzad pa dang /
T02TD2590E:261b-25: bdag nyid kyis kyang slar phyag 'tshal te /
T02TD2590E:261b-26: blang spar gyur par rdzogs par byas nas dkyil 'khor du slob ma gzhug par bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2590E:261b-27: bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bsgrag par bya ste /
T02TD2590E:261b-28: chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste /
T02TD2590E:261b-29: dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med //
T02TD2590E:261b-30: gzung du med cing brjod du med //
T02TD2590E:261b-31: rgyu dang las las kun du byung //
T02TD2590E:261b-32: de bzhin nyid las nges par skyes //
T02TD2590E:261b-33: bden pa di yis dkyil 'khor du //
T02TD2590E:261b-34: gzugs brnyan gsal bar slob ma ni //
T02TD2590E:261b-35: kun gyis dri ma med mthong shig /
T02TD2590E:262a-0: @262a * // dam tshig gsum gyis glud dang mchod pa byas la gsol ba gdab par bya ste //
T02TD2590E:262a-1: sems can kun gyis de khab cing //
T02TD2590E:262a-2: sems can kun gyis nying la zhugs //
T02TD2590E:262a-3: sems cad kun gyi yab gyur nyid //
T02TD2590E:262a-4: 'dod mchog dam tshig mchog gyur ba'o //
T02TD2590E:262a-5: bden pa gang gi ye shes mchog //
T02TD2590E:262a-6: shes rab thabs bdag skyil 'khor yin //
T02TD2590E:262a-7: bden pa de yis mgon bdag la //
T02TD2590E:262a-8: khyed kyi 'dod pa yongs rdzogs shog //
T02TD2590E:262a-9: de bzhin du rab tu btud de //
T02TD2590E:262a-10: mnyam par bzhag pas 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste //
T02TD2590E:262a-11: bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba yi //
T02TD2590E:262a-12: rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub che //
T02TD2590E:262a-13: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2590E:262a-14: bdag gis slob ma gzhug par bgyi //
T02TD2590E:262a-15: de la re zhig slob dpon du dbang bskur bar 'os pa'i slob mas slob dpon gyi rkang pa gnyis la phyag byas te //
T02TD2590E:262a-16: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste //
T02TD2590E:262a-17: dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas //
T02TD2590E:262a-18: slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol //
T02TD2590E:262a-19: byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bstan pa //
T02TD2590E:262a-20: mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2590E:262a-21: dam tshig de nyis stsal du gsol //
T02TD2590E:262a-22: sdom pa rnams kyang stsal du gsol //
T02TD2590E:262a-23: yang na lag na me tog thogs pa'i slob mas bshags pa dang ;
T02TD2590E:262a-24: rjes su yi rang ba la sogs pa byas la 'di skad cis brjod par bya'o /
T02TD2590E:262a-25: gtso bo bdag la sdom pa stsol //
T02TD2590E:262a-26: thub pa'i nyi ma ma lus pa //
T02TD2590E:262a-27: sangs rgyas rnams ni bdag la gdongs //
T02TD2590E:262a-28: bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba yis //
T02TD2590E:262a-29: slob dpon dbang du gnas pa la //
T02TD2590E:262a-30: sangs rgyas rol mo las byung ba //
T02TD2590E:262a-32: thar ba'i rang bzhin grong khyer che //
T02TD2590E:262a-33: gsang ba chen por 'jug par bgyi //
T02TD2590E:262a-34: gsang ba thams cad bsdus par ni //
T02TD2590E:262a-35: slob dpon chen po bdag 'jug mdzod //
T02TD2590E:262a-36: mi ldog pa yis dbang bskur ba //
T02TD2590E:262a-37: skal ba chen po bdag la stsol //
T02TD2590E:262a-38: mchan rnams kun gyis rgyas btab cing //
T02TD2590E:262a-39: dpe byad rnams dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD2590E:262a-40: sangs rgyas sku yi yid 'ong bas //
T02TD2590E:262a-41: slob dpon chen po bdag la stsol //
T02TD2590E:262a-42: dbang bskur chen po rmad byung la //
T02TD2590E:262a-43: sems can kun gyi don bgyid phyir //
T02TD2590E:262b-0: bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon @262b gyur ;
T02TD2590E:262b-1: / slob dpon po bdag la stsol //
T02TD2590E:262b-2: de nas slob dpon gyis rigs thams cad la gsol ba gdab par bya ste //
T02TD2590E:262b-3: che ge zhes bya 'di nyid ni //
T02TD2590E:262b-4: byang chub sems ni yongs 'dzin pa //
T02TD2590E:262b-5: dam tshig mchog dang gsang ba yi //
T02TD2590E:262b-7: de nas slob dpon gyis yang 'di skad brjod par bya ste //
T02TD2590E:262b-8: gsang ba chen po'i rigs bdag pa //
T02TD2590E:262b-9: gsang ba yongs su 'dzin par ni //
T02TD2590E:262b-10: bdag nyid chen po khyod 'dod dam //
T02TD2590E:262b-11: des kyang 'tshal zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:262b-12: yang slob don gyis 'di skad ces bya ste /
T02TD2590E:262b-13: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02TD2590E:262b-14: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song //
T02TD2590E:262b-15: 'di ni sangs rgyas rigs dag pa'i //
T02TD2590E:262b-16: dam tshig brtan par gyur pa'o //
T02TD2590E:262b-17: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya dag / blo chen khyod kyis gzung bar gyis //
T02TD2590E:262b-18: byang chub sems gang de rdo rje //
T02TD2590E:262b-19: shes rab dril bu zhes bsgrags so //
T02TD2590E:262b-20: slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bya //
T02TD2590E:262b-21: bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam //
T02TD2590E:262b-22: 'di ni rdo rje rigs dag pa'i //
T02TD2590E:262b-23: sdom pa dam tshig yin par gsungs //
T02TD2590E:262b-24: rin chen rigs mchog chen po la //
T02TD2590E:262b-25: nyin dang mtshan mor lan gsum du //
T02TD2590E:262b-26: zang zing mi 'jigs chos dang byams //
T02TD2590E:262b-27: sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin //
T02TD2590E:262b-28: phi dang gsang ba theg gsum //
T02TD2590E:262b-29: dam chos khyod kyis gzung bar bya //
T02TD2590E:262b-31: dam tshig sngon pa yin par gsungs //
T02TD2590E:262b-32: las kyi rigs mchog chen po la //
T02TD2590E:262b-33: sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni //
T02TD2590E:262b-34: yang dag nyid du gzung bar gyis //
T02TD2590E:262b-35: mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bya //
T02TD2590E:262b-36: gzhan yang bcu bzhi 'di dag ni //
T02TD2590E:262b-37: phas pha ma par ni rab tu bshad //
T02TD2590E:262b-38: spang zhing dor bar mi bya ste //
T02TD2590E:262b-39: rtsa ba'i ltung ba shes par bya //
T02TD2590E:262b-40: nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du //
T02TD2590E:262b-41: nyin te zhing ni bzla bar bya //
T02TD2590E:262b-42: gang tshe nyams na rnal 'byor pa //
T02TD2590E:262b-43: kha na ma tho sbom por 'gyur //
T02TD2590E:262b-44: khyod kyis srog chags gsang mi bya //
T02TD2590E:262b-45: ma byin par yang mi blang ngo //
T02TD2590E:262b-46: 'dod la logs pas mi spyad cing //
T02TD2590E:262b-47: brdzun du smra bar mi bya'o //
T02TD2590E:262b-48: phung krol kun gyi rtsa ba yi //
T02TD2590E:262b-49: chad ni rnam par sdang bar bya //
T02TD2590E:262b-50: sems can gdul phyir ma rtogs pa //
T02TD2590E:263a-2: dam pa nye bar brten bya zhing //
T02TD2590E:263a-3: rnal 'byor pa rnams bsnyen bkur bya //
T02TD2590E:263a-4: lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang //
T02TD2590E:263a-5: dag gis rnam pa bzhi rnams dang //
T02TD2590E:263a-6: yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag gnyi //
T02TD2590E:263a-7: ci nus par ni rjes su bskyod //
T02TD2590E:263a-8: theg pa dman la 'dod mi bya ;
T02TD2590E:263a-9: / sems can don la rgyab phyogs min //
T02TD2590E:263a-10: 'khor ba dag kyang yang mi spong //
T02TD2590E:263a-11: rtag tu mya ngan 'das mi chags //
T02TD2590E:263a-12: lha dang lha min gsang ba la //
T02TD2590E:263a-13: khyod kyis brnyas par mi bya zhing //
T02TD2590E:263a-14: phyag rgya bzhon pa mtshon bya dang //
T02TD2590E:263a-16: 'di dag dam tshig yin par bshad //
T02TD2590E:263a-17: khyod kyis rtag tu bsrung bar bya //
T02TD2590E:263a-18: des kyang 'di skad cis brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2590E:263a-19: slob dpon 'dir ni bdag la gson //
T02TD2590E:263a-20: gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal pa //
T02TD2590E:263a-21: de ltar bdag ni bgyid par 'tshal //
T02TD2590E:263a-22: ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams //
T02TD2590E:263a-23: byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa //
T02TD2590E:263a-24: zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas //
T02TD2590E:263a-25: sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod //
T02TD2590E:263a-26: ces bya ba'i bar du brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:263a-27: gang zhig sngom pa 'dzin par mi byed pa de la /
T02TD2590E:263a-28: deng khyod ces bya ba la sogs pa brjod par mi bya ste /
T02TD2590E:263a-29: slob dpon du rjes su gnang ba dang dbang bskur bar yang mi bya'i /
T02TD2590E:263a-30: 'jug pa tsam zhig byed du gzhug go //
T02TD2590E:263a-31: de nas khrus byas shing dri bzang po la sogs pas kyang brgyan la /
T02TD2590E:263a-32: yi ge h'um bzlas pa'i gos dmar po'i stod g-yogs dang smad g-yogs dang /
T02TD2590E:263a-35: aom sarbba yo ga tsi tta autp'a da y'a mi zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2590E:263a-36: byang chub sems ni bla med pa //
T02TD2590E:263a-37: dam pa bdag gis bskyed nas su //
T02TD2590E:263a-38: de yi snying gar snying pos ni //
T02TD2590E:263a-39: rdo rje rab tu gzhag par bya //
T02TD2590E:263a-40: su ra ta sa ma ya stvam ho:siddha badzra ya th'a su kham /
T02TD2590E:263a-41: deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par gyur cig / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba 'di //
T02TD2590E:263a-42: khyod kyis 'khyil 'khor chen por ma zhugs pa rnams la smra bar ma byed cig / dad pa mi ldan pa rnams la yang ma yin no zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:263b-0: de nas rab tu yon phul ba'i slob ma de la dri la sogs pas mchod @263b de ;
T02TD2590E:263b-1: me tog gi phreng ba gdags shing //
T02TD2590E:263b-2: kha dri zhim pos bsgos pa la phi rol na gsan pa bum pa'i chus dbang bskur nas //
T02TD2590E:263b-3: dpal 'jam pa'i rdo rje ra byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2590E:263b-4: aom dzi na dzi ka ches bya ba la sogs pa'i snying po dang /
T02TD2590E:263b-5: sku la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyag rgya la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs nas //
T02TD2590E:263b-6: thal mo sbyar ba'i mdzub po dkri ba dang /
T02TD2590E:263b-7: badzra ka ba tsa bam h'um zhes brjod la /
T02TD2590E:263b-8: dpral ba dang lkog ma dang /
T02TD2590E:263b-9: snying ga dang dpung mgo ste /
T02TD2590E:263b-10: gnas ldar go cha byas nas rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgyas bzung ba'i me tog dang yi ge h'um bzlas pa nyid kyis sgor gnas par byas la //
T02TD2590E:263b-11: shar la sogs pa'i sgo nas rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas dgug pa la sogs pa byas nas yang phyogs kyi sgo nyid nas tshigs su bcad pa 'dis gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:263b-12: rdo rje ye shes 'thob byed pa //
T02TD2590E:263b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi //
T02TD2590E:263b-15: bdag gis slob ma gzhug par bgyi //
T02TD2590E:263b-16: a'a kham b'i ra h'um zhes bya bas slob ma dkyil 'khor du zhugs par byas nas 'di skad ces brjod par byas te //
T02TD2590E:263b-17: deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyi /
T02TD2590E:263b-18: ngas khyod la ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du 'grub pa yang 'thob na //
T02TD2590E:263b-19: dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
T02TD2590E:263b-20: de lta bu'i ye shes bskyed par byas /
T02TD2590E:263b-21: khyod kyis dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong ba rnams la ma smra shig khyod dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re ;
T02TD2590E:263b-22: de nas rdo rje slo dpon rnag nyid kyis sems ma rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya kha thur du bstan pa dang gyen du bstan pa bcings la //
T02TD2590E:263b-23: rdo rje slob ma'i spyi por bzhag ste /
T02TD2590E:263b-25: 'di ni khyod kyi rdo rje dam tshig yin gyis //
T02TD2590E:263b-26: gal te 'di 'ga' zhig la smras na klad pa 'gems par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2590E:263b-27: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid dang mna'i snying po 'di lan cig bzlas la slob ma de 'thung du bcug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2590E:263b-28: aom badzra sa tva sa yan te dya //
T02TD2590E:263b-29: hri da ye sa ma basthi ta /
T02TD2590E:263b-32: ya y'ada ya di bru yat /
T02TD2590E:264a-3: dam tshig gi shu ga phur dang //
T02TD2590E:264a-4: tsandan la sogs pa dang ldan pa rdo rje phra rab kyi rang bzhin bdag po'i sngags dang yi ge h'um bzlas pa //
T02TD2590E:264a-5: slob ma yang bsam pa brtan par byas te /
T02TD2590E:264a-6: 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu //
T02TD2590E:264a-7: dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed //
T02TD2590E:264a-8: dam tshigs bsrungs na dngos grub ste //
T02TD2590E:264a-9: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'thung shig / aom badzrod ka tha /
T02TD2590E:264a-10: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya ni //
T02TD2590E:264a-11: gal te dkyil 'khor ma mthong smra //
T02TD2590E:264a-12: skye bo 'dus pa'i nang gnas sam //
T02TD2590E:264a-13: dad pa med pas bdag par byed //
T02TD2590E:264a-14: deng nas brtsam te khyed kyi phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyis /
T02TD2590E:264a-15: ngas 'di byos shig ces bsgo ba gang yin pa de bya dgos so //
T02TD2590E:264a-16: khyod kyis nga la brnyas par ma byed cig / mi bde ba ma spangs pas khyed dus byas nas dmyal bar rlung bar gyur ta re //
T02TD2590E:264a-17: de nas yi ge aa dmar po 'od zer dang bcas pa rang gi snying gar bkod la /
T02TD2590E:264a-18: slob ma yang yi ge h'um gis rdul dang bral zhing dag pa 'jam pa'i rdo rje h'um tr'am hr'i: zhes bya bas //
T02TD2590E:264a-19: snying ga dang mdzod spu dang lkog ma sbyi bo rnams su rdo rje dang rin po che dang /
T02TD2590E:264a-21: sna tshogs rdo rje dang ldan pa la //
T02TD2590E:264a-22: sgo glegs dbye ba'i phyag rgyas rang gi snying ga dang slob ma'i snying ga phye la /
T02TD2590E:264a-23: rang gi snying ga nas yi ge aa phyung la //
T02TD2590E:264a-24: slob ma'i snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje'i dbus su blos bcug la /
T02TD2590E:264a-25: de'i lus kun du gang bar bsam sla /
T02TD2590E:264a-26: 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlobs la //
T02TD2590E:264a-27: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la 'bab par gyur cig ces smros shig / de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis mur du sems la rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings la //
T02TD2590E:264a-28: de'i snying gar bzhag ste 'di skad ces brjod du gzhug go //
T02TD2590E:264a-29: 'di ni rdo rje'i dam tshig ste //
T02TD2590E:264a-30: rdo rje sems dpa' yin par grags //
T02TD2590E:264a-31: rdo rje ye shes bya med 'di //
T02TD2590E:264a-32: dri ring nyid du 'bab par shog / badzra a'a be sha aa: bcu nyi shu sum cu bzhi bcu //
T02TD2590E:264a-33: lnga bcu drug cu bdun cu brgyad cu dgu bcu brgya'i bar du brjod na nges par 'bab bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2590E:264a-34: de ltar yang gal te 'bab bar ma gyur na //
T02TD2590E:264a-35: de'i tshe rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya khor bo'i khu tshur gyis phye la //
T02TD2590E:264b-0: rdo rje @264b sems dpa'i yi ge aa'i mtha' can brgya'i bar du brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:264b-1: gal te de lta na yang 'bab par ma gyur na //
T02TD2590E:264b-2: de'i tshe rdo rje 'bebs pa dril bu dang bcas pa bcings la /
T02TD2590E:264b-3: rkang pa g-yon pas slob ma'i rkang ba g-yas ba mnan la //
T02TD2590E:264b-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i steng du rnam par snag mdzad khros pas de la dbab par bya ba'i phyir 'od zer gyi tshogs rnams 'bab par mdzad pa dang /
T02TD2590E:264b-5: 'og tu yang yi ge h'um rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis bteg par gyur la //
T02TD2590E:264b-6: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rim bzhin rang gi phogs na bzhugs pas /
T02TD2590E:264b-7: h'um tr'am hr'i: aa: zhes bya ba'i sa bon rnams las 'od zer gyi tshogs yang dag par 'bebs par gyur par bsams la //
T02TD2590E:264b-9: aa: aa: aa: zhes bya ba lan brgya'i bar du brjod par bya'o//
T02TD2590E:264b-10: gal te sdig pa chen po dang ldan pas de lta bu byas kyang 'bab par ma gyur na /
T02TD2590E:264b-11: de'i tshe sdig pa dral ba'i phyag rgyas sdig pa dral la h'um zhes bya ba lan mang du bzla'o //
T02TD2590E:264b-12: rdo rje bcing ba bsdam byas te //
T02TD2590E:264b-13: gung mo gnyi ga sbyar nas ni //
T02TD2590E:264b-14: tha ma bzhi ni rtse mo sbyar //
T02TD2590E:264b-15: sdig pa 'joms par grags pa yin //
T02TD2590E:264b-16: zhes bya ba ni sdig pa 'joms pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2590E:264b-17: aom badzra p'a ni bi spho ta ya //
T02TD2590E:264b-19: bandha na ni pra mi ksha ya sarbba p'a pa ga ti bhya: sarbba stv'a na sarbba ta th'a ga ta badzra sa ma ya tra ta ces bya ba ni sngags so //
T02TD2590E:264b-20: yang na de bzhin du 'bab par gyur zhes brjod la //
T02TD2590E:264b-21: de'i snying gar yi ge h'um dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa dang /
T02TD2590E:264b-22: ham chu'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa dang /
T02TD2590E:264b-23: yi ge aa lus dang dag la gnas pa dang /
T02TD2590E:264b-24: rkang ba'i 'og tu yi ge dzheem sbar bar byed pa rlung dang me la gnas pa rnams par bkod la //
T02TD2590E:264b-25: a'a be sha ya stam bha ra ra tsa la ya tsa la ya h'um ha a'a dzheem zhes bskul na 'bab par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2590E:264b-26: yang na yi ge aom gyis de'i spyi bor rnam par snang mdzad ji lta ba bzhin du bsam pa dang /
T02TD2590E:264b-27: yi ge a'a:las lkog mar 'od dpag tu med pa h'um las snying gar mi bskyod pa yi ge'am /
T02TD2590E:264b-28: rang gi ngo bor skul bar byed pa dang /
T02TD2590E:264b-29: rkang ba'i 'og tu yang yi ge yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhu'i dbyibs can //
T02TD2590E:264b-30: mtha' gnyis su ba dan btags pa //
T02TD2590E:265a-1: ram las byung a'i me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum de la slob ma skul byed ma'i gzugs su bsams te bzhag la /
T02TD2590E:265a-2: rdo rje 'bar ba rnams kyis kun du bsreg par gyur par bsgoms nas /
T02TD2590E:265a-3: rdo rje dril bu rdo rje bsdams pas bskyod cing //
T02TD2590E:265a-4: nga rgyal brtan pa dang ldan zhing bsgyings pa dang bcas pas //
T02TD2590E:265a-5: 'phags pa skul byed ma'i phreng ba'i sngags brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:265a-7: smya ksam sungha ko t'i n'am /
T02TD2590E:265a-8: ta dya th'a tsa le tshu le tsu nde sv'a h'a /
T02TD2590E:265a-9: ma h'a b'i rya aa pra ti ha ta sh'a sa ni ma h'a ba la pa ra kra me /
T02TD2590E:265a-10: aa si mu sa la pa ra shu p'a sha gri hi ha ste /
T02TD2590E:265a-11: ma h'a kro dha kro dhe shva ri /
T02TD2590E:265a-12: au dra r'u po ni aa nanta mu khi /
T02TD2590E:265a-14: aa dzi te aa pa r'a dzi te /
T02TD2590E:265a-15: aa mo ghe du rda me /
T02TD2590E:265a-17: sarbba ta th'a ga ta aa dhi shatha na sarbba de ba t'a bandi te /
T02TD2590E:265a-18: p'u dzi te pra s'a dhe te /
T02TD2590E:265a-23: badzro na mi li t'a ksha ye /
T02TD2590E:265a-24: aa gho te gho ra r'u po ni /
T02TD2590E:265a-25: bi kri ta da rsha ne /
T02TD2590E:265a-26: badzre bee d'urya aa lam kri ta sha r'i re /
T02TD2590E:265a-27: aom bha ga ba ti tsunde /
T02TD2590E:265a-33: a'a be sa ya a'a be sha ya /
T02TD2590E:265a-34: grihna grihna grihn'a pa ya grihn'a pa ya /
T02TD2590E:265a-39: m'a ra ya m'a ra ya /
T02TD2590E:265a-46: dva hi kam try'a hi kam tsa tu rthi hi kam / satt'a hi kam / ni tya dzva ram /
T02TD2590E:265a-47: mo hu rhi kam / gra ham /
T02TD2590E:265a-57: ye s'a ma hi sandhi ki tsid dushta /
T02TD2590E:265a-59: s'a da ya s'a da ya /
T02TD2590E:265a-61: sho sha ya sho sha ya //
T02TD2590E:265a-62: t'a pa ya t'a pa ya //
T02TD2590E:265a-69: m'a ra ya m'a ra ya /
T02TD2590E:265a-74: aom tsa le tsu el tsu de sarba aarth'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2590E:265a-75: des na nges par 'bab par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2590E:265a-76: snod la dbab pa'i cho ga la yang cho ga 'di nyid kyis dpal rnam par sang mdzad kyi sbyor ba'am //
T02TD2590E:265a-77: dpal 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i sbyor ba bya'o //
T02TD2590E:265a-78: babs nas mngon par shes pa lnga la sogs pa'i mtshon ma skad cig de nyid la 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2590E:265a-79: de'i lce aa dmar po bsam la /
T02TD2590E:265a-80: bru hi badza zhes brjod na /
T02TD2590E:265b-0: dge @265b ba'am mi dge ba thams cad ston par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2590E:265b-1: de nas mngon par 'dod pa thams cad dris la dbab par brtan par bya ba sngon du 'gro bas yang dag par mchod cing //
T02TD2590E:265b-2: babs pa'i lha ji lta ba bzhin gshegs su gsol lo //
T02TD2590E:265b-3: dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa na khyed kyi mig gis ji ltar mthong zhes dris la /
T02TD2590E:265b-7: nag po la sogs pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor snang ba las rim bzhin du mchog gi don zhi ba dang /
T02TD2590E:265b-10: mngon spyod kyi dngos grub kyi snod du gyur par shes nas 'jug pa'i phyag rgya snying gar bcings pa bkrol la dbab te /
T02TD2590E:265b-11: tishtha badzra dri dho me bha ba /
T02TD2590E:265b-12: sh'a shva to me bha ba /
T02TD2590E:265b-13: hri da yam me aa dhi tishtha sarbba siddhi mme pra ya tstsha /
T02TD2590E:265b-15: ci ttam dhre yam ku ru h'um ha ha ha ha ho:zhes brjod pas sa brtan par byas la /
T02TD2590E:265b-16: yi ge h'um gi phreng ba de /
T02TD2590E:265b-17: yi ge tr'am gis byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD2590E:265b-18: dkyil 'khor du dor la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:265b-19: pra t'i tstsha badzra ho: gong du ba bas par gyur pa'i ha de de la 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2590E:265b-20: de nas phreng ba de mgo bor bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:265b-21: pra ti gri hna tva mi mam //
T02TD2590E:265b-23: de nas snying gar bdag po //
T02TD2590E:265b-24: mig tu aom dpral ba bsams la 'dis gdong g-yogs dgrol bar bya'o //
T02TD2590E:265b-26: tsaksh'u dgha [?] ta na ha tpa ra /
T02TD2590E:265b-27: aungha ta ya da sarbb'a ksho badzra tsa kshu aa nu ta ram /
T02TD2590E:265b-28: de ring dang po'i shugs kyis ni /
T02TD2590E:265b-30: sangs rgyas gdung gi rigs su skyes //
T02TD2590E:265b-31: sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs //
T02TD2590E:265b-32: dngos grub thams cad phun sum tshogs //
T02TD2590E:265b-33: dam tshig mchog tu 'gyur par byed //
T02TD2590E:265b-34: rdo rje pad mchog rol pa dang /
T02TD2590E:265b-35: gsang sngags rnams ni mnyes par gyis //
T02TD2590E:265b-37: dkyil 'khor gdegs pa'i phag rgya dang /
T02TD2590E:265b-38: sngags su bcad pas dkyil 'khor bteg la /
T02TD2590E:265b-41: byin gyi rlabs ji lta ba la dkyil 'khor bteg pa mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2590E:265b-42: de nas bco ma ldan 'das 'phags pa gshin rje gshegs las brtsams te /
T02TD2590E:266a-1: dpal gyi mthar thug pa'i bar gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad bstan par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:266a-2: de nas rdo rje slob dpon la //
T02TD2590E:266a-3: yon ni mang du phul nas su //
T02TD2590E:266a-4: tshigs su bcad pas phyag byas nas //
T02TD2590E:266a-5: dbang bskur bar ni gsol ba gdab //
T02TD2590E:266a-6: byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la //
T02TD2590E:266a-7: mchod chen ji ltar stsal ba bzhin //
T02TD2590E:266a-8: bdag kyang rab tu bskyab pa'i phyir //
T02TD2590E:266a-9: nam mkha'i rdo rje deng bdag stsol //
T02TD2590E:266a-10: slob dpon gyis kyang de dbang bsur bar bya ba'i phyir rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du khru gnyis dor bar //
T02TD2590E:266a-11: shar sgor mngon par bltas pa dkyil 'khor gyi phyed kyi tshad la rim pa gnyis pa //
T02TD2590E:266a-12: zur bzhi pa sgo bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor bris la //
T02TD2590E:266a-13: de'i dbus su padma 'dab ma brgyad pa ze ba dang bcas pa bri /
T02TD2590E:266a-14: snam bu'i shar du rdo rje /
T02TD2590E:266a-17: byang du ral gri bris pa /
T02TD2590E:266a-18: slob ma lus shin tu khrus byas shing dri dang bdug pa dang /
T02TD2590E:266a-19: phreng ba la sogs pa dang yang dag par ldan pa /
T02TD2590E:266a-20: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa der bzhag la /
T02TD2590E:266a-21: sbyang ba'i cho ga bya ste /
T02TD2590E:266a-22: 'phags pa bdud rtsi thab sbyor bzlas pa'am //
T02TD2590E:266a-23: yi ge h'um bzlas pa'i yungs kar khu tshur g-yas dang g-yon gyis bzung bas rim pa bzhin du lan gnyis gnyis dang rang gi logs nas bskor te /
T02TD2590E:266a-24: kham phor gyi me'i nang du dor la yang khu tshur de gnyis kyis cig car g-yas nas bskor te /
T02TD2590E:266a-25: de bzhin du sbyang ba byas la /
T02TD2590E:266a-26: yungs kar mer dor ba lag pa g-yas dang g-yon gyis de bzhin du chu sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2590E:266a-27: de nas gnyis ka la yang nye reg bya'o //
T02TD2590E:266a-28: de nas slob dpon bdag nyid dang slob ma bsrung ba byas la //
T02TD2590E:266a-29: rigs kyi yul bzlas pa'i dris byugs pa dang /
T02TD2590E:266a-30: de nyid bzlas pa'i me tog gi phreng bas mgo bo dkris la /
T02TD2590E:266a-31: rigs kyi snying pos mchod yon byin te /
T02TD2590E:266a-32: mar dang bcas pa'i sardza ra sa'i spos la bdud rtsi thab sbyor bzlas pa'am /
T02TD2590E:266a-33: yi ge h'um bzlas pas bdug par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:266a-34: nges par sbyong ba'i cho ga'i //
T02TD2590E:266b-0: de nas 'jam pa'i rdo rjer byas la rang nyid kyis sngags dang phyag rgya dang lha'i 'khor lo ma lus pa gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bkod la rdo rje sems ma la sogs pas byin gyis brlab cing skul @266b * //
T02TD2590E:266b-1: sogs pa byin gyis brlabs la phyag rgya chen por rab tu bzhag ste /
T02TD2590E:266b-2: steng du bla re bre ba dang /
T02TD2590E:266b-3: g-yas logs su yi ge h'um bzlas pa'i mar tog gi phreng bas brgyan pa'i rin po che'i gdugs dang /
T02TD2590E:266b-4: g-yon du man mkha'i mdzod bzlas pa'i rgyal mtshan dang /
T02TD2590E:266b-5: rnga yab dang ba dan sna tshogs pa dang /
T02TD2590E:266b-6: me tog la sogs pa dang sgeg mo la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD2590E:266b-7: mchod yon gyin la dung dang rda bo che dang /
T02TD2590E:266b-9: zangs dung la sogs pa'i sil snyan rnams kyis nam kha'i ngos rnams kun du gang bar bsams la /
T02TD2590E:266b-10: rdo rje dril bu dkrol ba dang ;
T02TD2590E:266b-11: phun sum tshogs pa mang ba gser gyi ro bo 'dra //
T02TD2590E:266b-12: 'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po dri ma gsum spangs pa //
T02TD2590E:266b-13: sangs rgyas padma rgyas 'dra'i spyan mnga' ba //
T02TD2590E:266b-14: bkra shis de ni skye dgu zhi byed dang po'o //
T02TD2590E:266b-15: de yis nye bar bstan pa'i mchog rab mi g-yo ba //
T02TD2590E:266b-16: 'jig rten gsum na grang shing lha dang mis mchod pa /
T02TD2590E:266b-17: chos kyi dam pa skye dgu rnams la zhi byed pa //
T02TD2590E:266b-18: de ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis gnyis pa'o //
T02TD2590E:266b-19: dge 'dun dam pa chos ldan thob pa'i bkra shis phyug / mi dang lha dang lha ma yin gyi mchod pa'i gnas //
T02TD2590E:266b-20: tshogs kyi mchog rab ngo tsha shes dang /
T02TD2590E:266b-22: de ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis gsum pa'o //
T02TD2590E:266b-23: sems can kun la phan phyir byang chub mnga' ba po //
T02TD2590E:266b-24: don rnams thams cad 'grub par brtul ba yongs ldan pa //
T02TD2590E:266b-25: tshogs kyi lam dgyes thub pa'i bkra shis gang byung ba //
T02TD2590E:266b-26: skra shis de ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /'gro la phan phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dga' lha yi //
T02TD2590E:266b-27: gzhal med khang gi snying po nas ni 'dir gshegs te //
T02TD2590E:266b-28: dang bcas lhas bskor ba yi bkra shis gang byung ba //
T02TD2590E:266b-29: bkra shis de ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog //
T02TD2590E:266b-30: lo ma me tog 'od 'bar nyams dga' lumba'i tshal //
T02TD2590E:266b-31: lha mang dag gis brten par mgon po bltams pa na /
T02TD2590E:266b-32: srid pa'i mthar phyir pa yi bkra shis gang byung ba //
T02TD2590E:266b-33: bkra shis de ni skyed dgu rnams la zhi byed shog //
T02TD2590E:266b-34: grong khyer ser skya'i gnas nas rgyal po'i pho brang du //
T02TD2590E:267a-0: lhums nas bltams pa ston pa bde gshegs @267a * //
T02TD2590E:267a-2: myur ba skrun bdud rtsi'i chus gtor ba yi bkra shis gang yin pa //
T02TD2590E:267a-3: bkra shis de ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog //
T02TD2590E:267a-4: grong khyer dam pa ser skya'i gnas zhes bya ba ni //
T02TD2590E:267a-5: rmad du byung ba grags pa che ba'i lha yis mngon bstod pa //
T02TD2590E:267a-6: bsam yas dge bsgrubs bsod nams phung po'i bkra shis gang yin pa //
T02TD2590E:267a-7: bkra shis de ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog //
T02TD2590E:267a-8: dgyes shing nam phyed grong khyed mchog nas mngon byung ste //
T02TD2590E:267a-9: dka' thub tshal du mngon par gshegs shing tshangs la sogs //
T02TD2590E:267a-10: lha yi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba'i bkra shis gang yin pa //
T02TD2590E:267a-11: bkra shis de ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /
T02TD2590E:267a-12: rab tu 'od 'bar gser dang 'dra ba'i sku mnga' zhing //
T02TD2590E:267a-13: bee d'urya ltar sdo ba'i rtsva bting steng bzhugs te //
T02TD2590E:267a-14: skyil mo krung bcas mi g-yo mchog gi bkra shis gang //
T02TD2590E:267a-15: bkra shis de ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /
T02TD2590E:267a-16: chu bo'i 'gram na tsha sha phreng gis yongs bskor ba //
T02TD2590E:267a-17: shin tu rmad du byung ba srid pa sel mdzad pa //
T02TD2590E:267a-18: klu yi rgyal pos phyag byas pa yi bkra shis gang //
T02TD2590E:267a-19: bkra shis de nis kye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog / shing rgyal dung gshegs byams pa'i stobs kyis bdud phyi phyogs //
T02TD2590E:267a-20: mang po btul tshe sa steng dang ni nam mkha' la /
T02TD2590E:267a-21: bcom ldan bkra shis rnam ba sna tshogs gang byung ba //
T02TD2590E:267a-22: bkra shis de ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog //
T02TD2590E:267a-23: sdug bsngal mtha' dag gzhig phyir rdo rje gdan bzhugs te /
T02TD2590E:267a-24: nam gyi tho rngas bdud bzhi po rnam rab btul ba /
T02TD2590E:267a-25: ston pa bde bar gshegs pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa //
T02TD2590E:267a-26: bkra shis de ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog / grong khyer w'a r'a na s'ir drang srod mchog bzhugs nas //
T02TD2590E:267a-27: chos kyi 'khor lo mchog bstan pa yi bkra shis gang /
T02TD2590E:267a-28: lha yul dang 'dir shin tu rmad du byung gyur pa //
T02TD2590E:267a-29: bkra shis de ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog //
T02TD2590E:267a-30: bkra shis gang zhig phan byed dam pa dag byed pa /
T02TD2590E:267a-31: bsod nams bya phyed 'phags pa'i skye bos mngon bstod pa //
T02TD2590E:267a-32: bcom ldan sh'akya thub pa'i seng ges gang gsungs pa //
T02TD2590E:267b-0: bkra shis de ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog / mu stegs byed pa kun gyi nga rgyal gzhom @267b pa dang ;
T02TD2590E:267b-1: /'gro la bde ba skyed phyir cho 'phrul dam pa dag //
T02TD2590E:267b-2: nye bar ston pa rgyal ba'i bkra shis gang yin pa //
T02TD2590E:267b-3: bkra shis de ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /
T02TD2590E:267b-4: 'gro la phan phyir mtho ris nas ni 'dir gshegs te /
T02TD2590E:267b-5: tshangs pa la sogs lha tshogs lag na rnga yab gdugs //
T02TD2590E:267b-6: sna tshogs thogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i bkra shis gang /
T02TD2590E:267b-7: bkra shis de ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byes shog //
T02TD2590E:267b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba mchog tu nyer gshegs pa //
T02TD2590E:267b-9: mand'a ra bas me tog mang pos mngon mchod pa /
T02TD2590E:267b-10: lha mchog rnams kyis mngon par bstod pa'i bkra shis gang //
T02TD2590E:267b-11: bkra shis de ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog //
T02TD2590E:267b-12: lha dang glu dang mi yi dbang pos phyag byas pa //
T02TD2590E:267b-13: mkha' lding gnyos spyin dri za'i dbang pos mchod gyur pa //
T02TD2590E:267b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa stobs bcu ldan gyi bkra shis gang //
T02TD2590E:267b-15: bkra shis de ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog / ces bya ba la sogs pa'i bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa dang glu blang sla de seng de'i gdan nam khri la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dar gyis g-yogs pa yi ge h'um bzlas pa la bzhag ste dang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2590E:267b-16: dang por ni rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pas so //
T02TD2590E:267b-17: de nas ni lha mo bzhi'i bum pa dang /
T02TD2590E:267b-18: lha thams cad kyi bum pas re re zhing rang gi sngags zlos shing dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2590E:267b-19: de ltar phyi'i dang bskur ba byin nas gsang ba'i dang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2590E:267b-20: de nas rang gi snying ga las byung ba'i 'od kyi tshogs kyis phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /
T02TD2590E:267b-21: rig pa'i lha mo slob ma dbang bskur bar bya ba'i phyir yang dag par bskul la /
T02TD2590E:267b-22: sngar smras pa'i tshigs su bcad pas 'di la stsal du gsol zhes //
T02TD2590E:267b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la gsol ba btab pas sngon gyi phan par mdzad pa dang /
T02TD2590E:267b-24: thugs rje chen po'i shugs kyis nam mkha'i gtos thams cad til gyi gang bu ltar gang bar byon nas //
T02TD2590E:267b-29: sil snyan dang rol mo la sogs pa'i dbang bskur ba'i mchod pa'i yo byad dang ldan pa rnams dang /
T02TD2590E:268a-0: rig pa'i lha mo padma'i rtsa ba ltar @268a * //
T02TD2590E:268a-1: dkar pa'i ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i chus gang ba'i bum pa phyag na bsnams pa rnams kyis phyag gi rtse mo mchog gis slob ma rnams la //
T02TD2590E:268a-2: dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje che //
T02TD2590E:268a-3: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dang /
T02TD2590E:268a-4: sngags kyis dbang bskur bar gyur par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:268a-5: de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /
T02TD2590E:268a-6: lha mo de nas slob ma'i ba sbu'i bu ga rnams su zhugs pas lus thams cad de'i rang bzhin du byas te /
T02TD2590E:268a-7: mi bskyod pa cod pan gyi tshul gyis gnas par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:268a-8: dbang skur ba lnga po sngar bshad pa nyid kyi sngags dang phyag rgya dang bcas pas bstan par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:268a-9: de nas go cha bskon la dar dpyangs 'phyang ba dang mnyam pa'i thal mos dgab bar byas la //
T02TD2590E:268a-10: rdo rje'i dang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2590E:268a-11: bdag po'i dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2590E:268a-12: ming gi dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2590E:268a-13: dam tshig sum yang sgrub pa'i thabs kyi rim pas sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:268a-14: de'i 'og tu dngos grub kyi rdo rje'i brtul zhugs sbyin no //
T02TD2590E:268a-15: slob mas kyang rdo rje thal mo bskor bas lar phyag byas la /
T02TD2590E:268a-16: dang bskur ba blang bar bya'o //
T02TD2590E:268a-17: de nas yang dag par bstod la sgeg mo la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas gar sngon du gro ba dang /
T02TD2590E:268a-18: sgeg pa dang bcas pas slob ma de la l'a sya zhes bya ba dang me tog cig 'phags la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:268a-19: deng nas brtsams te rdzogs sangs rgya //
T02TD2590E:268a-20: de'i sras lhan cig rol par gyis //
T02TD2590E:268a-21: rdo rje bsnyems pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2590E:268a-22: dga' ba'i mchod pa bde mchog yin //
T02TD2590E:268a-23: aa: sgeg bcas phreng ba 'phen pa dang //
T02TD2590E:268a-24: sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par gyis //
T02TD2590E:268a-25: phreng ba de yi rgyan yin pas //
T02TD2590E:268a-27: aom lus can kun la dam chos kyi //
T02TD2590E:268a-28: yang dag brjod pa glu ru blang //
T02TD2590E:268a-29: de ni myur bar bde gshegs de'i //
T02TD2590E:268a-30: bde ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur //
T02TD2590E:268a-31: g'i thal mo gar bcas phul ba yis //
T02TD2590E:268a-32: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyes par gyis //
T02TD2590E:268a-33: rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i las //
T02TD2590E:268a-34: rol mos gar ni byed por 'gyur //
T02TD2590E:268a-35: ho: bdug spos phul bas rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02TD2590E:268a-36: brtul zhugs bzang pos cher tshim gyis //
T02TD2590E:268a-38: ye shes kyis ni tshim par 'gyur //
T02TD2590E:268b-0: aa: me tog @268b gtor bas rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02TD2590E:268b-1: slar yang byang chub yan lag bsags //
T02TD2590E:268b-2: mtshan dang dpe byad ldan pa yi //
T02TD2590E:268b-4: bh'um rdo rje chos ltar rang nyid kyis //
T02TD2590E:268b-5: chos kyi me ni legs sbar la //
T02TD2590E:268b-6: ma rig ldongs byas sems can rnams //
T02TD2590E:268b-7: ye shes snang bas bsal bar gyis //
T02TD2590E:268b-8: pum rgyal ba khyod kyis dril phul bas //
T02TD2590E:268b-9: lus can rnams la byang chub bskor //
T02TD2590E:268b-10: tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab dang /
T02TD2590E:268b-11: rnam grol ye shes mthong ba yin //
T02TD2590E:268b-12: ga: de nas bdag po'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas gser gyi thur ma bzlas pa blangs la /
T02TD2590E:268b-13: mdun du 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:268b-14: ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis //
T02TD2590E:268b-15: 'jig rten lung tog bsam la ltar //
T02TD2590E:268b-16: bu khyod kyis ni mi shes pa'i //
T02TD2590E:268b-17: rab ri ba rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal //
T02TD2590E:268b-18: aom badzra ne tra aa pa ha ra ti mi ram hri: slob ma'i mig gnyis su yi ge pra bsam sla byug par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:268b-19: de nas me long bstan la /
T02TD2590E:268b-20: chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:268b-21: chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste //
T02TD2590E:268b-22: dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med //
T02TD2590E:268b-23: gzung du med cing brjod du med //
T02TD2590E:268b-24: rgyu dang las las kun du 'byung //
T02TD2590E:268b-25: ngo bo nyid med gnas med par //
T02TD2590E:268b-26: de ltar chos 'di shes nas su //
T02TD2590E:268b-27: sems can don ni mnyam med byos //
T02TD2590E:268b-28: 'on kyang snags rgyas sras su skyes //
T02TD2590E:268b-29: de nas dbyangs kyi yi ge tha ma las byung a'i dril bu dkrol la byin te /
T02TD2590E:268b-30: chos rnams nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
T02TD2590E:268b-31: nam mkha' la yang mtshan yid med //
T02TD2590E:268b-32: nam mkha' dang mnyam sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2590E:268b-33: kun mchog mnyam pa nyid du gsal //
T02TD2590E:268b-34: de nas yi ge hos gzhu byin la //
T02TD2590E:268b-36: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par gyis shig ces brjod de //
T02TD2590E:268b-37: phyogs bzhir mda' bzhi 'phang bar bya'o //
T02TD2590E:268b-40: yang aa:badzra stva zhes bya ba 'dis me long blangs la //
T02TD2590E:268b-41: rdo rje sems dpa' me long bzhin //
T02TD2590E:268b-42: dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med //
T02TD2590E:268b-43: sangs rgyas kun bdag rang nyid ni //
T02TD2590E:268b-44: bu khyod kyi ni snying la zhugs //
T02TD2590E:269a-0: gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag por byang chub kyi sems ni 'di yin par shes par gyis shig ces brjod par @269a * //
T02TD2590E:269a-2: de nas aom badzra he tu mam zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2590E:269a-3: rkang pa gnyis kyi bar du chos kyi 'khor lo gzhag //
T02TD2590E:269a-4: aom badzra bha sha ram zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2590E:269a-5: lag pa g-yas su dung dbyangs kyi yi ge dang pos lag pa g-yon du glegs bam dang /
T02TD2590E:269a-6: dbyangs kyi yi ge tha mas dril bu byin la //
T02TD2590E:269a-7: de nas brtsams te sems bskyed pa tsam gyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor cig / de ring phan cad 'jig rten la //
T02TD2590E:269a-8: skyob pa rnams kyis 'khor lo bskor //
T02TD2590E:269a-9: chos kyi dung ni bla med pas //
T02TD2590E:269a-10: kun du ma lus gang bar gyis /
T02TD2590E:269a-11: som nyi yid gnyis mi bya zhing //
T02TD2590E:269a-12: dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis su //
T02TD2590E:269a-13: gsang sngags spyad pa'i tshul gyi mchog //
T02TD2590E:269a-15: de ltar byas na sangs rgyas la //
T02TD2590E:269a-16: phan thogs drin du gzo zhes bya //
T02TD2590E:269a-17: rdo rje 'dzin pa de kun kyang //
T02TD2590E:269a-18: kun du khyod la srung bar byed //
T02TD2590E:269a-19: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i sbyor ba ji lta ba dang ldan pas //
T02TD2590E:269a-20: 'jig rten kun la thams cad du //
T02TD2590E:269a-21: sems cad kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2590E:269a-23: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
T02TD2590E:269a-24: de bzhin du rdo rje dang /
T02TD2590E:269a-27: nor bu'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor zhes tshigs su bcad pa lngas rjes su gang ba byin la //
T02TD2590E:269a-29: phyag rgya chen po rgyur gyur da sa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyi sbyor bas snying gar g-yon pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gyis chos gos kyi tha ma 'dzin pa'i tshul du byas la g-yas pas mchog sbyin pa la /
T02TD2590E:269a-30: rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bas lung bstan par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:269a-32: by'a ka ro mi tvam badzra sa tva ta th'a ga ta bha ba dur ga ti to dhi ty'a nta bha ba siddha ye he badzra n'a ma ta th'a ga ta siddha sa ma ya stvam /
T02TD2590E:269a-33: bhur bhu ba sv'a: gang la gzengs bstod pa d'i dang /
T02TD2590E:269a-34: phyag rgya chen pos lung bstan pa mchog tu gsang ba'i cho gas byas pa de la rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
T02TD2590E:269a-35: rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rang gi dam tshig slob dpon la mgrin gcig tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par mdzad do //
T02TD2590E:269b-0: gzengs bstod pa 'di nyid dang phyag rgya chen pos mchog tu gsang @269b ba dam pa'i dngos grub kyi byin gyis brlab pa 'di dang /
T02TD2590E:269b-1: gsang sngags kyi stobs la dad par bya'o zhes slob ma rnams la brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:269b-2: de nas dkyil 'khor du gsang ba brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2590E:269b-3: 'dod chags bral ba lta bu yi //
T02TD2590E:269b-4: khams gsum na ni sdig med de //
T02TD2590E:269b-5: de bas 'dod la chags bral bar //
T02TD2590E:269b-6: khyod kyis kyang ni ma byed cig / ma h'a sa ma ya ha na phat //
T02TD2590E:269b-7: de'i 'og tu rnag gi lag pa g-yon pas slob ma'i mthe bo g-yas pa bzung la /
T02TD2590E:269b-8: slob ma'i gtso bo la dmigs nas mar gyi sreg blugs bya ba dang /
T02TD2590E:269b-9: sbrang rtsi dang mar dang zho dang bsres pa'i til gyi sreg blugs brgya byas la ;
T02TD2590E:269b-10: bsang gtor byas te snying gar byugs la las thams cad pa dang //
T02TD2590E:269b-11: rigs kyi snying po bzlas pa'i srung skud dang /
T02TD2590E:269b-12: gdu bu lag ngar du gdags par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:269b-13: de nas de'i mgo bor gdugs bzhag la /
T02TD2590E:269b-14: skor ba byed du bcug ste /
T02TD2590E:269b-15: thal mo sbyar ba dang bcas par dkyil 'khor gyi sgor gdugs dang bcas par lus phab la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:269b-16: slob ma 'di ni phul ba lags //
T02TD2590E:269b-18: gdugs bzhag nas ni slob dpon gyis //
T02TD2590E:269b-19: snying la 'bab pa de la brjod //
T02TD2590E:269b-20: da ni dkyil 'khor slob dpon gur //
T02TD2590E:269b-22: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T02TD2590E:269b-23: lha rnams kun gyis bkur bar 'gyur //
T02TD2590E:269b-24: sems can kun la snying brtse'i phyir //
T02TD2590E:269b-25: khyod kyis dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin //
T02TD2590E:269b-26: nan tan bskyed de bri bar gyis //
T02TD2590E:269b-27: sgrub pa po yang rgyud la sbyor / de nas rang nyid kyis lan brgya bzlas pa dang bcas pa'i sngags phyag rgya dang ldan par slob ma la byin la /
T02TD2590E:269b-28: bcom ldan 'di la stsal lags kyis //
T02TD2590E:269b-30: bcom ldan bdag gis bzung lags kyis //
T02TD2590E:269b-31: bdag la 'go bar mdzad du gsol //
T02TD2590E:269b-32: zhes rim bzhin du slob dpon dang slob ma dag gis sngags bskur la smra bas byin la //
T02TD2590E:269b-33: dkyil 'khor du bzlas la lha rnams kyi phyag rgya bzhi yang bslabs la /
T02TD2590E:269b-34: khyod kyis gzhan phyag rgya la mi mkhas pa gang la yang phyag rgya rnams ston par ma byed cig / de ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02TD2590E:270a-0: 'di ltar sems can de rnams ni dkyil 'khor ma mthong par phyag rgya bcing ba la rab tu sbyor ba las @270a * //
T02TD2590E:270a-1: 'bras bu ma thob pa dang som nyir gyur nas ya nga ba ma spangs pas dus byas nas dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2590E:270a-2: rgyu des na ji ltar zhugs pa rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa la sogs pa'i dbugs dbyung pa sbyin par bya ste /
T02TD2590E:270a-3: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni ;
T02TD2590E:270a-4: / mthong ba dang ni zhugs gyur pas //
T02TD2590E:270a-5: sdig pa kun las nges grol zhing //
T02TD2590E:270a-6: khyed rnams de nyid legs par gnas //
T02TD2590E:270a-7: bde chen thog pa 'di las ni //
T02TD2590E:270a-8: slar 'chi ba ni yod min te //
T02TD2590E:270a-9: mi shigs pa dang mi sod pas //
T02TD2590E:270a-10: cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis //
T02TD2590E:270a-11: srid pa'i sdug bsngal las khyod bton //
T02TD2590E:270a-12: srid pa shin tu grub pa'i phyir //
T02TD2590E:270a-13: ston pa mchog tu gyur pa yin //
T02TD2590E:270a-14: dam tshig sdom pa grub pa 'di //
T02TD2590E:270a-15: rtag tu khyod kyis bsrung bar bya //
T02TD2590E:270a-16: sangs rgyas kun gyis mthun par gsungs //
T02TD2590E:270a-17: gang zhig bskyed pa tsam gyis ni //
T02TD2590E:270a-18: sangs rgyas nyid du dogs med pa'i //
T02TD2590E:270a-19: byang chub sems kyang gtang mi bya //
T02TD2590E:270a-20: phyag rgya rdo rje gang yin pa'i //
T02TD2590E:270a-21: de ring phan chad bu khyod kyis //
T02TD2590E:270a-22: srog dang rus pa la bab kyang //
T02TD2590E:270a-23: dam pa'i chos dang byang chub sems //
T02TD2590E:270a-24: slob dpon dag kyang brnyas mi bya //
T02TD2590E:270a-25: gdug la byams dang chags bral bar //
T02TD2590E:270a-26: nam yang bya ba ma yin no //
T02TD2590E:270a-27: de ltar byas nas sangs rgyas kyis //
T02TD2590E:270a-28: khyod ni dmyal ba'i me nang 'dor ;
T02TD2590E:270a-29: / bdag nyid yongs su spangs nas su //
T02TD2590E:270a-30: dka' thub kyis kyang ma gsungs shig / ci bde bar ni bde bar gzung //
T02TD2590E:270a-31: 'di ni ma byon rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02TD2590E:270a-32: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya rnams //
T02TD2590E:270a-33: nam yang yongs su mi dor zhing //
T02TD2590E:270a-34: slob dpon smad par mi bya ste /
T02TD2590E:270a-36: sangs rgyas kun mtshungs bla ma yi //
T02TD2590E:270a-37: slob dpon la ni gang smod pa //
T02TD2590E:270a-38: de ni sangs rgyas kun smad pas //
T02TD2590E:270a-39: rtag tu sdug bsngal thob 'gyur te //
T02TD2590E:270a-40: rims dang dug dang dbyig dug nad //
T02TD2590E:270a-41: mkha' 'gro rnams kyis gtsos pa dang /
T02TD2590E:270a-42: gdon dang log 'dren gtum po yis /
T02TD2590E:270a-43: bsad nas sems can dmyal ltung 'gyur //
T02TD2590E:270a-44: de bas nan tan thams cad kyis //
T02TD2590E:270a-45: rdo rje slob dpon slob gros che //
T02TD2590E:270a-46: dge la rab tu mi spyom pa //
T02TD2590E:270a-47: nam yang smad par mi bya'o //
T02TD2590E:270a-48: bla ma la ni gus bcas yod //
T02TD2590E:270a-49: rjes mthun khyod kyis sbyin par bya //
T02TD2590E:270a-50: des na rims sogs gnod pa rnams //
T02TD2590E:270b-0: rang gi dam @270b tshig slob dpon ni //
T02TD2590E:270b-1: sbyin min bu dang chung ma dang //
T02TD2590E:270b-2: rang srog gis rtag bsten bya na //
T02TD2590E:270b-3: longs spyod g-yo ba smos ci dgos //
T02TD2590E:270b-4: gang phyir bskal ba byed par ni //
T02TD2590E:270b-5: grangs med par rnyed dka' ba yi //
T02TD2590E:270b-6: sangs rgyas nyid kyang brtson ldan la //
T02TD2590E:270b-7: tshe 'di nyid la ster bar byed //
T02TD2590E:270b-8: rtag tu rang gi dam tshig bsung //
T02TD2590E:270b-9: rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa mchod //
T02TD2590E:270b-10: rtag tu bla ma la yang dbul //
T02TD2590E:270b-12: de byin sangs rgyas thams cad la //
T02TD2590E:270b-13: rtag tu byin pa nyid du 'gyur //
T02TD2590E:270b-14: de byin bsod nams tshogs yin te //
T02TD2590E:270b-15: tshogs las dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur //
T02TD2590E:270b-16: slob dpon gyi ni yon tan bzung //
T02TD2590E:270b-17: skyon rnams nams kyang ma yin no //
T02TD2590E:270b-18: yon tan bzung bas dngos grub cing //
T02TD2590E:270b-19: skyon rnams kyi sa ni dngos grub nyams //
T02TD2590E:270b-20: de yi grib ma 'gom pa ni //
T02TD2590E:270b-21: mchod rten bshig dang 'dra bar gsungs //
T02TD2590E:270b-22: rgyu dang mi rgyu'i gsangs ba pa //
T02TD2590E:270b-23: dam pa thams cad spangs par 'gyur //
T02TD2590E:270b-24: slob dpon smong [*smod] par byed pa dag //
T02TD2590E:270b-25: rmi lam du yang mthong mi bya //
T02TD2590E:270b-26: slob dpon smad pa gang yin te /
T02TD2590E:270b-27: bgegs dang log 'dren rnams kyis gzung//
T02TD2590E:270b-28: gtum po'i las byed ngan pa'i bdag / mkhas pas rtag tu spang bar bya //
T02TD2590E:270b-29: mnar med la sogs 'jigs rung ba'i //
T02TD2590E:270b-30: dmyal ba bstan pa gang yin pa //
T02TD2590E:270b-31: der ni slob dpon smad byed pa //
T02TD2590E:270b-32: gnas par 'gyur zhes rab tu gsungs //
T02TD2590E:270b-33: de phyir kun gyis rab bsgrims te //
T02TD2590E:270b-34: bsam yas 'bras bu sbyin byed pa //
T02TD2590E:270b-36: sems can dad pas de mchod cig / gang phyir 'di ni legs gnas pas //
T02TD2590E:270b-37: deng khod skye ba 'bras bur bcas //
T02TD2590E:270b-38: dam tshig lha rnams kun mnyam par //
T02TD2590E:270b-39: deng khyod gyur par the tshom med //
T02TD2590E:270b-40: sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas pa //
T02TD2590E:270b-41: kun gyi deng khyod dbang bskur bas //
T02TD2590E:270b-42: khams gsum gyi ni rgyal po che //
T02TD2590E:270b-43: rgyal ba'i bdag por bstan pa yin //
T02TD2590E:270b-44: deng ni bdud las rnam rgyal te //
T02TD2590E:270b-45: dgong khyer mchog tu rab tu zhugs //
T02TD2590E:270b-46: khyed rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas nyid //
T02TD2590E:270b-47: deng 'dir thob par the tshom med //
T02TD2590E:270b-48: 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad kyis //
T02TD2590E:270b-49: cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis //
T02TD2590E:270b-51: sdig pa med kyis ma 'jigs shig / de ltar yid ni rab dang rdo rje nyid du gyis //
T02TD2590E:270b-52: rang gi dam tshig mi zad bde bskyed bsten par gyis //
T02TD2590E:271a-2: rab tu mnyam zhing rtag pa nyid du rtogs par 'gyur //
T02TD2590E:271a-3: slob ma rab dang mnyes gshin pas //
T02TD2590E:271a-4: bla ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2590E:271a-5: gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal ba //
T02TD2590E:271a-6: de bzhin bdag ni bgyid ces brjod //
T02TD2590E:271a-7: de ltar na mdor bsdus pa dang bar ma dang rgya che ba'i dbang bskur ba'i dbye ba ni 'dir ma thos te /
T02TD2590E:271a-8: yongs su rdzogs pa'i cho ga gcig pu nyid thob pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2590E:271a-9: de ltar na yang mkhan po'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa'i 'phags pa rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga'i rim pa rjes su 'brangs nas gsum du bya bar 'dod par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:271a-10: spyi'i dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2590E:271a-11: gzhan yang dpon du dbang bskur bar 'os pa'i slob ma la /
T02TD2590E:271a-12: de bzhin du khrus dang gos dang rgyan la sogs pas brgyan la dam tshig gsum sbyin pa'i mthar thug pa'i cho ga byas la /
T02TD2590E:271a-13: dkyil 'khor du mngon par phyogs par zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag la /
T02TD2590E:271a-14: slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid dang /
T02TD2590E:271a-15: lha'i de kho na nyid dang /
T02TD2590E:271a-16: slob dpon gyi las rnams bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2590E:271a-17: de nyid de'i slob dpon gyis dbang bskur ba'i gnas yin no //
T02TD2590E:271a-18: 'di dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba yin par gsungs so //
T02TD2590E:271a-19: de nas tshigs su bcad pa lnga pas rjes su gnang ba byin la /
T02TD2590E:271a-20: gzengs bstod pas lung bstan par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:271a-21: dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2590E:271a-22: mi mnyam med pas zur bzhir mnyam //
T02TD2590E:271a-23: dran dang dbang pos sgo bzhi ste //
T02TD2590E:271a-24: bsam gtan rnams kyis rta babs bzhi //
T02TD2590E:271a-25: ting 'dzin khyams su shes par bya //
T02TD2590E:271a-26: khyams la brten pa'i rdo rje mchog / gzungs rnams lha mos mchod pa yin //
T02TD2590E:271a-27: rgyan rnams kun gyis bkra ba yang //
T02TD2590E:271a-28: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa'o //
T02TD2590E:271a-29: gdul bas bskyod pa sna tshogs mchog / dam chos sgra ni kun 'gro ba //
T02TD2590E:271a-30: rlung gis bskyod pa'i sna tshogs mchog / dar 'phan dril bu sgrogs pa yin //
T02TD2590E:271a-31: me long ye shes btags me tog / byang chub yan lag me tog phreng //
T02TD2590E:271a-32: dra ba me long btags me tog / me tog chun 'phyang rgyan gyis bskor //
T02TD2590E:271a-33: kun grub mi zad bde ba ste //
T02TD2590E:271a-34: bde ba chen po zhes bshad de //
T02TD2590E:271a-35: de yi nang gi 'khor lo de //
T02TD2590E:271a-37: dngos grub bde ba kun ster ba'i //
T02TD2590E:271a-38: rnam thar brgyad po de nyid yin //
T02TD2590E:271a-39: byang chub sems ni theg pa che //
T02TD2590E:271b-0: mdo sde 'khor lo @271b rab bskor bas //
T02TD2590E:271b-1: rdo rje'i thig gis yongs ba skor ba'i //
T02TD2590E:271b-2: rdo rje 'khor lo yin par bshad //
T02TD2590E:271b-3: 'gro la ye shes kyi chags pas //
T02TD2590E:271b-4: tshon ni rdzogs sangs rgyas lnga yin //
T02TD2590E:271b-5: dbang po'i don ni rnam dag pa //
T02TD2590E:271b-6: rang gi mtshan nyid rab dbye nyid //
T02TD2590E:271b-7: shes rab ye shes bdud rtsi 'thung //
T02TD2590E:271b-8: rdo rje can gyi bum pa de //
T02TD2590E:271b-9: tshogs rdzogs pa yi rgyu mthun zhing //
T02TD2590E:271b-10: thugs rje'i rlan ldan bum pa gang //
T02TD2590E:271b-11: dkyil 'khor gang du me tog spos //
T02TD2590E:271b-12: mar me ched dang drir bshad pa //
T02TD2590E:271b-13: byang chub yan lag yid rab tshim //
T02TD2590E:271b-14: chos kyi snang grags tshogs bsdus yin //
T02TD2590E:271b-15: chos kyi zas ni lha bshos te //
T02TD2590E:271b-16: ngo tsha khrel yod pa yang gos //
T02TD2590E:271b-17: glu dang gar dang rol mo mchog / bde ba chen po'i 'phel byed yin //
T02TD2590E:271b-18: grong khyer thar pa'i grong khyer pas //
T02TD2590E:271b-19: dkyil 'khor snying po bsdus pa yin //
T02TD2590E:271b-20: de ltar spros pas mdzes pa ni //
T02TD2590E:271b-21: pha rol phyin sogs 'bras bu yin //
T02TD2590E:271b-22: lha'i de kho na nyid kyang dpal 'jam pa'i rdo rje ni shes rab kyi ye shes snang bar mdzad pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2590E:271b-23: slob dpon gyi ni las rnams kyang //
T02TD2590E:271b-24: de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis //
T02TD2590E:271b-25: dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgya ni //
T02TD2590E:271b-26: cho ga bzhin bcings zhugs nas kyang //
T02TD2590E:271b-27: spho ta'i phyag rgyas dbab par bgyi //
T02TD2590E:271b-28: de la thams cad dbab pa'i snying po ni 'di lags so //
T02TD2590E:271b-29: aa: bdag la byin gyis brlabs la sogs //
T02TD2590E:271b-30: ji lta bar ni bka' mnod do //
T02TD2590E:271b-31: de ltar bgyis nas bdag ming brjod //
T02TD2590E:271b-32: de nas rdo rje bsgrub par bgyi //
T02TD2590E:271b-33: rdo rje slob dpon sems dpa' yi //
T02TD2590E:271b-34: rdo rje lcags kyu bcings nas ni //
T02TD2590E:271b-35: se gol mang po brdab bgyis la //
T02TD2590E:271b-36: sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu thar bgyi //
T02TD2590E:271b-37: de tshe sangs rgyas thams cad ni //
T02TD2590E:271b-38: rdo rje sems la sogs bcas pa //
T02TD2590E:271b-39: dkyil 'khor thams cad gang ba rnams //
T02TD2590E:271b-41: de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yi //
T02TD2590E:271b-42: phyag rgya chen po sgom byed cing //
T02TD2590E:271b-43: ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni //
T02TD2590E:271b-44: lan cig bar du brjod par bgyi //
T02TD2590E:271b-45: de nas 'dus pa dgyes pas na //
T02TD2590E:271b-46: de bzhin gshegs rnams brtan par 'gyur //
T02TD2590E:271b-47: rdo rje sems dpa' rang grub pa //
T02TD2590E:271b-48: grogs po nyid du nye bar gnas //
T02TD2590E:271b-49: de nas sgo rnams thams cad du //
T02TD2590E:271b-50: lcags kyu la sogs las bgyis nas //
T02TD2590E:271b-51: las chen mchog gi phyag rgya yis //
T02TD2590E:271b-52: dam tshig rnams ni bzhag par bgyi //
T02TD2590E:271b-53: dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgya dang //
T02TD2590E:271b-54: sems dpa'i rdo rje la sogs pas //
T02TD2590E:272a-0: de ltar byang chub chen po @272a * //
T02TD2590E:272a-2: / dza: h'um bam ho: zhes brjod cing //
T02TD2590E:272a-3: de nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa //
T02TD2590E:272a-4: sems dpa' chen po kun bsdu bar //
T02TD2590E:272a-5: spyan drangs nas ni rab tu bzhugs //
T02TD2590E:272a-6: bcings nas de yi dbang du 'gyur //
T02TD2590E:272a-7: de nas bdag nyid chen po rnams //
T02TD2590E:272a-8: gsang ba'i mchod pas mnyes bgyis la //
T02TD2590E:272a-9: sems can don kun bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T02TD2590E:272a-10: thams cad mdzod ces gsol bar bgyi //
T02TD2590E:272a-11: 'di ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2590E:272a-12: slob ma gzhan dag ni ji lta ba bzhin du bcug ste /
T02TD2590E:272a-13: dkyil 'khor bstan pa rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2590E:272a-14: rang gi lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas kyang rang gi lhag pa'i lhar byin gyis brlabs la phyag rgya chen pos sngar bshad pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhag ste /
T02TD2590E:272a-15: spos la sogs pas mchod yon sbyin te /
T02TD2590E:272a-17: de nas phyag rgya cod pan dar dbyangs dang /
T02TD2590E:272a-18: rdo rje dang bdag po dang /
T02TD2590E:272a-19: ming gi dbang bskur la sgeg mo la sogs pas kyang yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD2590E:272a-20: sngags byin la rang gi lha'i phyag rgya bzhi snga ma bzhin bstan nas slob ma re re nas bzung ste /
T02TD2590E:272a-21: blugs gzar gyis de rnams kyi spyi bo nas bskor zhing phab ste /
T02TD2590E:272a-22: dgang blugs bdun phul la bsang zhing bya bas la lag par gdu bu gdags par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:272a-23: 'di ni thun mong gi 'jug pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2590E:272a-24: de nas dri la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2590E:272a-25: sgeg mo la sogs pas kyang dkyil 'khor pa rnams yang dag par mchod la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la ci nus par mchod cig ces slob ma rnams la bsgo la /
T02TD2590E:272a-26: mchod pa byed du bcug nas ji ltar zhugs pa rnams yang bza' ba dang btung ba spyod pa la sogs pa thams cad dang /
T02TD2590E:272a-27: mgon po la phul ba rnams kyis kun du tshim par byas nas /
T02TD2590E:272a-28: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad de //
T02TD2590E:272a-29: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje'i brtul zhugs byin la /
T02TD2590E:272a-30: de rnams dang lhan cig mtshan mo nyal bar bsgom pa dang bzlas pa byas la /
T02TD2590E:272a-31: yang su la yang smra bar mi byed cig thams cad la bsgo la bla mas yon blang bar bya'o ;
T02TD2590E:272a-32: / de nas chung ma sdug pa dang //
T02TD2590E:272a-33: rin chen gser ni 'bar ba dang //
T02TD2590E:272a-34: nor bu mu tig byu ru dang //
T02TD2590E:272a-35: lus kyang sbyin par bya ba yin //
T02TD2590E:272a-36: slob mas bla ma la gus pas //
T02TD2590E:272a-37: ci nas 'di ltar bya ba ste //
T02TD2590E:272a-38: ji ltar bla ma mgu bar bya //
T02TD2590E:272a-39: bla ma mgu bas dngos grub kyi //
T02TD2590E:272a-40: gzhan du min zhes thub pas gsungs //
T02TD2590E:272b-0: de nas bzhin @272b bzangs longs la /
T02TD2590E:272b-1: de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ci rigs pa rdzogs par gyis la /
T02TD2590E:272b-2: gang gis ring po mi thogs pa kho nar lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi ston par 'gyur ba de ltar gyis shig ces snying la 'bab pa'i tshig brjod la slob ma gtang bar bya'o //
T02TD2590E:272b-3: de nas me thab kyi dbus su bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor chen po'i bdag po dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2590E:272b-4: rgyas pa'i cho gas mar gyi dgang blugs brgya phul la /
T02TD2590E:272b-5: zhi ba'i cho gas kyang mar gyi dgang blugs brgya phul te /
T02TD2590E:272b-6: yang dag par bstod la mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod de phyogs kyi gtor ma byin la phyag byas te /
T02TD2590E:272b-7: mchod yon phul la dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngos te snga ma bzhin du phyag rgya dgrol ba la sogs pa rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya bcings la dkyil 'khor lan gsum bskor ba byas te /
T02TD2590E:272b-8: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dang gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gshegs su gsol la //
T02TD2590E:272b-9: ji ltar sprul pa'i tshogs kyang rang gi lus kyi nang du chud par byas la /
T02TD2590E:272b-10: aa k'a ro mu kham sarbba dha rmm'a n'am a'a dya nu tpa nna tv'a ta ces brod la //
T02TD2590E:272b-11: de'i don la lhag par mos shing yi ge h'um dang dkyil 'khor phyag par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:272b-12: 'bad pas tshon rtsi bsdus nas ni //
T02TD2590E:272b-13: chu chen dag tu dor bar bya //
T02TD2590E:272b-14: dor nas kyang ni sa gzhi ni //
T02TD2590E:272b-15: ba yi lci bas byug par bya //
T02TD2590E:272b-16: de nas aom badzra k'i lo ta k'i la ya sarbba k'i l'am /
T02TD2590E:272b-17: buddha saddhya na badzra dha ra a'a dzny'a ya h'um h'um h'um zhes bya ba'i rdo rje phur ba'i sngags kyi bsam gtan las byung ba'i phur bu phyung la seng ldeng las byung ba'i phur bu zhi ba'i rig pa brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i 'o ma'am spos chus bkrus nas bu ga yang dgang bar bya'o //
T02TD2590E:272b-18: lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs /
T02TD2590E:272b-19: mdzub mo gnyis zlum por byas te /
T02TD2590E:272b-20: lag ngar brkyang la skam pa lta bur bya ba ni /
T02TD2590E:272b-21: phur bu dbyung ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2590E:272b-22: de nas bdag nyid dang slob ma dang /
T02TD2590E:272b-24: sems can thams cad la dmigs te zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2590E:272b-25: dkyil 'khor gyi ni yo byad rnams //
T02TD2590E:272b-26: thams cad slob dpon dbang bar bshad //
T02TD2590E:272b-27: slob mas cung zad bskur mi bya //
T02TD2590E:272b-28: gal te khyer na dam tshig nyams //
T02TD2590E:272b-29: slob dpon gyis kyang ci rigs par //
T02TD2590E:272b-30: bdag nyid 'dod pas spyad par bya //
T02TD2590E:272b-31: zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal sgyu 'phrul dra bas gsungs so //
T02TD2590E:272b-32: thams cad du yang dkyil 'khor dang /
T02TD2590E:273a-0: sbyin sreg la sogs pa rtsom pa @273a * //
T02TD2590E:273a-2: gang gi tshe slob dpon gyi phyi rol du 'gro na /
T02TD2590E:273a-3: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa gshin rje gshed sngar bshad pa'i rang gi ngo bor rang gi snying gnas rang gi sa bon las nges par byung ba /
T02TD2590E:273a-4: gdug pa'i bgegs ma lus pa 'dul ba la 'jug pa lha dang mi ma dang pa rnams dang par mdzad pa /
T02TD2590E:273a-5: dang ba rnams slar yang 'phel bar mdzad pa ste /
T02TD2590E:273a-6: mdor na de ni sems can thams cad kyi mngon par mi 'dod pa zlog par mdzad cing /
T02TD2590E:273a-7: mngon par 'dod pa rdzogs par mdzad pa /
T02TD2590E:273a-8: ma tshang ba'i nyes pa rnams sel bar mdzad pa /
T02TD2590E:273a-9: khro bo mtha' yas pas kun du bskor ba h'a h'a zhes bzhad pas ri bo chen po dang /
T02TD2590E:273a-10: rgya mtsho'i dkyil 'khor 'khrugs par mdzad pas /
T02TD2590E:273a-11: nam mkha'i gtos thams cad khyab par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:273a-12: de lta bu ni gang gi tshe slob dpon nang na gnas pa de'i tshe phyi rol na bzhugs par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:273a-13: bri ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o //
T02TD2590E:273a-14: snga ma bzhin du bdag po'i sbyor ba 'di nyid dang ldan pas sa yongs su gzung ba'i cho ga la sogs pa thams cad nas dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2590E:273a-15: slob ma slar btang ba dang /
T02TD2590E:273a-16: zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gi bar du yid kyis byas te /
T02TD2590E:273a-17: yid kyis phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgya cher bya'o //
T02TD2590E:273a-18: yang na de bzhin du bdag po'i rnal 'byor pas /
T02TD2590E:273a-19: sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsreg pa sngon du 'gro ba dang ;
T02TD2590E:273a-20: gzhal yas khang bskyed la de'i nang du zla ba dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi gdan ci rigs par padma la gnas par bsams la /
T02TD2590E:273a-21: slob ma me'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i mes thal bar byas la /
T02TD2590E:273a-22: rang gi sngags kyi bdag nyid can du sna bug g-yas pa nas bcug ste /
T02TD2590E:273a-23: rang gi sa bon gyi yi ge las bskyed pa /
T02TD2590E:273a-24: sna bug cig shos nas phyung ste /
T02TD2590E:273a-25: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus ma la gzhag ste /
T02TD2590E:273a-26: sku la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs la bdag po'i sbyor bas gnas par rang gi phyag rgya'i rig pa dang gnyis su med par gyur pa rang gi snying ga'i rdo rje lte ba la gnas pa'i yi ge h'um yongs su gyur pa dang /
T02TD2590E:273a-27: dkyil 'khor ba'i lha'i 'khor lo ma lus par bsams la mthar rang gi phyag rgya'i bde ba chen po'i mer yang dag par zhugs pas /
T02TD2590E:273a-28: de nyid zla ba zhu ba'i gzugs kyis phyung la /
T02TD2590E:273b-0: gnas ji lta ba na gnas pa'i lha ma lus pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor zhing dkyil @273b 'khor gyi bdag po'i sbyor bas gnas pa la snga ma bzhin du yi ge gsum gyis brlabs pa dang /
T02TD2590E:273b-1: h'um las byung ba'i lha mo bzhi bde ba chen pos byin gyis brlab pa snying po dang /
T02TD2590E:273b-2: yon blang ba sngon du 'gro bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis til gyi gang bu bzhin du nam mkha'i ngos kun du bkang nas spyan la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams nang du zhugs pas bde ba chen po'i ngo bo nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi bum pa phyag na bsnams kyis spyi bo nas dbang bskur zhing //
T02TD2590E:273b-3: dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje che //
T02TD2590E:273b-4: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dang /
T02TD2590E:273b-5: snying po brjod cing dbang bskur te /
T02TD2590E:273b-6: de'i 'od zer rnams kyis nyes pa thams cad dang bral zhing /
T02TD2590E:273b-7: gos la sogs pas brgyan pa'i cod pan gyi dbang bskur ba sngon du 'gro ba'i glu rnams kyis yang dag par dga' bar byas la /
T02TD2590E:273b-8: snga ma bzhin du dam tshig sbyin pa la sogs pa rdzogs par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:273b-9: 'di ni re zhig gzhan gyi dbang bskur ba bdag nyid kyang bdag po'i sbyor bas rang gi rig pa dang gnyis su med par gyur bas 'di lta bu'i dbang bskur ba nyid blang bar bya ste /
T02TD2590E:273b-10: 'di yang gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba ste /
T02TD2590E:273b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis sngags pa dbang bskur ba thams cad kyang mchog / dngos grub dam pa thams cad kyi rgyu yin no //
T02TD2590E:273b-12: yid kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga ni 'dir bcom ldan 'das mngon par bzhed pa kho na ste /
T02TD2590E:273b-13: ji skad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje gsang ba 'dus par dbang bskur ba'i bcom ldan 'das slob dpon la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
T02TD2590E:273b-14: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis ji lta ba lta bar bya ba la sogs pa ji skad gsungs pa 'di lta bu yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang /
T02TD2590E:273b-15: thugs rdo rje'i 'dus pas 'dres pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba ni 'di yid kyi nyid yin te /
T02TD2590E:273b-16: so so'i skye bo rnams kyis phyi'i med pa dang /
T02TD2590E:273b-17: de'i dbang du byas pa yin no //
T02TD2590E:273b-18: de bas na 'di ltar dkyil 'khor gyi le'u las til gyi gang bu ltar kun du gang ba'i rgyal ba'i bum pa'i chu dang dbang bskur bar mdzad par bsams par bya ba ni /
T02TD2590E:274a-0: @274a * // dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid dang 'dra'o zhes ji skad du gsungs pa dang /
T02TD2590E:274a-1: de bzhin du dpal de kho na nyid bsdus pa las kyang rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gsungs nas /
T02TD2590E:274a-2: phyag rgya gcig pu'i dkyil 'khor gsungs shing /
T02TD2590E:274a-3: de nyid ras dang rtsig pa dang /
T02TD2590E:274a-4: nam mkha'i phyogs su yang bsam par bya'o zhes gsungs pas de yang dkyil 'khor chen po la sogs pa thams cad du dbar bskur ba yid kyi nyid rjes su gnang ba kho na yin no //
T02TD2590E:274a-5: dkyil 'khor thams cad bshad pa khyad par med pa dang /
T02TD2590E:274a-6: bstan pa des khyad par ci zhig yod de /
T02TD2590E:274a-7: gal te phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid yin gyi dkyil 'khor chen po la sogs pa ni ma yin no //
T02TD2590E:274a-8: de ci'i phyir phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor yid kyi yin gyi //
T02TD2590E:274a-9: dkyil 'khor chen po la sogs pa ni ma yin no zhes la la zer ba de ni mi rigs so //
T02TD2590E:274a-10: bdag cig gi slob dpon rnams kyis kyang gal te 'dul ba'i dbang gis gzhan dag la 'di skad du gsungs kyi yang dag par ma yin te //
T02TD2590E:274a-11: ji ltar dbang bskur ba 'di ni mi sems kyi rjes su 'brang ba yin pa de bzhin du cho ga gzhan dag kyang ci'i phyir mi 'dod de /
T02TD2590E:274a-12: khyad par med pa yin no //
T02TD2590E:274a-13: yid mngon par 'dus byas pa'i phyir rtsam pa 'di dag thams cad de bri ba'i cho ga yang /
T02TD2590E:274a-14: ji srid yid kyi cho ga rjes su ma spyad pa de srid 'bras bu dang ldan par mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD2590E:274a-15: de lta bas na yid kyi cho ga 'di stobs can yin pa'i phyir mchog yin gyi /
T02TD2590E:274a-17: yid kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o /
T02TD2590E:274a-20: // / de ltar gnyi gas kyang 'gro ba ma lus pa'i don byas la /
T02TD2590E:274a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i mchod par bshad pa /
T02TD2590E:274a-22: nam mkha' dri ma med pa chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyis ji ltar bde bar gnas par bya'o //
T02TD2590E:274a-23: 'jig rten gsum la bde phan bsgrub par brtson pa yis //
T02TD2590E:274a-24: bdag gis cho ga 'di bshad dge thob gang yin pa //
T02TD2590E:274a-25: des ni 'gro ba kun dang bdag gis 'di nyid kyi //
T02TD2590E:274a-26: dkyil 'khor 'khor lo mngon sum gyur ba myur thob shog / sems can thams cad la bde ba bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rdzogs so /
